1212.content:
Live is difficult sometimes. You have happy moments and less happy moments. Some of those things just happen but most come because of you and some come from your parents. Especially in the start of your life. Your parents who raise you are very important for the happy things in the start of your life. Later when your older you can decide more things for yourself. But most things parents do for you are happy things since normally they love you and normally you love them. But some things your parents do can have influence on the rest or a great part of your life even when you're able to decide for yourself.
When Mary's life started her parents chose for her but Mary had possibly chosen the same.

Mary was from the first day she came too the world a big eater. Well drinker since she started of course with mother milk. After they started to give her other food her parents gave her a lot of it what she all ate. This only increased her appetite. After she started to eat solid food her weight really sky rocketed.
Probably she had chosen the same thing since she was liked being fat just like her family. Her mother weighed around 750 pounds. She could't walk. Only thing she did was laying in bed, eating watching T.V be on the computer and talking with her daughters.
Mary was also immobile thanks to all the food they gave her. She was already 500 pounds at an age of 9. That's pretty high. But she was raised to be fat. From the first day at school she realized she was different. After she broke chairs thanks to her weight and had trouble walking more the a few steps she dropped out of school and spend all her time sitting at home, eating and watching T.V. All she did was sitting on the couch and she even slept on it since she could't walk.
Her father still had some muscle but he was also 300 pounds. His parents were very rich and after they died in a car accident he got a lot of money and his parents owned some companies and now he was busy running them. So that's why he earned enough money for Star.
Star was a tanned girl with black curly hair that worked there. With an obese immobile woman and obese immobile girl and an obese dad who worked a lot there was't much work done around the house. Like cleaning, laundry and most important cooking for the family. Of course in this family cooking was what you need too do a lot of the time. Lucky Star liked it too cook. At her old house she tried so many things but mostly she had prepared more food people could eat so when she heard about this it seemed perfect for her. Besides it paid good and she had her own room here and she liked Mary her mother and the little 5 year 200 pound Becky.
Becky was Mary's little sister. She was still mobile but did't moved that much since she could only walk short distance without getting out of breath and having sore feet.

Mary also once asked star how she got her name and she told that her own mother wanted too give her a name took her outside and decided too call her after the first thing she saw. We don't know if it was true.
Mary anyway loved her life and loved sweets and star gave her a lot of sweets and also a lot of other food to keep Mary, her mother, her sister and her dad (if he was home) well fed. Star loved taking care of this obese family and she had started to love every one of them especially Mary.
So let's start a typical day of Mary.
1212.title: Obese family

choices: It was 4:30, time for the pre-dinner-snack.
Mary woke up early and ravenous.
12122.content:
The house was still. It was three o'clock, or post-lunch naptime for the three largest inhabitants. Mary slept on the couch, breathing heavily in her slumber. Her head was drooped forward onto her significantly large chest, a thin streamer of drool pooling on her enormous, yet inadequate T-shirt. I say inadequate, because despite being XL it was barely capable of covering her chest and left nothing at all to the imagination below that. Her enormous belly extended all the way to the end of her lap and a little beyond, drooping a bit towards the floor. Behind her, her butt was large enough to claim two and a quarter of the three cushions of the couch she lived on. Her fat arms rested by her sides, on her fat thighs. Quite simply, she was FAT. As a result, she lived in the living room, mostly because she was the fastest-growing of the family and needed the most food. Soon enough she'd need a bigger couch.

A slight noise from the kitchen stirred her, not completely awake but more towards that area. She made a noble attempt at shifting her enormous poundage, which only succeeded in jiggling her quite a bit and dislodging a shower of wrappers onto the floor. Slightly more comfortable, she went back to full sleep with a contented sigh.

Star smiled at the scene from the kitchen. She knew the family well, and was as such busily preparing for the four-thirty pre-dinner snack that everybody needed. Today she was making macaroni and cheese, which in addition to being delicious would also help broil the dinner chickens properly. As she grated and added onions, she took a moment to marvel at her "family." Mostly, the measures they took to maintain a familial lifestyle when precisely one of them (Dad) left their rooms on a regular basis. They all had computers, and would Skype each other frequently to catch up. They all had plenty of books and access to television, and on rare occasions various mobility devices would be employed to have a family outing. In many ways, it was perfectly normal. Star was happy to be here.

A floor above, Becky also slept. The five-year-old was the youngest and the littlest of the family, still able to move under her own power (although she insisted she couldn't and wouldn't whenever anybody asked.) As such, she still did various normal-people things like wear fitting clothes and use the bathroom alone, although those days were rapidly coming to an end as her stomach threatened to grow larger than a standard pillow. She was as a result spending more and more time in bed, rapidly approaching the level of sedentary of her mother and older sister.

The girl's mother slept too, in her room. She was the largest of the family by a good 250 pounds, but that window may not last for long considering the rate that Mary's growing. Even so, she was content in her enormity. Her life was good and her family was loving. She smiled through her slumber.

Soon enough...
12122.title: Mary is sleeping

choices: Star left the oven on and now there's a grease fire
121221.content:
The atmosphere of stillness was starting to get to Star. It was such a peaceful day. The sun shone brightly on the grass outside, yet mostly avoided the house, luckily for the snoozing occupants. She had already put the macaroni in, maybe she could just take a brief nap...

Star was awoken quite suddenly by the oven, beeping as planned at precisely 4:29. She sat up, rubbed her eyes, and then remembered what exactly she was supposed to be doing. Spurred into action, she leapt up and removed all five casserole dishes of the macaroni at lightning speed. She set them on the counter to cool and busied herself collecting trays and plates. The smell wafted itself through the house as she did so, getting the three immobiles up and ready for a snack.

Mary was having just the loveliest dream about ruling a small country when thoughts of macaroni violently intruded themselves into Marytopia and woke her up. She blinked, blearily, stretched her arms as high as they would go (not very) and then scratched idly at her massive paunch, sniffing the heavenly scent of even more food. Right on time, her stomach let out an extremely impatient growl. "It's okay, belly!" She said, kneading as much of it as she could reach (not much) "We'll be eating quite soon!" And it was true, as Star brought two of the five dishes of macaroni over to her, dished out some onto a plate, and placed it gently on her belly. "Oh, thank you Star! It smells awesome!" Mary cried, reaching for her fork. "Careful, it's quite-" Star started, but Mary was already shoveling the contents into her mouth, getting cheese and noodles all over her face and chest. Star smiled and rubbed her head, then returned to the kitchen to get Becky her portion.

The 200-pound sister was still asleep when Star arrived with her single casserole dish of pasta, snoozing quietly on her side with her big belly spreading out across the bed. Star smiled, and waved a fork with a single noodle in front of the little girl's nose. Becky sniffed the air a few times, then tried to bite the pasta, but Star pulled it away just in time. Becky then opened her eyes and let out a joyous squeal at the sight of so much food. Star again spooned some onto a plate and left it for her, then went back to the kitchen for her mother's portion and to let Becky gobble in peace.

The girl's mother, Cassandra, was awake and watching CSI when Star arrived at the door with her snack. Despite being the largest, Cassandra wanted to make sure that her two growing daughters got fed first, as she had dreams of them someday surpassing her. She herself was quite happy at 750 pounds, and didn't see the need to grow too much larger, but she certainly wanted her daughters to. Her dream position was as matriarch of a large family of flab, spreading figuratively and literally across the globe. For now, though, she was quite happy with two immobile (or nearly) daughters. "How are they, Star?" she asked her helper as she set the dishes down. "They're fine, Miss Cassandra. Becky's looking bigger by the day." Cassandra took a large bite of pasta. "Mmm...and Mary?" Star laughed. "Of course Mary's growing! We're going to need a much bigger couch before too long." Cassandra smiled. "Oh, excellent. Dan'll love to hear that." Dan was Mary and Becky's father. He was a reasonably sized 300 pounds, but having to support three immobile girls meant he had to stay as mobile as possible. Luckily, this wasn't terrible, as he ran a very large and prosperous furniture company, but it also entailed long hours at the office. He left at eight and didn't often return before six. Nonetheless, he still managed to spend plenty of time with his family. "What's for dinner tonight, Star?" Cassandra continued. "Chicken and potatoes," Star answered. "Mmm, I can barely wait!" Cassandra smiled, finally digging into the macaroni. Star left her in peace.

When she returned to the kitchen, however...
121221.title: It was 4:30, time for the pre-dinner-snack.

choices: Despite all of Star's work, Mary just doesn't seem to be getting full.
Mary was so ravenous she eventually succeeds in getting herself off the couch.
1212211.content:
Star walked down the hallway once again, pausing to collect Becky's empty dish. Becky had fallen back to sleep, covered in cheese and looking somewhat larger. Star smiled and patted her head. She then returned to the living room, where Mary...

...was desperately trying to move, for some reason. Mary was in quite a state. She was swinging her pudgy arms back and forth and wiggling her tiny feet, trying like crazy to gain momentum. She wasn't going anywhere, though- only succeeding in jiggling like crazy. Ripples spread out across her enormous belly and ridiculous butt, and her oversized bust bounced up and down in her ludicrously tiny T-Shirt. Sweat coated her massive form and was beginning to form a small puddle on the carpet. Star watched her for a few minutes in confusion and amusement before finally asking, "Mary, what's wrong? Where in the world are you trying to go?"

Huffing and puffing, Mary answered, "I'm so hungry!!"

Star looked at her in amazement. Mary had cleared all three dishes of pasta completely. They looked like they had just come out of the dishwasher. Luckily, there was a contingency plan for this; a stash of snacks stored near the couch in a big cardboard box. Star retrieved it and put a few bags of chips within easy reach of Mary's flabby arms while she went back into the kitchen to prepare some emergency rations for the enormous little girl.
1212211.title: Mary's still starving

12122111.content:
The emergency stash, which had once seemed so large and imposing, was dwindling quickly to nothingness before Star's disbelieving eyes. Family-sized bags of chips and packets of cookies flew down Mary's gullet into her ravenous belly, which, despite consuming enough calories to feed a musk ox, was still groaning in hunger, crying out for more. Star shook herself out of her amazement and raced into the kitchen, grabbing anything labeled "instant" or canned and tossing them into various pots and pans. Ramen noodles, cans of beans, soup, corn, everything that took little preparation was getting heated and seasoned to stuff into Mary. As the stove top bubbled and sizzled, Star chanced a quick look at Mary.

The stash was nearly gone. Mary was surrounded by wrappers and covered with crumbs. A healthy coating of chocolate and Oreo filling surrounded her mouth (which she was frantically stuffing more Doritos into) and her various ripples, flaps and folds were damp with sweat from her efforts. Her stomach, as if a warning to Star, let out a loud, fierce growl of pure hunger. Star quickly turned her attention back to the food, which now appeared to be done (thank goodness.) Star ladled it onto various bowls and plates and brought it out, on a large tray, to Mary. Hopefully this would be enough for now.
12122111.title: Despite all of Star's work, Mary just doesn...

choices: Becky's hungry too...all 230 pounds of her.
121221111.content:
Over an hour had passed. Discarded bowls, empty plates, and scraps of food littered the floor around the couch. The smell of food, sweat, and gas permeated the living room. Star wearily brushed hair out of her face, exhausted. Mary had eaten everything that Star could find to give her in the kitchen, save for dinner, which Star was now worried would not be even close to enough. Chips, pasta, vegetables, everything that Mary, and later, Star had shoved into her gullet was gone. And yet...

Mary was an absolute mess. Her various rolls and crevices were filled with crumbs, spills, and splatters of all kinds. Her T-Shirt was soaked through with soups, sauces, and sweat. Her face, covered as it was in cheese, broth, bread bits and chip crumbs, could have passed for a modern art piece. But most impressive of all this was her belly. Mary's massive stomach had gone from its usual saggy and flabby state to being round, and much much firmer. Where normally her belly would droop over the end of the couch cushions and hang towards the floor in rolls, it now stuck out quite a bit farther, and obscured her view forward. Star had no idea how much food she had eaten, but it looked (and felt) like a hundred pounds.

Mary was exhausted too. She'd moved her arms more in a few hours than she usually did in a day. She panted, trying to get air into her small and generally inadequate lungs. Not only had she moved her arms enough to actually burn (!) some calories, she also had eaten more food than ever before. But she wasn't done yet. Her stomach let out an angry growl, and pangs of hunger gripped at her distended belly. "STAR!" Mary cried, "I'M STILL HUNGRY!"

Star looked wearily at Mary, incredulous and tired. There was an enormous quantity of food in the basement, but Star now had no doubts that Mary would most likely eat all of it. She resigned herself with a heavy sigh, and set off to the basement.

Just then...
121221111.title: It wasn't enough.

choices: Becky uses the chair as a lift to support her belly.
Becky rolls down the hallway...with dramatic consequences.
1212211111.content:
As Star clumped heavily down into the basement, little Becky blinked her eyes open. At first, she wasn't entirely sure why she was awake, but then the scent of a hundred different kinds of food wafted into her nose. She sniffed the air greedily, eyes agleam. In good form, her own sizable stomach informed her loudly that it was very hungry. "Star!" she cried. No response. "STAR!" she called again, louder. Still nothing. Becky looked around in despair. She was hungry, but that would mean she would have to get up. And move. All by herself.

Well, sometimes, one must make sacrifices.

Becky took a few deep breaths to prepare herself for the undertaking, and then slid herself slowly onto her feet, sending a wave of jiggles through her belly and butt. She stood there by her bed for a few seconds, then took a ponderous step forward. She jiggled more, her sleeping shirt riding up her belly and her shorts riding down her thighs. Another step, and her feet let out a twinge of pain from being walked on. Ugh, she thought, I'm gonna be SO glad when I give this up. She took a few more steps, her knee-length belly rippling with each one, sweat pouring down her face and onto her shirt. Huffing and puffing, she reached the door, and leaned heavily against it, catching her breath. Her legs were crying out in pain. She considered giving up, but just then the smell of spices filled her nose and reinvigorated her. (Star had just finished cooking something else to feed to her ravenous big sister.) But she was so tired...

Just then, a solution presented itself to her, in the form of an old office chair. She smiled broadly.
1212211111.title: Becky's hungry too...all 230 pounds of her.

12122111111.content:
She grabbed her belly with her hands and lifted it. It took her a lot of effort since her belly was the biggest part of her body. But also because Becky's had very weak muscles. She hardly used them. However she had been able to lift her belly on the office chair and sighed relieved. She waddled to the living room using the chair to support her belly.

"Oh hello Becky." Mary mumbled when her little sister entered the room.

"Where's Star?" Becky asked grumpy. "That girl can better soon come over. I'm starving."

"Your starving?" Mary asked. "I'm starving too. I have a bigger stomach then you. You can still walk on your own!"

Becky grind one's teeth. She might be fat but compared to her mother and big sister she was a lightweight. She hated that. Her dream and desire was too become an immobile blob. Bigger then her sister. Bigger then her mother. The most obese person in the entire world. Her mother supported her but also supported Mary. With Mary around she would always be number two.
Star walked in the room. Her arms full with food.

"That's about time!" Becky yelled. "I'm wasting away here. Get me some food!"

Star sighed. Normally she could keep up with the huge appetites of the three obese females in the house but today she seemed to finally have met her match.

"Becky can you wait a second? I'm busy making food for your sister. She's hungry too."

"What about me. I needed to walk the entire way from my bedroom too the living room."

Star rolled with her eyes. She sometimes got a bit irritated how extremely lazy Becky was. She barely moved. All right Mary and her mother also hardly moved but they could't. Becky could if she put some effort in it.
She started preparing food as fast if she could while the two girls yelled for more.
Mary was still on the couch since she could't move and Becky was sitting on the ground between the two fat loaded legs of her big sister.
Star worked as fast if she could. Giving food to both girls. Every kind of food disappeared in their mouths in a minute. But finally
12122111111.title: Two hungry girls

choices: A crisis! There isn't any food for dinner!
The sisters have to use the bathroom... (Potential warning?)
121221111111.content:
She'd done it. Every last scrap of food had been cooked, seasoned, and stuffed into the two enormous sisters. A trail of cardboard, cans, wrappers, bottles, and baking dishes led from the kitchen to the living room. As it got closer to the proverbial Ground Zero, the trail changed from packaging to food- sauce, crumbs, and scraps forming a multicolored path up the couch. At the base was Becky, sticky with sauce and stuffed with a grand mixture of food ranging from baked beans to a recently-defrosted salmon. Her stomach, normally resting somewhere by her knees, was now stretching to mid-calf, so full was it. It rose and fell gently as she slept off her food-coma- she must have eaten thirty pounds of food alone. But, of course, this paled in comparison to the completely ridiculous Mary.

Mary also slept, and was similarly stuffed to the gills. However, since she was so much larger and significantly older than Becky, her stuffed was a LOT bigger. Her belly extended so far in front of her now that it shaded Becky and rested firmly on her sister's up stretched paunch. It had been stuffed up, as well, to the point where she could no longer see in front of it- if she was awake, that is. She had eaten with such vigour that towards the end she had tired her arms out, meaning Star had to feed her, meaning that, in turn, there was food absolutely everywhere. On the cushions, in her hair, on her hands, all over her belly, on the scraps of her too-tiny T-shirt (she'd ripped it to shreds during a particularly vigorous lunge after a bon-bon) and covering her face, as well. But Star had done it. She'd used everything she had in her arsenal, but they were fed. And happy, it seemed. Mary was smiling broadly in her sleep. Taking a peek at Becky under Mary's belly, she too was smiling. Star too smiled, then collapsed into the easy chair and fell into a dreamless sleep.
121221111111.title: Both girls are full

1212211111111.content:
Star woke up by a cry from Mary. She opened her eyes and stretched herself once and turned her head.

"What's up Mary? Why are you crying?" Star asked. "I just fed you."

"That was hours ago Star. You slept hours." Mary said. "It's almost dinnertime."

"Yeah I have..." Star froze.

Mary and Becky both had eaten so much she fed them everything in the house. There was't a crumb left. All the food was in the two bloated bellies of the two young girls. She forget to get food for dinner. She moaned. This had never before happened to her.

"I forget to get food. You ate it all."

"What?" Mary asked. "That's nothing for you. You never forgot to buy or order food!"

"I know! I know! I guess I just... was well tired. You two were hungry!"

"But we're also hungry now!" Becky screamed. "I's there any food?"

Star did't knew what to do. She was worried that she made a terrible mistake. She ran up stairs to the room of the mother of Mary and Becky. The 750 pound woman looked up. A bit surprised.

"Well hello Star. You a bit early with dinner but I'm... " Her voice trailed of. "Star, Why don't I see dinner?"

Star fell on knees.

"I'm so sorry. This morning, Mary or Becky, both of them got very hungry. I fed them well... all the food we had. Then I fell asleep. I forget to order any food for dinner. I'm so sorry. Please don't fire me. It won'thappen again."

The mother of May and Becky looked at Star.
1212211111111.title: No food?

12122111111111.content:
Cassandra sighed deeply. "I can't believe you, Star. I understand that this is hard for you, but you have a job to do! Now Mary and Rebecca are going to be hungry no matter what!" Her belly let out an enormous growl in agreement. "You see? I'm starving! And it's because of you! I know its tiring, but you're not allowed to sleep in an office, are you?"

Star shamefully shook her head no.

"And furthermore, Dan will be home soon! I know he's a lot smaller, but he works all day! Even a man as small as him gets hungry!" "Small" was a bit of a misnomer for the 340 pound husband, but comparatively speaking his BMI was the lowest. Cassandra looked annoyedly at the wall. Star hung her head. After a little while (and another furious growl) Cassandra spoke again.

"Call a few restaurants. Order the whole menu for delivery. And for goodness' sake make sure you stock up tomorrow, You're not fired, but consider this to be a major warning."

Star turned to leave, but Cassandra stopped her before she could leave completely.

"But thank you ever so much for feeding the girls all of that. They're gonna get so big!"

Star, smiling slightly, left the room.
12122111111111.title: She's angry at Star

choices: Salvation! The first few trucks arrive!
Catastrophe! Mary's worked herself up so, she's fallen off the couch!
121221111111111.content: "STAR, WE'RE HUNGRY!" the two enormous girls screamed as Star clumped tiredly down the stairs. Mary was crying, pointlessly flailing her flabby and nearly useless arms and kicking her swollen feet with all the fervor of one dying. "I'm gonna die of starvation!" the enormous nine-year old wailed. Beneath her overarching blanket of belly, Becky was insenced, cursing everything from Star to her own "skinniness" to, and especially this, the terrible lack of food to shovel into her mouth. "I'm sorry, I'm sorry!" Star cried, hurrying to the phone and calling every delivery place she knew. At a loss, she simply ordered "everything" each time she called. They gave varying delivery times- thirty minutes for the tiny sandwich shop, three hours for the diner- all of which were far too long and terribly disagreeable to the enormous girls she took care of. As hunger gripped at their ridiculous stomachs, fear gripped them also, which in turn caised them to get even angrier and sadder. As the wails and yells reached a fever pitch...
121221111111111.title: More feeding...Star'll sleep well tonight.

choices: ...at four, when the dad came home.
...at eleven, by the girls clamoring for breakfast.
1212211111111111.content:
Each minute seemed like a day to the harried Star. The girls just whined, and whined, and whined for the whole half-hour about how they would starve to death and waste away and how it would all be Star's fault. Mary was jiggling so, due to being incensed and hungry and in pain, that Star feared she might actually move. Luckily, though, just as everything nearly went to hell, the first three trucks pulled up. Soon enough, the room was once again filled with the scent of fresh-baked food. Rather than attempt any sort of decorum, Star just put several trays of food and forks near each of the girls and raced to prepare a large platter for Cassandra. Sandwiches, sausages, and sushi all made it onto the big plate before Star bolted up the stairs and to Cassandra. The girls, meanwhile, got to stuffing their faces. Soon, though, the trays near them were cleared, and as they couldn't reach any more they set about wailing again. Star bolted back down the stairs and pushed more trays close by. Tray after tray disappeared down their throats, truck after truck pulled into the driveway, and Star was busier than she ever had been. There was no respite. The enormous girls continued demanding food long past any reasonable hour had passed or any reasonable person's capacity for food. Finally, though, it ended. At three in the morning, Mary took a bite of taco, burped, said "I'm full" and immediately fell asleep. Becky, after grumbling slightly, did the same. Both girls were stuffed to the max- perfectly round, tight stomachs, with no give at all. Best of all, there was even plenty of food left over. Star smiled with great satisfaction and collapsed onto the tray-covered floor, fast asleep as well.

She was later awoken...
1212211111111111.title: Salvation! The first few trucks arrive!

choices: The girls are just as hungry- Star is worked to the bone.
Yesterday was a fluke- the girls are back to their normal diets.
12122111111111111.content:
The house was asleep. Darkness coated the room like a blanket and bedded down the three sleeping figures in the living room. Mary, the largest, slumbered deeply, head resting on her still massive belly, a thin streamer of drool trailing its way down her vast expanse. Beneath her, Becky had flopped onto her back, snoring loudly, her own sizable stomach pressing lightly into her enormous sister's gut. Across the room, curled up in a loveseat, was Star, completely knocked out from her huge job of earlier. Though she dreamed of a relaxing vacation, deep down she knew she'd rather be nowhere else but here, supporting her charges with love and food.

With a quiet snik, the relative calm was broken as a largish figure snuck through the door as well as a 347-pound man could. Upon seeing the dimly-illuminated litter of containers on the floor, his tired features broke into a smile. His girls had clearly eaten well. He stepped further in, but unfortunately landed with a crunch on a concealed pie tin. Star shot out of her chair in a flash, overtired eyes working in overtime. "Mr... Dan! Can I get anything for you? Sorry about the mess, sir, I haven't had time to..." Dan chuckled and waved a hand around dismissively. "It's fine, Star! So long as they're fed, anything is fine. I'll fix something myself." A wave of relief washed over Star's exhausted face. "Thank you, sir. They're in the fridge." And with that, she collapsed back onto the chair.

With a broad smile, Dan wandered into the kitchen and heated up a large plate of rice and steak. He considered eating it down there, but instead walked into the living room, kissed both girls lightly on the forehead, and then made his way upstairs. He greeted the sleeping Cassandra with a smooch on the cheek and set about eating his dinner. "Babe," said Cassandra tiredly, "I almost fired Star today." Dan swallowed. "Don't do that, she's fantastic. Why would you?" "She didn't feed me enough..." she whined, jokingly. "Well," said Dan, putting his next forkful into her mouth, "I have the day off tomorrow. How's about I make it up to you?" "I'd love that..." said she. And with broad smiles on their faces, they, too, went to sleep.

The next day...
12122111111111111.title: ...at four, when the dad came home.

121221111111111112.content:
Star blinked her eyes open, squinting displeasedly into the ray of sun that had dared disturb her slumber. Once the implications of the sunbeam worked their way into her exhausted brain, though, she leaped up, ready to spring into feeding mode once again...

...only to realize that the girls were already awake, and surprisingly not screaming for more. Rather, it seemed she had interrupted some sisterly conversation. Thoroughly embarrassed, Star cleared her throat and smoothed her hair. "Sorry, I...er...what do you two want for breakfast today?" "I want bacon and eggs!" shouted Becky. Mary rolled her eyes at her smaller sister. "That's fine with me, if we have any," she said. Star smiled and headed for the kitchen, making up five platefuls for Mary and three for Becky. Despite the fact that they didn't seem nearly as ravenous as the day before, they had clearly gained quite a lot of weight from their stuffing- Mary's belly, though once again flabby, hung down much further than it had before, swaying gently about halfway down the couch. Becky had gained as well, her own mound of stomach flab resting like a moderately deflated beach ball between her flabby thighs. As Star was setting down the plates, she overheard their conversation- and she could tell there was more work in store for her.

"...and I definitely want to do something exciting today," said Mary, scratching her swollen side idly. "I've been feeling kind of cooped up, you know?" "Sure, sis, rub it in, you're SOO fat, blah blah," said Becky snarkily, wolfing down an egg. "No, I didn't mean it like that," replied Mary. "I just haven't done anything, you know? Sometimes I envy you a little." In response, Becky poked her sister's flabby foot with a fork. "Whatever... But I do know what you mean. We should go and do something today!" Star rolled her eyes. Though Becky was still mobile, she wasn't really mobile- getting around the house and going for a walk were not at all the same thing. And she hadn't even asked first! Star would of course say yes, but the principle of the thing... She sighed. Mary, oblivious, went on. "Where should we even go? There's not much to do around here, that's for sure." "Hmm," said Becky, chewing thoughtfully on a chunk of bacon, "we could..."
121221111111111112.title: What do they want to do today?

choices: ...of course! We want to come too!"
1212211111111111121.content:
“...swimming! We haven’t done that in ages!” shouted Becky, enthusiastically pumping a flabby arm. Mary bit thoughtfully into an egg, spilling yolk all over her fat face and double chin. “Shoundsh good to me… let’sh go!” It didn’t sound good to Star, however- the last time the kids had gone swimming was two years ago, when Mary was a comparatively svelte 302 pounds and Becky a downright skinny 91. Back then they were both comparatively mobile, but now… Becky probably couldn’t float, and Star wasn’t sure that Mary could hold it in long enough to even get into the pool. They’d long ago cut a hole in the couch to deal with Mary, and she’d become quite used to it. Away from that, who knows what would happen? She wasn’t about to convince them otherwise, so she wearily trudged up to Cassandra’s room to suggest the idea.

When she arrived, Dan was eagerly spooning far oversweetened oatmeal into Cassandra’s mouth. He wasn’t very good at it, though, so oatmeal was getting everywhere but Cassandra’s actual mouth. They didn’t notice Star until she knocked on the doorframe, startling Dan out of his wits and causing him to spill oatmeal all over Cassandra’s voluminous belly. It was all she could to not laugh hysterically. “Erm… The girls seem to want to go out today.” “Oh good!” cried Cassandra, all smiles. “Where to?” “Well, ma’am, they said they wanted to go swimming.” “Swimming?” asked Cassandra. "Well..."
1212211111111111121.title: ...go to the pool!

choices: Nothing fits- the sisters will have to go au naturale.
12122111111111111212.content:
"...I'm a bit worried, will you be able to get them around without help? They haven't been out for so long, I doubt their wheelchairs will fit them anymore. And do we even have swimsuits? Or any clothes big enough? I know I won't fit, so don't even try to get me out," mused Cassandra, nuzzling Dan's second chin towards the end. Star pondered this. Mary had just busted one of her largest shirts, and Becky had been refusing clothes for a while, so she wasn't entirely sure. Plus, she would have to lug the wheelchairs out of the basement, and test them, and fit them, and all sorts of things... She may need help, after all. But she could get started on the clothes, couldn't she? Thus resolved, she took her leave of Cassandra and headed to the sister's rooms to find clothes.

First stop was Becky's, which was rather a mess. As Becky did a lot of eating in bed, most of her cartons, bags, and other food containers ended up on the floor, on top of old coloring books and anything else that ended up down there when Becky was bored with it. Star tried to keep it clean, but since Becky was also often asleep she didn't have much of a chance to do so. Seeing as she was downstairs, though, she may give it a shot someday. Not now, though- she had a mission.

A quick raid of the dresser revealed a lot of stale chips and not much else. Star rolled her eyes- clearly Becky had decided clothes to be an unnecessary distraction on her road to bigness. However, Mary was sure to have something that fit...

Mary's room, by contrast, was incredibly dusty- since she had long before relocated permanently to the couch, her room had fallen into disuse. Just stepping on the floor blew up a mildly offensive cloud of dust, and opening the dresser made Star sneeze. Here, though, she hit the jackpot- stretchy pants, enormous shirts, and even several selections of swimsuits. Gleefully, Star grabbed several sets of clothes and headed to the living room.
12122111111111111212.title: ...I'm a little concerned..."

choices: She plays it safe and reports this problem to the hefty matriarch.
She throws caution to the winds and takes the girls to the swimming pool.
121221111111111112122.content: Star was dumbfounded. Despite being large enough to serve as a tent, not one item of Mary's old clothes fit on either of the two girls. The two sisters watched and ate amusedly as stretchy top after stretchy top utterly failed to contain any part of their rapidly swelling bodies. Pants, too, ripped to shreds almost as soon as they touched the girl's rolls of flab. These wardrobe malfunctions were more likely due to the fact that the clothes hadn't been worn in years rather than the size of the girls (although that was definitely a factor) but nontheless, after an hour of trying on clothes, the girls were surrounded by shredded scraps of fabric- and absolutely nothing to wear. This was not so much a problem in transit, as bedsheets can serve as quite the toga, but one cannot swim in a bedsheet- and swimming was what they needed to do. So, leaving the girls with several bags of chips to nosh on, Star was faced with rather a crossroads- Should I report in to Cassandra, or do I just take them anyway? She really wanted the girls to be happy, but she also didn't want to lose her job- and Cassandra wielded all that power.
121221111111111112122.title: Nothing fits- the sisters will have to go au na...

choices: "Of course- who cares? I'll call the pool and let them know."
"Are you crazy? Of course not- go buy them clothes or something first."
1212211111111111121221.content:
Star, for the second time that day, trudged wearily up the stairs to Cassandra's room. She feared that, now that she had already been bothered once, the enormous woman would not like to be bothered again- and that, if she was too annoyed, she would fire Star before anybody could mount a defense. Nevertheless, she trudged onward, worried still more that, if she did not ask for permission to take the girls out, she could be a lot more than fired. Put in jail for kidnapping, even. And, if she didn't listen to the girls and they made a fuss, she could still be fired, even after years of service. So, trapped between a rock, a hard place, and several soft bellies, Star reluctantly knocked three times on the matriarch's door.

The answer was a long time coming, but finally, "Star, is that you again?"

"Yes," said Star, eliciting a long sigh from the other side of the door.

"Fine, come in, but be quick about it," Cassandra said, her voice muffled somewhat by the door.

Star hurriedly opened the door. "I'm very sorry ma'am, but the girls-" She stopped sort, somewhat startled by the sight.

Cassandra was fully nude, and Dan shirtless. The latter was currently in the process of feeding the former a banana. "What?" asked Cassandra, somewhat irritated. "You've walked in on much worse than this."

Star gulped, still rather startled. "Yes, well- anyway, the girls still want to go swimming-"

"Cake and ice cream," said Isabelle loudly, "and lots of it! After that accident, I'm feeling pretty hungry!"

But, as Isabelle tore greedily into her food, Adam's own plate lay untouched on his lap. He could not stop thinking about that strange yellow liquid. He was a scientifically-minded kid- always had been- but, for the life of him, he could not fathom how a simple liquid could keep two impossibly obese people mobile. He'd never thought about it before, but there should really be no way that Isabelle could move at all- he'd seen people much smaller than her in mobility scooters at Wal-Mart. Adam blushed even redder. "Oh, I don't know..."

Isabelle punched him lightly in the arm with one flabby fist. "Whatever, Mr. Don't-Know. I'm gonna try and do it no matter what, and if you don't want to help..."

"Oh, I do, I do!" Adam yelped.

"Good," grinned Isabelle. "Then..."

"Hey Bruce what desserts do we have left" asked Isabel.

"We have apple pie, blueberry pie and cherry pie madam" said Bruce.

"I would like to have 2 slices of each of them please" said Isabel.

"Very well madam" said Bruce.

When the pies came Isabel wasted no time devouring them and after she was done she sit back and rubbed her big belly.

She then went upstairs and took a bath with some help from the maids do to her large size and after that she went to bed.
121322212222.title: "I'm going to be late for dinner"

1213222122221.content:
The sun was shining, the birds were singing and Isabel was waking up from a good nights sleep. She made her way downstairs to the dining room where she saw her parents eating breakfast which was full of eggs both scrambled and fried, pancakes, waffles, french toast, ham and sausages. Naturally Isabel went for the pancakes and waffles since she could drape them in mapple syrup and because she liked sweet things. As Isabel was eating her breakfast her father John got up from the table as he had just finished his.

"Well another day another dollar, have a nice day honey" said John as he kissed his wife and made his way to his daughter " bye sweetheart have a good day at school".

"Thanks daddy" said Isabel after her father kissed her on the cheek.

Today was the first day of school and Isabel was excited. While most children hated school Isabel liked it because she's the smartest one in her class getting straight A's and she would see her friends and hang out with them.

After breakfast Isabel went to her room and started to get dressed with help from the maids do too her large size. She put on a green sleeveless shirt, blue shorts, red socks, brown shoes and put on a my little pony backpack and was about to make her way out the front door before her mom Catherine stopped her.

"Hold on young lady let's make sure you got everything you need before you go out this mansion" said Catherine "do you have your books with you"?

"Check" said Isabel.

"Do you have pens, pencils and papers?"

"Check"

"Your gym clothes?"

"Check"

"Did you drink your potion?"

"Oh right I almost forgot" said Isabel as she drank up.

"Alright then you're good to go, have a nice day sweetheart" said Catherine as she kissed Isabel on the cheek.

Isabel then got in the limousine which was driven by the butler Bruce.
1213222122221.title: Breakfast

12132221222211.content:
Bruce parked the limousine in front of the school and opened the door for Isabel.

"I shall be parked here in this very spot when the schoolday is over madam" said Bruce as he helped Isabel out of the limo.

"Okay, see you later Bruce" said Isabel.

As she was walking to school Isabel looked around and saw the typical cliches of the first day of school, like the children being miserable, one kid pretending to be sick and the parent not buying it etc, etc.

Isabel kept on walking until she heard somebody yelled " Hey Isabel" she turned around and saw.
12132221222211.title: They drive straight to school

121322212222112.content:
She turned around and saw that it was her other friends, Cindy who is caucasian and wore glasses and is pretty chubby although she's a stick compared to Isabel. Jasmine who is african american and is pretty athletic. Lucy who is half asian and half caucasian and is considered the know-it-all of the group. And finally Selma who is latino and the fashion expert. They have all been friends since kindergarten even after Isabel had her syndrome that made her fatter they still remained friends. Although last summer they didn't spend any time together because all of them spent their summer elsewhere. Cindy and her family went up north to spend time with her grandparents. Jasmine went to a summer camp. Lucy and her family went to Florida. Selma and her family went to New York. They did however kept in touch with each other with email and skype where they would tell each other about interesting things that happened to them and Isabel would tell them about Adam.

"Oh my gosh it's been so long, I missed you guys" said Isabel as she went over to hug them.

"Yeah we missed you too Isabel" said Cindy.

"I can tell that I've been gone too long if that's what you wear on the first day of school" said Selma being the fashion critic as usual.

"Really? That's what you say too her after not seeing her all summer long?" said Lucy.

"I'm just saying is all" said Selma.

"Anyway here" said Lucy as she handed some sweets too Isabel " I thought you might like some before class".

"Thanks Lucy" said Isabel as she started eating the sweets.

"So Isabel you excited for school or more excited to see your boyfriend" said Jasmine as said the boyfriend part in a teasing manner.

Isabel blushed upon hearing " H-H-He isn't my boyfriend. He's a friend that just happens to be a boy".

"Alright alright I'm just saying from what you told us from the emails you two were getting pretty clo- oh no" said Jasmine as she spotted the school bully heading their way.
121322212222112.title: Her other friends

1213222122221122.content:
Isabel turned to were Jasmine was looking and saw everyone's worst nightmare when coming to school, Glory who just so happen to be Jasmine's twin sister (yeah yeah I'm doing the evil twin cliche I know). Like Jasmine Glory was pretty athletic and kind of muscled. But that was pretty much all they had in common, while Jasmine was nice Glory was mean and took pleasure in insulting others that she considered to be ugly, fat and unpopular and unfortunately Isabel fell into that category for her.

"Ugh, and here I was hoping you died so I would never see you again what rotten luck " said Glory as she looked at Isabel in pure contempt.

"Hey that's not nice, why do you always have to be so mean to Isabel?" asked Cindy.

"Oh I'm so sorry for insulting your precious Isabel" said Glory in a mocking manner "I promise I'll never insult her again mr monster, oh wait your a girl who's just as ugly as a monster".

Cindy began to tear up after hearing that.

"Beat it Glory before I make you" said Jasmine now mad.

"Fine I got better things to do" said Glory as she walked away.

Isabel was comforting Cindy and even shared some of her sweets with her.

"It's hard to believe that you two are related" said Selma as she was also comforting Cindy

"Yeah I know. You okay Cindy?" asked Jasmine.

"Sniff yeah I think so" said Cindy as she was wiping her tears.

"We should check to see what our first class is" said Lucy.

They all checked their schedule to see that their first class is.
1213222122221122.title: Glory (a girl)

12132221222211221.content:
Isabel groaned when she saw that the first class would be gym. Isabel loved school but the one class she didn't like was gym, while the potions she takes every morning helped her move around easier that didn't stop her belly from slowing her down and accidentally knocking down students with it.

Isabel then made her to the locker room to change into her gym clothes with a little help from Jasmine. When she was done she then sat on the floor with the other students waiting for the gym teacher. And Isabel just now noticed that she hasn't seen Adam all morning and was worried that he was sick or something.

Then the gym teacher Mr Thomas entered the gym. He was a man in his late forties who was still in pretty good shape. But unlike those stereotypical gym teachers on tv who are mean to their students, Mr Thomas was actually a pretty nice guy.

"Morning kids" said Mr Thomas.

"Good morning Mr Thomas" said the students.

"I hope you all had a good summer vacation because for-" said Mr Thomas as he was interrupted by someone opening the doors.

It was Adam who looked like he ran all the way to school.

"I'm sorry that I'm late Mr Thomas, my alarm clock was off so I woke up late" said Adam.

"Well I'll excuse you for today since it's the first day of school. But don't ever be late to gym class again, got it" said Mr Thomas.

"Yes sir" said Adam as he went to sit next to Isabel who was gesturing him to sit next to her.

"So as I was saying I hope you all had a good summer vacation because for the entire school year I'll be whopping you all into shape. Now for today we'll start out on the basics with jumping jacks, sit ups, push ups and all that other fun stuff" said Mr Thomas as he took out a piece of paper. "Now I've made a list of who going to be your exercise partner and no you can't switch. So Isabel you'll be partners with..."
12132221222211221.title: Gym

121322212222112211.content:
Adam was glad that he was paired up with Isabel while Isabel was glad she wasn't paired up with Glory and soon after all the students were paired up and were getting cushioning mats for themselves.

"Okay kids this is how its going to work. One of you will do the exercise of my choosing for 30 seconds while your partner counts, when those 30 seconds are up you'll switch with your partner and at the end of the workout I'll have a surprise for you. Any questions?" said Mr Thomas. All the students said no. "Alright then let's start with some jumping jacks. Ready go!".

All the students started doing jumping jacks and were doing pretty well except for Isabel who's feet were barely off the ground. While Adam just watched and felt sorry for her since it was obvious how difficult it is for her. While her potion helps her 500 lbs body move around easier it didn't mean that she didn't feel the weight of it.

"Alright 30 seconds are up now switch with your partner" said Mr Thomas.

It was Adam's turn and he was doing better then Isabel.

"Okay now we're going to do sit ups" said Mr Thomas.

Half the kids laid down on their mats with their partners holding down their feet and all started sitting up and Isabel tried to follow suit. However the moment she got her shoulders off the ground her big belly prevented her going any higher, and quickly her completely unused stomach muscles were screaming in pain. She fell back on the mat, and watched as practically everyone else managed to do at least one or two. After the switch Adam was once again doing better then Isabel.

"Okay now we're going to do push ups" said Mr Thomas.

Everybody got into push up positions and Isabel tried followed the rest of the class, but her stomach practically scraped the floor even before she bent her arms! Red in the face, she tried to pull her shirt down to prevent her belly hanging out, but it sprang back up again.Determined to succeed at least once, she resumed the position and tried to do a press-up, but the moment her arms bent they collapsed under her considerable weight and she fell onto her stomach, knocking the wind out of herself. By the time she'd got her breath back, everyone else had done at least four and Mr Thomas had given the order to pack away the mats.

"Alright everyone most of you did pretty well and most need improvement. And with 20 minutes left in class it's time for my surprise" said Mr Thomas.

And his surprise was.
121322212222112211.title: Adam

choices: It hurt so much that she was crying
1213222122221122112.content:
All the children cheered as dodgeball was their favourite game. Except for Isabel she absolutely hated dodgeball because she was always the first one to get hit because of how huge she is and it would hurt a lot. The teams have been chosen and Mr Thomas gave the order to start the game and Isabel saw a ball coming for her and closed her eyes waiting for impact. But when she opened them she saw Adam who had catch the ball.

"Don't worry Isabel just stick with me and protect you from the balls" said Adam as he threw the ball back to whoever threw it.

Isabel was happy that she had a good friend like Adam. After a dozen minutes and only 5 minutes left of gym class Isabel though that she might actually not be hit.

WHAM all of a sudden she was hit directly in the face by a ball that was thrown by Glory. Mr Thomas came to check if she was alright.
1213222122221122112.title: Dodgeball

12132221222211221122.content:
Tears were dripping from Isabel's face because it hurts so much. Mr Thomas took an ice pack and put it on Isabel's face to numb the pain while Glory just watched and smile. Mr Thomas then asked who threw the ball. But while most of the students saw Glory throw the ball nobody dared to snitch on her out of fear of being beaten up by her. That is until Adam spoke up and said he saw Glory throw the ball at Isabel's face.

"Glory, you and me are going to have a talk after class" said Mr Thomas.

"Oh come on, I didn't even throw the ball that hard she's just being a baby" said Glory.

But Mr Thomas didn't care what excuse she gave and pointed his finger to his office. Glory turned to look at Adam she points a single condemning stubby finger at him and pounds a fist into her hand, silently saying “Your dead meat…” before going to Mr Thomas's office. Adam felt an evil shiver up his spine as she walked away. After all the students changed back to their regular clothes Adam went to see if Isabel was alright.

"Are you okay Isabel?" asked Adam.

"Yeah I think I am" said Isabel wiping a tear.

"Why does Glory have to be so mean?" said Adam.

"I don't know, she's been like that ever since I first met her. But luckily I had you at gym class" said Isabel as she hugged Adam making them both blush.

"So do you know If we have other classes together?" asked Adam.

"I don't know lets check" said Isabel as she and Adam look at their schedules too see that while they don't have the same classes other than gym.

"This stinks I really wanted to introduce you to my other friends" said Isabel unhappy that they didn't share more classes.

"Maybe you could introduce me to them during recess" said Adam.

"Sounds good to me" said Isabel.

With that said they parted ways until they could meet each other at recess.
12132221222211221122.title: It hurt so much that she was crying

121322212222112211222.content:
The bell rung to signify the beginning of recess and the children made their way outside to the school playground which has a jungle gym, seesaws, a swing set and a basketball court. Isabel and her friends were coming out of math and also made their way outside.

"Ugh I can't believe that Mrs. Bellum is going to give us a math test on the first week of school" said Cindy

"You think that's bad, try doing any exercise with all of this" said Isabel as she patted her belly for emphasis.

"Exercise I can do no problem but I'm horrible at math" said Jasmine.

"Me too" said Selma.

"I got an idea, after school we could go to my place to study" said Lucy.

"Sounds good to me" said Jasmine and all the other girls agreed.

"So Isabel, are you going to introduce us to Adam" said Selma.

"Yeah I will, I can't wait for all of you to meet him. I'm know you'll all like him" said Isabel.

"I'm sure we will. So where is he?" asked Lucy.

The girls look around for Adam and they saw Adam.
121322212222112211222.title: Recess

12132222.content:
This time, I have an idea. How about we make the story about Jenny (Adam's first crush) and have her fattened up for reasons you can decide.

Jenny: age is same as Isabel, normal weight, she is known as the prettiest girl in school. Jenny is very social and has many friends. She's secretly a glutton but tries to hold it back until she cracks. Jenny will soon meet with Isabel and Adam.

So do you want to focus on Jenny, or do you still want to go for Isabel
12132222.title: Jenny's turn

choices: She cracked and ate so much of the food
Her mom called her for something
121322221.content:
We usually would open with a girl already fat. But this time, we will open at a girl whose thin but becoming fat. That person is Jenny, the prettiest girl in school and Adam's first crush. Even if Adam has a crush on Jenny, she happens to have her attention on another person whose name if Jeff. Luckily for Adam, he found a new crush which is the huge girl Isabel. But today, we follow Jenny.

We open at her house after school where her mom greeted her. "Hello Jenny, how was your day?" "It was great" Jenny answered. Her mom then told her "Good for you. I managed to get the groceries today and I got many things you find delicious." After hearing that, Jenny was saying nervously but calm enough for mom not to notice "Oh, that's great." If you want to know why Jenny is very nervous, it's because she has been kind of a glutton and has desires to eat a lot. Luckily she seems to keep in in control to keep her figure. But it's starting to get harder and harder.

Jenny then looked in the kitchen just to check the food and see her mom wasn't kidding. She could see all her favorite foods of cookies, chicken, and many other things. She was getting really into her urge to eat all those but keeping under control. But then....
121322221.title: Jenny

choices: She gets urges again and ate some more food

Jenny tried her best to hold it but her eating habit took over and decided to have some snacks. Although she was a big eater, she was being nice and have a little snack so she doesn't ruin her supper. When Jenny looked around the kitchen, she decided to go for the cookies and sat at the able to eat. Now like she promised to herself, she was going to have a little bit. But when she started eating, she ended up eating 6 of them. After her snack, she put the cookies back where they belonged and did her usual things she do before supper.

After a few hours, supper time has begun. Tonight, Jenny's family were serving hamburger stroganoff with mashed potatoes and gravy. Right now, dinner was going like usual. With the family talking about their day, and Jenny having a healthy serving for her. But then after she ate her plate, she got her hunger urges again with her insides saying "I need more Jenny, need more!". Like last time she tried to control it, but again, she gave in and started to have seconds that was bigger than her first. After finally eating her supper, Jenny was feeling rather satisfied with all that food she ate for some reason. But what Jenny didn't know was because her sudden eating habits, she was starting to get pretty pudgy. It wasn't visible enough for Jenny and her family to notice though, but she is gaining weight.

Back in her room after supper, she is starting thinking about what happened to her. "Oh my gosh, how is this happening? I had this feeling to eat before, but I had always took control of it. Now, I'm eating like a pig. Well at least I'm not getting fat." Jenny said not knowing she already was. But after a while....
1213222211.title: She cracked and ate so much of the food

It was Jenny's bedtime. So she was getting ready by brushing her teeth and putting her PJ's on. While Jenny got her clothes off, she noticed that she is looking pretty pudgy. "I'm pretty sure this will go away tomorrow." Jenny said trying to shake it off. So she got her PJ's on and went to bed.

During the night, Jenny was dreaming. She was dreaming of her being in the meadow with her friends. But when things were ok, giant food stuff were sprouting out and calling Jenny to eat them. Jenny was doing her best to get away from it, but she caved in and started to become ravenous and gobble up those food. While eating, she's getting bigger and bigger until she was obese. She could woke up from the nightmare but for some reason, a part of her was liking it and kept the dream going.

But then Jenny was woken up by her clock and was relieved to finally be out of that nightmare. "What's happening, I've become such a nice thin girl. But now, I'm suddenly wanting to eat a ton and become fat." Jenny wondered that her big eater personality is starting to take over.

Then in the morning...
12132222111.title: Skip to bedtime

121322221111.content:
Jenny has finished breakfast and was getting ready for school. She was relieved that she didn't have one of her urges that time, but she is still pretty chubby. After she put her clothes on, she took a look at her chubby self in her clothes. "I hope no one would notice my sudden fat." She said. Jenny then went to the car with her mother and drove off to school.

While in the car, Jenny was getting pretty nervous of what will happen at school. She was also wondering why she's not able to control her urges so well anymore.

They finally arrived at Jenny's school and was dropped off. She was still feeling nervous about everyone's reaction to her new weight, but they didn't seem to notice right now. But then, one of her friends Arisa shows up and went up to Jenny. When Arisa went closer to her, she...
121322221111.title: She was going to school

1213222211111.content:
Luckily, Arisa didn't noticed Jenny's chub. "Hey Jen" Arisa said "How're doing?" Jenny was pretty relieved Arisa didn't talk about her fat. "Well I've not been doing anything interesting. I was just finishing some homework and relaxing after that." Arisa then said "Well, it still looks like a good time, except for the home work part." Arisa was about to get in school but then stopped to tell her. "Oh yeah, I know you're pretty forgetful with your schedule sometimes, So I want you to remind you that we have a pool party this Saturday. Well, see ya later."

After hearing that, Jenny was starting to get nervous again, It was lucky of her that the students didn't notice her fat in her clothes. But having a pool party while being in her swim suit, they'll definitely notice. Jenny doesn't really need to worry about it now, but she needs to lose weight to get rid of her fat. Jenny was still thinking of something to do while going to her class, which is.....
1213222211111.title: Didn't noticed Jenny's fat

A boy she has a crush on talks to her
12132222111111.content:
Jenny was glad that her first class would be gym since it would mean that she could lose weight with the exercise. At gym everybody went outside to play soccer and although Jenny wasn't very good at it at least the running gave her enough exercise. After gym her next class would be history where she would learn about the American civil war.

After history the school bell rang to signified lunchtime. Jenny went to the cafeteria where she met Arisa and her other friend Christina who also didn't notice Jenny's chub. After they got their food from the counters with Jenny getting a slice of pepperoni pizza, an orange juice and chocolate pudding they sat at their usual spot when Jenny saw a huge girl with a lot of food on her tray sitting a few tables in front of them.

"Ugh look at all that food she's eating it's no wonder she's so fat" said Arisa with disgust.

Arisa shuddered at the thought of seeing the huge girl in a swimsuit.

"Yeah I don't think so. Anyway speaking of the pool party are you coming Christina?" asked Arisa.

"You bet I am" said Christina.

Arisa and Christina kept talking about the pool party like who else is going to be there, what swimsuit they're going to wear etc,etc for the remainder of lunch while Jenny just listen to them. When all of a sudden she got one of her urges.

"No no no no no not now" thought Jenny.

Jenny just sat there nervous because she did not wanted to show her glutinous ways to her friends especially after Arisa showed her disgust at the huge girl. She was begging for anything to distract her from her urges.

The rest of the school day went well and no one found out about Jenny getting fat. She felt great that she didn't have very noticeable fat, but how long will that be?

Jenny remembered how her urges got the best of her and made her fatter. If this keeps up, she'll be fat enough for everyone to notice. She had to fix her problem by first losing weight.

Jenny was thinking of what she can do to lose her fat. She was thinking of many things, but most of them won't get her slim in time. Jenny was thinking of asking her parents about her problem, but she was worried how they will feel about their daughter getting fat.

The rest of her day was pretty uneventful after lunch she had math and after math she had art class and in none of those classes did she have one of her urges. When the schoolday ended she said goodbye to her friends and got in the car with her mother.

"Hey Jenny how was your day at school?" asked Jenny's mom.

"Oh yeah. I almost forgot." Jenny said
"Well Jenny" her mom said "you did tell me that sometimes you seem to forget the schedule."

So when they got home, both of them settled for an hour. Then, they did a quick supper with Jenny eating as less as possible and got in the car to meet with Jenny's dad and grandma at the nursing home.

"oh hello" the large girl said

Isabel was thinking and said "Hey, I have an idea. How about you come to my house tomorrow after school and maybe you can do some exercises and swim in my pool. That could help you lose enough weight."

"Yep, and it wouldn't be for anything else" Jenny lied

So they arrived at Isabel's mansion and Jenny headed inside. When she got inside, Jenny found Isabel with some other boy. They were...
12132222111111121.title: "We're visiting your grandma at the nur...

choices: "If I jump in the pool with you"
"If you could help me in my lab for a few minutes"
121322221111111211.content:
Jenny saw Isabel in a black one piece swimsuit that really showed how huge she is, especially her big belly and standing right next to her was a skinny boy in swimming trunks. When Jenny approached them Isabel turned around to face.

"Hello Jenny glad you could make it, this is my friend Adam" said Isabel as she introduced Adam to Jenny.

"Hey Jenny you can probably recognize me" said Adam.

"I can?" asked Jenny.

"Don't you remember me? I use sit behind you during math class last year" said Adam a bit disappointed that Jenny didn't recognize him.

"Sorry can't say that I do. Hey Isabel do you have a place where I can change?" asked Jenny.

"Sure there's a bathroom at the end of the hallway" said Isabel.

Then Jenny went to the bathroom to change in her bikini and when she looked in the bathroom mirror she saw that she still has a little bit of pudge.

"Sight I hope I lose this in time for the pool party" she said to herself.

When she came to the backyard she saw both Isabel and Adam already in the pool.

"Come in the pool Jenny the water is great" said Adam.

Jenny was surprised that Adam didn't notice her pudge but then again he is friends with Isabel so her little pudge is nothing compared to her.

Jenny jumped in the pool and the three of them swam laps around the pool. After that they proceeded to play games like who can make the biggest splash (Isabel won), throwing objects in the pool and see who could fetch the most (Adam won) and who could hold their breath underwater the longest (Jenny won). Then they all got out of the pool and sat on some chairs except for Adam.

"Where are you going Adam?" asked Isabel.

"To the kitchen to get myself something to drink, do girls you want anything?" asked Adam.

"Yeah a soda please" said Isabel.

"No thanks I'm good" said Jenny.

And with that Adam went to the kitchen. While Adam was gone Jenny asked Isabel a question.

"Hey Isabel can I ask you something?" asked Jenny.

"Sure you can" said Isabel.

"Don't take this the wrong way but have you ever tried to lose weight or at least not eat a lot of food so you wouldn't gain so much weight?" asked Jenny hopping that that Isabel didn't find her question insulting.

"I can't said that I have" said Isabel not sounding the least bit insulted relieving Jenny. "Besides I don't have a choice in the matter".

"Huh? What do you mean you don't have a choice in the matter?" asked Jenny.

"You see I was born with a syndrome that makes me fatter, my mom is a scientist whose inventions help me with my mobility but it gets harder everyday. But on the bright side it gives me a strong immune system and I've never been sick a day in my life" said Isabel.

"Really? You have never been sick before?" asked Jenny.

"Nope never" said Isabel.

Adam then came back from the kitchen with an orange juice in a small glass and a 1 litre bottle of soda for Isabel. After Adam and Isabel were finished drinking they all decided to go back to the pool but before they could jump in they felt a little tremor and saw ripples on the water. They turned around to see that it was Isabel's mom Catherine. Jenny just could not believe the size of this woman who was big all over especially big belly.

"Hi mom" said Isabel.

"Hello Isabel I hope you and your friends don't mind..."
121322221111111211.title: Getting ready to swim

choices: Sweets: mostly cakes cookies and candies

"NO! GIVE IT TO ME!" :April shouted. But Anne ignored her. April screamed angrily and prepared to bury Anne under her massive belly.
Except when shetried to get up as she usually did, nothing happened, confused she tried again and again but she didn't lift her massive belly even a millimeter.
"Is somebody having trouble getting up?" Anne asked sheepishly. "No, you skinny bitch" April replied. She started rocking back and forth, except she couldn't even lean backwards as her overstuffed belly pinned her in place. Then Anne told April her worst nightmare: "April, you fat pig you've eaten yourself immobile you idiot."
"If you want to prove me wrong just get this cake" and with these words Anne lifted the cake just a few centimeters out of reach of April's arms. "Oh this is too easy", April said smugly and leaned forward only to be stopped by her gut. Now heavily irritated and infuriated after Anne burst into laughter April shouted: "I'M NOT IMMOBILE, YOU SKINNY BITCH, I'LL SQUASH YOUR SKINNY ASS AND EAT THAT CAKE WHILST SITTING ON TOP OF YOU!" Yet as if in doubt about herself, she braced herself, visibly gathering her strength and momentum(by rocking back and forth as little as she actually could).
You could see her muscles straining in preparation, building up energy, her face full of determination, and suudenly releasing all the built-up tension.

You could see her face turning red, her muscles straining even more. She grunted in made all kinds of noises and achieved...






... literally nothing her belly didn't move at all her hands got no millimeter closer to touching the cake.
"Oh, piggy ate herself immobile." Anne mocked and the others burst into laughter.

1213322222.title: Immobility

choices: Against all odds, someone manages to find their way to May's house.
Her parents decide, suddenly, to go someplace- and to take May along.
12133222221.content:
May had never seen the sun.

Sure, she knew of the sun- she saw it sometimes on television- but not once had she felt its warmth, its light, its energy. May had never heard the wind, nor felt the night, nor any thing we take for granted.

May's entire world was four gray walls.

In all her eight years, she had never once left the house, nor her room, nor, even, the bed that she now lay on. The only people she ever saw outside of television were her parents, the only things she ever did were watch television and read.

And, of course, eat. That was, after all, her only purpose.

From the very day of her birth May had been fed to bursting. May never learned the concepts of breakfast, lunch, or dinner; for her, every day was one long feast, every day a stuffing unmatched until the next. Her parents wanted her fat- they told her it was beautiful, desirable, wonderful- so she never learned to walk, nor crawl, nor anything for herself- not even the slightest control over her bowels. Her bed served as a toilet, a bookshelf, a shower, a dining table, and everything else one could ever need.

For May, unsurprisingly, was seven hundred pounds.

Her body flowed out around her, concealing whatever atrophied form she once had from any eyes. Her belly, massive, sweaty, multi-tiered, and impossibly pale, rolled out before her, pushing apart and past the legs she never used and just beginning to hang off the far end of her bed. Her parents, pleased with her progress, would sometimes tickle her here, teasing her, and promising her a special treat when it reached the floor. Her butt, too, was hanging off the sides, bending towards the floor under her cheeks' great weight. Above that, her back fat bulged, dividing into many sundry bulges and blobs. Around front, her breasts, mere bulges of fat, hung similarly, cresting over the sides of the great hump of her belly and dropping, as so much of her did, towards the floor. Her chins, three of them, nearly reached her chest. Her cheeks flew blobbily off her face. And, to crown her form, two perpetually open lips for her feeding tube, a squat, flabby nose for her oxygen tube, two dull brown eyes, often closed, and a head full of greasy brown hair.

May ate of her tube from dawn till dusk, interrupted only sometimes for tirades of solid food. She breathed from her oxygen tube, made necessary by her weak and pointless lungs. Sometimes, when she felt particularly daring, she would move one of her flabby arms, testing her limited capacity for life, waiting for the inevitable day when they, too, would lose their use and become, like the rest of her, useless nubs on a useless form.

More than anything, more than any possible thing in her world of four walls, May wished to speak.

She could, of course. Not very well, not for very long, but she could. Her parents would not talk to her; whenever she tried, they only said she was wasting energy and fed her even more. Sometimes, when she was left alone, she would, slowly and ponderously, raise one enormous arm to her tube and slide it out of her mouth. Then, gathering all her meager strength, she would speak at the air until she grew hungry again- which was never a very long time.

May hoped, someday, that someone would come to visit her, someone like on the television. Someone who would talk to her, hear her voice, and be her friend.

Unfortunately for her, her house was alone, stuck in the middle of the Arizona desert. Her parents had planned it explicitly so.

May, if she knew, would have cried.
12133222221.title: May

choices: They begin preparations to move out - with some trouble...

121332222211.content:
Not much of Amy's body functioned any more, her lifestyle crippling her in just about every measurable way. However, there was one faculty she still retained; hearing. The walls of her room were thin enough to let some noise through, and if the TV wasn't on too loud she could hear all sorts of things through the plasterboard. Her parents talking, the constant hum of the fridge, food sizzling under the grill, pipes gurgling.

One day though, there was a noise she'd never heard before - not in real life anyway. A doorbell! The shrill ring echoed around inside the house, jerking Amy out of a restless slumber. A few moments later there came an insistent knocking as well, as whoever was at the door grew tired of waiting. Amy waited with baited breath, wondering what new sound she'd experience next, and a second later heard her father's swift shoes in the hall, then the door swinging open.

"What? We're very busy, and don't like being disturbed," she heard her father's voice snap out. After that though, she heard another voice - the first one she'd ever experienced in real life besides her own and her parents.

"Mr Jensen?" It said, "I'm from the bank. You haven't been answering our calls. Or our letters. Or our emails..."
"As I just mentioned, me and my wife are extremely busy out here," her father said tersely, "What do you want?"
There was a brief rustling of papers, then the official spoke again.
"It's your house, Mr Jensen. It's being repossessed. Non-payment of mortgage, you see. We've been trying to get hold of you for months - it's damnably tricky to get out here..."
"Yes, well, that's the point." Amy's father sounded flustered for the first time since that day her oxygen pipe had blocked up and she'd gotten all sleepy. Amy wondered what was bothering him; what even was a 'repossessed'? She'd seen The Exorcist so she knew about possession, but it happening more than once seemed like beating a dead horse to her.
"How long do we have?" Amy's father asked.
"The standard 28 days. If you don't clear out in that time, we'll send in the bailiffs. I'm sorry we haven't been able to reach you until now - otherwise you could have contested this. Nothing that can be done now though. Thank you for your time, Mr Jensen"

Amy heard the door slam shut, then there was a long, long silence.
121332222211.title: Eviction

choices: Moving day arrives- can things go according to plan?
Something comes up! But is it helpful or a hindrance?
1213322222111.content:
They were going to move- there was no way around it. Pleas, entreaties, and offers of money did not do it- the bank needed the house, and the bank would have the house, by hook, crook, or even worse. There was no help or home left; the Jensens had to move.

There was just the small problem of their immovable daughter.

Every single thing about May's existence precluded her moving. For one thing, the most obvious thing, she never had moved; the very concept of motion was foreign to her. Of course, the myriad slew of logistical problems did not exactly help matters either. May, being immobile, was entirely dependent upon various machines; if they were to move, these machines would have to be disconnected. There would be no way for her to breathe easily, to eat, to use the restroom- all of these would have to be taken away. Beyond that, she was far too wide to leave through a normal door, but, as the house was soon to not be theirs, there was no way to smash the wall.

So, to sum up, this massively immobile, entirely helpless girl would have to be disconnected from life support, moved through a place she could not be moved through, and, provided she could fit into a moving truck, moved to someplace potentially very far away, all without the aforementioned life support.

Still, though, there was no way to stay...

And so, for days upon days, May's parents agonized, planned, made phone calls, shrieked, and planned some more, seemingly making both no progress and a lot of mess. To May, it seemed like nothing would be done.

And May so wanted something done.

Despite her inability to do anything, May had always desired for something more than her windowless room. The sun, the sky, other people- all these weighed heavily on her mind. Of course, there was no good way to do this, helpless as she was, but, as a good fat girl should, she wanted to have her cake and eat it, too.

Is that so much to ask?
