Stacey looked out the window, watching the scenery go by, as she continued trying to catch her breath from the short walk to the bus stop. Considering that she hadn't left her room almost all summer she had no idea how much work it would be to lug her larger frame around, but it would all be worth it if she could just get Conner back. Although at this size there was no doubt in her mind that Conner would come right back to her.

As she rode along fantasizing about what would happen when Conner saw her, she was brought back to reality by a loud growl emanating from her stomach as it began feeling like she was starving.

Grabbing her stomach with her stout arms, she felt her hands sinking into her soft belly to the point they almost disappeared. Frowning she realized how hungry she was, despite the massive breakfast she'd eaten before leaving. All summer she'd eaten almost non-stop except for when she was sleeping, and now that she was going back to school she couldn't do that anymore, and her belly was letting her know it wasn't happy.

She began to panic as she realized that lunch was about 4 hours away. How was she going to go that long without food? She needed to get something to eat or she'd starve.

Massaging her belly anxiously as her whole body jiggled with every move, she turned back to looking outside, wondering what she was going to do if she couldn't get food before lunch. She couldn't believe she'd changed over the summer break, and not just physically.

Before she really had too much time to think on what she would do, the school came into view through the window. It was a small brick building that had maybe a couple hundred students in a dozen or so classrooms. In front of the school several small groups of kids stood talking or playing while they waited for the bell to call them to class.

The bus let out a hiss as it came to a stop at the drop-off zone, and the other kids began moving towards the door, filing out slowly. Stacey grabbed her backpack and went to stand, freezing as a strange feeling hit her.

She tugged at her belly, feeling it wedged between the seat in front and hers. Her belly massage must have pushed it down farther between her spread legs, getting it stuck between the seats. Giving a few more tugs, she let her arms sag into her sides as she panted heavily from the brief exertion.

12211121.content:
Slowly Stacey's belly started coming free from its prison between the seats as her face turned red from the effort and sweat began to bead on her forehead. Suddenly, she fell back on the seat as her belly sprung loose causing it to groan loudly in protest as the bus shook under her weight.

Panting, she wiped her brow, and tugged her tent-like shirt back down over her massive belly. She took a few seconds to try to catch her breath before standing up. As she slowly waddled off the bus, the driver just looked at her in astonishment at how big she was.

She figured she'd just have to get used to people looking at her like that, since she now looked like a small boulder. Though she still found herself tugging at her shirt slightly as her face turned a light red.

Outside, she could here the other children talking and enjoying themselves, though many of them stopped and stared at the large girl waddling towards the school building. Many of them seemed to turn towards each other, whispering to each other as they continued to watch her.

She was aware of her body shaking with every labored step, as her own heavy breathing filled her ears. She had no idea that physical activity would be this hard, but a part of her was really enjoying the feeling of struggling to do even the simplest things.

"Is that you Stacey?" A tall girl said, as she easily fell in stride with Stacey.

"Hey Lisa," Stacey panted, "Have you lost weight?"

Lisa had always been a little on the chubby side, but it seemed that she'd grown a foot taller over the break, and a foot narrower. Stacey had always thought that she would be skinnier than Lisa until she'd started gaining over the break.

The blond haired girl blushed slightly as she looked down at the ground, "Yeah. I went on a diet all summer."

"That sucks." Stacey panted, looking at the final obstacle that faced her before she could enter the school. There was 10 stairs that led up to the front door, though they appeared more like a mountain to Stacey.

"It seems like you didn't have that problem," Lisa said, obviously staring at Stacey's round belly.

"Nope." Stacey said, happily patting her soft belly, as Lisa continued to watch it jiggle long after the light blows.

Taking a few breaths, Stacey slowly lifted one of her enormous legs up onto the first step, feeling tons of weight dragging her down. Already panting, she pulled her other leg up beside the first, and began working on getting to the second step. By the time she was halfway up the stairs, she realized there was a large crowd of other people gathering to watch her try to climb the stairs. She glanced over the crowd, wondering if Conner was among those watching.

She turned back towards the stairs, and continued her slow climb while Lisa tried to help her as much as she could. If Conner was in the crowd he would definitely be crawling back anytime now, Stacey thought to herself.

As she finally made it to the top of the stairs, the crowd at the bottom began to disperse, and she tried to see if Conner was among those watching.

"Hey Stacey! You've really gotten bigger," she heard a boy say behind her. She turned as quickly as she could, standing face to face with...

122332222.title: Move on!

choices: The good in Anastasia wins- she starts looking for friends for her fat daughter.
Laziness prevails- Anastasia does nothing, and Ella, as much as she can, rebels.
1223322221.content:
If one were to peruse the public record, they would find nothing out of the ordinary for Ella Grasime. They would find only that she was an 11-year old girl of Moldovan extraction, that her mother was named Anastasia, that she was homeschooled, and her hometown. They would not find that she had blonde hair or blue eyes, that she despises grapes, or that she was the fattest girl in the entire world.

From an early age, Anastasia had conspired to make Ella large. Not by force, of course: she had no desire to hurt her daughter, not by any means. But, given delicious food, a child will eat it, and the more delicious food is given, the more that will be eaten, often sooner rather than later. For that reason, Ella rocketed up from thin to chubby to obese to morbidly obese in a matter of a few years, and by age 4 had reached the whopping weight of 325 pounds. At that point, she had, one day, tried to retrieve another snack for herself from the cabinet and collapsed, wheezing, barely two feet from the couch. From that day forward, she never took another step, and now, seven years later, she weighed over 900 pounds and could not move or care for herself in the slightest. Anastasia, her mother and the sole person she ever saw, doted on her, to such an extreme that Ella, even at eleven, could not speak properly, only able to say single-word pronouncements usually consisting of "Hungry!"

For, at her size, she was constantly hungry. 900+ pounds would do that to a girl.

If one were to get a good look at Ella it would, at first, be difficult to tell one was looking at a human, let alone an 11-year-old girl. From a distance, she resembled little more than a large mound of vaguely pinkish jelly, wobbling gently with the multiple fans she needed to stay cool. Up close, though, one could truly appreciate what her extreme obesity had done to her.

Ella's belly was the most dominant part of her, a huge swell of fat that reached far beyond her legs and was almost poking off the edge of the king-sized bed where she spent her days. It covered quite a bit of her now-useless legs, which were themselves so swollen with fat that, despite the fact that they were spread wide to give room to her belly, still touched. At the end of each fat leg were two swollen feet, useless for nearly seven years. In the rear, her enormous butt spread out similarly to her belly, itself also almost hanging off the edges of the bed. Between its two formless cheeks snaked one of many tubes attached to her, this one to deal with her, as Anastasia politely called them in Romanian, "emisiile," or emissions. On top of her wide swell of belly sat two formless breasts, as yet untouched by puberty and yet still too large and unwieldy for any sort of conventional brassiere. Next to them her arms jutted out, so incredibly swollen with fat as to also be useless- she could not even feed herself. At the end of these were two chubby hands, which she could still wiggle- but barely, and doing so would leave her exhausted. Finally, her head, ringed with four chins and two fat cheeks that forced her eyes into a perpetual squint, two tubes snaking in to provide oxygen and food in between meals. Ella could still chew, but Anastasia thought that, too, may soon be going, seeing the number of chins attached to her enormous daughter. This was all Anastasia had wanted, naturally- a fat daughter- and for her to continue getting fatter, to 1000 pounds, then to 2000, and onward and upward and outward from there.

But, as often happens, there was a problem. Today, when Anastasia arrived with the first of Ella's many dinner carts and took out her feeding tube, her massive daughter said something different. Instead of her usual demanding burst of "Hungry!" she instead, with some confusion, wheezed out "Friends?"

Anastasia was so surprised she nearly dropped the tray she was holding. "F-Friends, Ella? What friends? What do you mean?"

For answer, Ella motioned slightly with one hand towards the television, sweat breaking out all over her body from the effort. "Want friends...like...TV. Go...out..." She was gasping for breath now, despite her oxygen, but she wasn't done. "See...world..." Anastasia, desperate to calm her daughter, lunged toward her mouth with a piece of steak, but still she wasn't finished. "Please..." Finally, with her message complete, Ella opened her mouth fully and allowed herself to be sated.

Later, after Ella had been good and thoroughly fed, Anastasia took a moment to consider what her enormous daughter had been talking about. "She wants...friends, huh? Well, I can understand why, but not how I'm supposed to get her some!" (Anastasia, alone in the house most of the day, frequently talked to herself.) "But, for Ella, anything is worth a try, right?" She turned to her computer, poised to start searching, but another thought occurred to her then. "Really, though, who cares? Ella won't be going anywhere without my help- why bother? Still, though, she is my daughter... and I do love her...right?"

1232.content:
A hot summer sun looms commandingly over a modest neighborhood in California. Despite the largly lower class hispanic population that made up this barrio, one house in particular stands out amongst the others; most notably the one with the pool and breathtakingly large AC unit installed on the roof. While these cooling fixtures were refreshing for most, to one member of the family it was almost necessary...

"Mami!" Maria Santiago bellows from her seated position on the couch, "Where's the ice cream?!"

"In the bottom of the freezer, mija." her mother answers quite sweetly, "Do you want me to get it for you?"

Her second-born, Gabriella, fought her older sister's overall girth for room; literally, she had to push against her sister's soft jiggly apron of flab so she could have even the slightest bit of comfort, lest be swallowed by it. "Mami!" the scrawny nine year old girl cried in desperation, "Don't you think she's already fat enough?!" she held her hands far past her own waify build, "Muchas Gordas!"

Maria Santiago was by far the biggest girl in the neighborhood at only the ripe young age of fifteen, nearly spherical at this point, which she liked to blame on a hyperlazy thyroid. In truth, her glandswere a little bit defective- but as her sisters would often remind her, having lazy thyroids is no reason to make a cerdo out of herself. With this excuse in mind, Maria had never exactly restrained herself in regards to her appetite- but since being confined to homeschooling due to lack of reinforced, double-wide desks she had been taking it to the extreme. Just last week at her quinceanera, she had polished off enough food to feed her family for a few days...

"Callate." Maria fanned her tripley-chinned face with her chubby hands, "I'm not going to eat it, I'm using it to cool down."

"By eating it?"

"Callate poco mocosa!!" Maria did her best to lunge over her own ponderous bulk in order to make a grab at her younger, much thinner sister but found that she was far too hot sweaty and tired to seriously go after Gabriella. "Mami!!"

"I'm coming, I'm coming bebita!" her mother calls from down the hall, "I was doing laundry!" Her mother, Florencia, was also quite the corpulant woman, though seemed much smaller than when juxtaposed to her daughter. "Ice cream, right?"

"Yeah." Maria pat her tummy eagerly, barely able to stop herself from salivating at the thought of filling her gigantic honey colored dome of a belly. Even though she kept telling herself that she would put behind her head, her stomach rumbled with it's strong arguement. Without skipping a beat, her mother happilly delivered a single-serving container of rocky road; making sure that it went behind Maria's neck instead of inside her stomach. "Gracias."

"So Mari when is Papi taking you out driving again?" her mother pat Maria's pudgy cheek as she enjoyed the cooling sensation that chilled the sweat trickling down her neck. "Never." Maria pouted, "you know I'm too big to fit in Papi's junker."

On cue, her mother went straight into defensive mode; "Silencio, mi princesa es muy flaca!" her spanish tounge was still fresh, rather than Maria who had been raised to be much more bilingual, "Mami, look at me!" the large hispanic girl jiggled her tummy, "Grande- Gorda- FAT!"

"Oh, mi angelita..." her mother still treated her like such a child, even though she was old enough to drive, "I know it's hard but... I know what'll cheer you up."

Maria's fat face lit up brightly, a look usually reserved for takeout night at home, "Really Mami?"

"Si-

1241.content:
Sharon's story is indeed a strange one.

It begins with a most unusual pregnancy. Her mother and father were very slender people. Not that they were health or fashion freaks- both had grown up in near starvation, and never acquired much of a normal appetite. Despite this, during the pregnancy, her mother suddenly couldn't eat enough. Food vanished down her seemingly endless stomach, only to be joined by impossible amounts more. But the strangest part is, she gained but 10 pounds during the pregnancy- only a few more than the child itself could explain. And the child wasn't even particularly large; in fact, she was on the small side, weighing only 6 and 1/2 pounds at birth.

After the birth, her mother lost her appetite and returned to normal eating habits. And so did Sharon, leaving no trace of her gluttonous beginnings. In high school however, Sharon decided it was time for a change. After eighth grade, she no longer wanted to follow the crowd- and she had the metabolism to defy them to an incredible degree. Over that summer, she gained over 100 pounds, and she wasn't satisfied with that. She didn't stop until reaching the weight of 500 pounds following the summer before her junior year, and at last she began to stop gaining. She settled at that weight because she still retained a remarkable degree of mobility up to that point, and didn't want to jeopardize it, as well as she no longer wanted to spend half of her free time eating- after all, this is high school.

The date is December 13th, a Monday. This is the last week before Christmas break, and barely a month after her seventeenth birthday.

Where does her true story begin?

What the hell was going on? Stacey pulled herself out of bed, and as if on cue, Vivian's husky voice yelled "Stacey! Get your scrawny ass in here!" from the dining room. (At least that made sense, of course the fat pig was in her favorite room in the house.)

Stacey staggered into the dining room, still shaking off the shroud of slumber, and was confronted by one of Vivian's standard arrays of disgustingly unhealthy foods: At least two trays of brownies, three boxes of toaster pastries, half of a chocolate cake, a bag of chips, and three unnecessarily large burgers from one of the greasy dives Vivian made herself a regular customer of before Stacey came along and solved that pesky "leaving-the-house" problem for her forever. But what surprised Stacey wasn't the vile array of food on the overburdened table (By an eyeball estimate, this was how much Vivian ate for dinner). No, it was the fact that Vivian was not actively tearing into it that caught Stacey off guard. In fact, where the hell was Vivian? She could have sworn that her voice was coming fr-

Vivian's fat, greasy hand clamped down on Stacey's shoulder, sending shivers down the smaller girl's spine. "Get your ass in that chair, and start eating," Vivian ordered. "Don't stop until you can't fit another scrap in your stomach." Vivian forcibly shoved Stacey into the chair in front of the table. "Call for me when you can't eat anything else." With that, Vivian waddled off into the living room, where she probably had a similar looking feast set up (Stacey wouldn't put it past the fat hog, anyway), leaving Stacey to her own devices.

Now that she knew it was for her, just looking at the absurd pile of food in front of her made her sick to her stomach. Dear God, she had to eat all of this? Reminding herself that not eating would get her kicked out of the apartment, Stacey fought down the rising nausea in her stomach and began working through the vile feast in front of her.

--

Vivian knew full and well that Stacey didn't have a chance in hell of eating all of that; that was more than Vivian ate in a meal (not by much, but the point still stands)! No, the real point of that feast was to test Stacey's capacity. The amount of food Stacey could cram into her stomach to begin with would determine how quickly her weight would increase. With that in mind, Vivian got started on the feast that she, indeed, had set up in the living room.

About 20 minutes later, as Vivian finished off her second obnoxiously large burger, she heard moans of pain from the dining room. "Guess Stacey hit her limit.", she said to nobody in particular. With no small effort, Vivian lifted her ponderous bulk out of her chair, noting with some satisfaction the groans the chair made as she shifted her weight. Panting for breath (It had been a while since the last time she had pulled herself out of a sitting position unassisted), Vivian waddled into the kitchen, beholding Stacey, still moaning in pain, trying desperately to process her meal. Stacey's stomach stuck out several inches further than the norm, but gravity had not yet begun to force her stomach downwards.

Vivian turned to look and see just how much of the feast was left, and felt...

1243322212.content:
Alexandra Summers walked up the steps of the gargantuan house before her. Taking a moment to make sure her attire was prim and proper, she reached out and pressed the doorbell, hearing it chime within.

Alex, as she generally was referred to, had answered a rather questionable ad in the paper. Posted by one John Smith, requesting a live-in caretaker/nurse, with discretion a must. They even went so far as to mention signing an NDA agreement.

It certainly seemed suspicious, and John Smith certainly sounded like a fake name. Regardless, Alex had called the provided number right away. The former nurse had been unemployed for the last 8 months, and her finances were getting rather tight. And even if it proved to be another dead-end, hopefully it'd be good for a laugh.

Well, she certainly didn't laugh when she heard what her wage would be. She'd arranged a face-to-face interview with John and his wife Sarah almost immediately. She was a little surprised when she met them, as they didn't look like axe murderers or drug dealers. They were awfully tight lipped about the full nature of the assignment, but the money was good, and even included a cash advance.

From what little they'd given her, she knew that the couple was looking for a caretaker for their daughter, Ashley. They seemed hesitant to go into too many details, but stated that she was bed-bound and incapable of moving on her own, and needed someone to do everything for her that she couldn't.

In a nutshell, everything.

Alex had tried to pry a little, but the Smith's were tight lipped regarding what medical condition had led their child to becoming immobile. She was a little leery about signing on without all the details (after all, what if Ashley required special care that she couldn't offer?), but the money was simply too good. Shaking both Mr. and Mrs. Smith's hands, she'd been hired that afternoon.

And now, here she was, at the Smith family home.

"Geez, this place is huge. I think their garage is bigger then my apartment," Alex thought as she waited by the door.

She didn't have too long to wait. The door opened, revealing a fairly short woman. She looked to be in her early twenties, though Alex knew she was actually in her early forties. Her platinum blonde hair was naturally wavy, and was long enough to reach the small of her back. She clearly spent a lot of time in the gym, giving her body a tight, fit look, and Alex could just make out the edges of a couple of tattoos hidden under her clothes.

However, her most impressive feature by far was her breasts. They were clearly fake, and given their bounce, Alex suspected silicon over saline. Her cup size had to at least be an F or a G, and with her tiny frame, they looked absolutely massive on her. Why she wanted her boobs to be that big would be a query for another time, as the woman looked up. Seeing who it was, she gave a smile that could have outshone the sun.

"Alex! Glad you found the place! Wasn't too much trouble, I hope." Sarah Smith welcomed their new caretaker in with a broad sweep of her arms. Despite her... shall we say, interesting appearance, Alex felt she'd have been hard pressed to say she'd ever met a kinder, more genuine person than Mrs. Smith. Her new boss just had a way of making you feel welcome and at ease.

"And other things for the boys, I suspect," Alex thought. "I'll bet every teenager for a hundred miles has more then a few fantasies involving her..."

"Just follow me to John's office," Sarah said, leading the way down the hall. She continued, "He's sorry he couldn't be here today. Something came up at work, and he had to head down right away."

Sarah turned into a fairly large room. Between the desk, the computer, the filing cabinets and the bookcases, this was clearly the office. Grabbing some paperwork that was already prepared and set on the desk, she quickly laid it out in three bundles. Passing her new caretaker a pen, she said, "Just initial there, and there, and sign and print there."

Alex quickly filled in the aforementioned spots, and Sarah signed and dated the document on the last sheet. "There! All done! I'm very glad to have you on-board."

"Glad to be here," Alex said. "Now that that's over and done with, can you tell me all the details about my charge?"

Sarah's normally bright face showed a slight grimace which Alex just managed to catch. "Honestly, it's probably easier if I just show you."

*** *** ***

"Now, do try not to stare too much. Ashley is used to me and her father, but she was pretty shy before her condition left her bed bound, and no one except us has set eyes on her since that day."

The two women were making their way down a long, wide hallway. Art work and plants decorated the large space at regular intervals, and the sound of their footsteps was masked by the lush red carpet throughout.

"What is the nature of her condition?"

Sarah Smith slowed her pace, and shortly after came to a halt. She took a deep breath then leaned back against a wall, arms crossed under her giga-bust. "Look, the truth is, my daughter is... big."

"Big?"

"Like, really big. Fat, I mean. Really, really, really fat." Sarah even went the extra mile with her hand gestures, just to try and indicate how big she truly is. "She was always on the bigger side. Just a chubby, cute little girl. But when the other kids started to outgrow their puppy fat, hers stuck around. Other kids would play at recess, and she'd go down to the cafeteria and score a free meal. Even at a young age, she'd ask for seconds with dinner, and always wanted desserts. Plural.

By the time she was ten, she could out-eat me.

By the time she was twelve, she could out-eat John.

She was already pretty fat by the time she hit Middle School, but once puberty kicked in, it was like a switch got flipped. Her appetite soared, and she was stuffing her face near constantly. Her weight sky rocketed.

We'd been concerned before, of course, but we tried to put it out of our minds. We didn't want to make Ashley self-conscious by making a big deal out of her weight, and we convinced ourselves that she'd drop it, or at least plateau, once puberty hit. When the opposite happened, well, we panicked.

We tried talking with her, reasoning with her, taking her to therapy sessions at an eating disorder clinic. When that failed, we tried to force her to diet and exercise, but she resisted. Buying and eating a 20 piece bucket of chicken after school, binging on burgers on the weekends, eating a couple pies at lunch.

No matter what we did, her problem only got worse and worse. Her classmates were merciless, though if anything, that only seemed to make her eat more. When she outgrew her third uniform in a month, she couldn't bear the thought of how they'd react to her getting so fat, so fast. And so, we dropped her out and started homeschooling her. That was probably a mistake.

Within six months, Ashley could barely walk, and within a year, she couldn't even stand up without help. And just before her 17th birthday, she got too heavy for anyone to move, and she's been bedridden ever since. That was just over two years ago."

Shocked, it took Alex a moment to take all that in. "Jesus."

"We got her on a maintenance diet now so she doesn't gain anymore. Or, you know, at least slower." Sarah rubbed the back of her neck. "I mean, we've never counted the calories to check. With how much she needs to eat in a day, it's hard to cut her off completely. We tried to limit her to a 2,000 calories per day diet, but it didn't work. Her belly was just so noisy, and my baby had tears flowing down her face from the pain of being so hungry, so we had to move back up at least some of the way."

Sarah once again began to make her way down the hall, and Alex followed suit. Sarah continued, "So that's where you come in. I'll be heading back to work soon, and my Ashley is far too fa-big! to do anything on her own. She'll need you to clean her, fetch things for her, bathe her, quite honestly everything. And she has a strict diet, though she's always hungry, so she'll probably try to convince you to give her extra. Obviously, don't give in; we're trying to get her to lose weight, not gain more."

The two finally came to an extra-wide wet of French doors. Sarah visibly swallowed at this point. "The rest of the details can wait until later. Now, if you would, please brace yourself Miss Summers. And do try not to stare."

Alex felt like a fish out of water, and could only nod. "Oh, Alexandra, what have you gotten yourself into this time..."

Her belly was a massive platform of flab upon which her upper body rested. Large rolls under her armpits gave her heavy arms a place to rest, and her tummy stretched out to her knees, giving her breasts the perfect platform to perch on. Her gut had been divided into three massive rolls when they moved in together, and Megan had watched those three rolls grow wider and wider, and eventually be joined by a fourth. The sheer expanse of her belly meant Isabella had to arrange her food to her left and right, since bending forward for something was right out. Her love handles and back rolls were absolutely huge, and they were constantly being squished and bent as Izzie leaned over to grab more handfuls of food, and transfer the now empty boxes to her garbage table.

For as big as her belly was, it was dwarfed by her lower half. Her ass was simply enormous, easily sticking out a couple feet or more, and wide enough that it still protruded past her belly's width by a good eight inches per side. When they moved in, her butt had easily covered two couch cushions. Now it nearly covered three, and it wouldn't be too much longer before Isabella would fill up an entire couch by herself.

Her thighs were bigger around then Megan's newly filled out waist by quite a margin. Her knees couldn't be anywhere near each other, and were more then half hidden by flab. Her calves started out enormous where they met the overfed Latino's knees, but thinned out as they ran down towards her feet. Her feet, like her hands, had gained little to no weight, and looked almost too small for such a fat woman.

There really was no other way to describe it. Isabella was not a big woman, nor was she a large woman. Rather, she was a hugely, unbelievably, massively FAT woman, and she was only getting fatter.

This is where Izzie's weight was really starting to become a factor. It was quite clear that she was having more and more trouble moving on her own. She was finding it difficult to rise from the couch after a particularly big stuffing without assistance, an event that was becoming more and more frequent. If Megan was around, Izzie would often ask her to grab her something from the kitchen or bring her takeout from the door, just to avoid having to get up herself. Her gigantic thighs and ass meant she could master at best a slow waddle. Her footsteps were slow and very, very heavy, and the short walk from the couch to her bedroom often required multiple rest breaks, and left her panting like she'd ran a marathon. Her increased size also meant that, despite Izzie's natural neatness and willingness to help around the house, she found even doing the most basic of chores nearly impossible. It was nothing short of a herculean effort that she managed to stay caught up on her garbage, though again, Megan was having to help out more and more with that. Megan was really starting to worry her friend was going to become immobile.

There was also the damages to the furniture to consider. Isabella had already crushed one couch under her gargantuan tush, and as there was some rather alarming creaking noises coming from this one, there'd be another soon to follow. She'd already been blacklisted from the dining room, having destroyed three of their chairs, two of them while sitting on both simultaneously. Her bed was the most recent victim of this plump princess, collapsing under her as she laid down for bed last week. As the two roomies split the cost of all damages, all of this had put additional strain on Megan's finances, which were already suffering from having to re-buy her wardrobe three times so far this year.

And that was another cause for concern. Megan's own weight was beginning to climb, slowly at first, but rapidly gaining speed. Some quick math showed she was currently gaining three pounds a week, which was rather alarming. Her appetite was also growing. Where before she'd eat her three squares a day and be good, now she often found herself hitting up the vending machines between classes. Also, she was more and more often going back for seconds. Izzie's eating habits seemed to be rubbing off, and she didn't like it. And if Izzie wound up immobile, and Megan became her caretaker (she was a nursing student, after all), odds were distressingly good that eventually Megan would join her in Eternal Flab-dom.

Then, there was the final problem. Namely, Megan liked watching her eat. Like, a lot. She had spent a lot of time pushing such thoughts to the side, but watching Izzie stuff herself to the brim, seeing her dimpled smile as her jiggling fat grew bigger each day, hearing her coo as she bit into something particularly delectable, knowing each day was the skinniest she'd ever be again...

Yeah, Megan was really starting to worry about herself.

She'd caved into these urges on occasion, buying a large cake for Izzie while on her way back from class a couple of times. She was also an avid baker, and had often prepared home made goods for her growing friend. Granted, some of this had always wound up on Megan's waistline, as Izzie insisted on sharing, but the young Latino had easily eaten the lion's share, sometimes right off of Megan's own fork. Megan was ashamed at how much her friend's worsening physical condition turned her on, and the things she'd done because of that. She was training to be a nurse, she was supposed to help people! Not make them fatter for her own pleasure!

A decidedly unladylike burp came from Isabella. Giggling, she grabbed another slice of pizza, bringing her total to three finished pizzas in a sitting. Megan knew something had to happen, and soon.
1243322221.title: Isabella in America

12433222211.content:
Megan felt like she didn't have much of a choice. She had to confront Izzie about her burgeoning weight, and soon, before the girl turned into a living ball of immobile fat. Assuming I'm not already too late, Megan thought, watching as Izzie ate her final slice of pizza in two massive bites.

Their apartment was an open concept loft, with only the bedrooms and bathrooms behind closed doors. The wide open spaces afforded a great deal of movement room for her gargantuan room mate. Megan wondered if that had been the primary reason Izzie liked this apartment best out of all the ones they'd looked at. Megan had been washing dishes in the kitchen, keeping an eye on her room mate's trembling form from afar. Putting the dish towel over her shoulder, she made her way over to their sitting area.

Megan was currently wearing a yellow sun dress, which had been a few sizes too big when she got it due to a shipping error. This had turned out to be a lucky break, as it was one of the few things in Megan's wardrobe that she could still squeeze her larger form into. Even with the short walk to Isabella's throne, she was uncomfortably aware of how much more her body was moving compared to a few months ago, each shuddering step sending ripples through her newly fattened frame. Her belly was protruding just past her bust, and she knew if she took her dress off, it would be divided into two rolls, even while standing up. Her bust had taken their fair share of fat as well, bringing her up to a DD cup size. While the size increase was nice (there had to be some benefit to getting fat, after all), her breasts had started to sag under their growing weight, leaving Megan relying on her bras to give her the perky bust line she wanted. The rest of her body hadn't kept up with those two, but she was still aware of a layer of softness under her skin, moving slightly with each step.

Megan couldn't believe she'd outgrown another set of clothes. She'd only purchased them two weeks ago! How fat was she getting!? Megan dreaded the thought of having to buy new clothes again; she wasn't sure how many more times her wallet could take the hit. A treacherous voice in the back of her mind said, you know, if you just bought stretchy clothes, and a size or two above you, then you could wear them for longer. Megan silenced that thought almost as soon as she had it. If that was the way she decided to approach this, then she might as well give up and join Izzie on the couch.

******

Isabella, meanwhile, was happy as a pig in mud.

Her pizzas had been extra tasty today (stuffed crust was a really good call), and she rubbed her belly with her clean hand while licking the grease off the fingers of her other hand, cooing all the while. Though she had no hope of seeing her hand past her enormous boobs, she could feel how small it was on her belly. She stuck her hand between two rolls, feeling her burgeoning flesh cover it completely. She lifted the roll, feeling just how heavy it was, certain that it felt even heavier then yesterday. She felt her way down her belly, counting her rolls, smiling at the fourth roll that was forming just underneath her boobs. What had started as a small fold under her bust when she and Megan moved in was now nearly two inches around, and very soon would be too big for her hand to grab in its entirety, just like the rest of her belly rolls.

Izzie smiled, and she brought both her hands under the second roll from the top. Again, her hands were completely hidden under what felt like a platter of fat, and it took more effort then she would have given it credit for to move the trembling flesh. Lifting it as high as she could (which really wasn't all that high), she dropped it, watching the jiggling ripples flow through her enormously fattened frame. The young woman giggled, a light, airy sound like the tinkling of a bell.

Izzie leaned to the left, squishing her lardy rolls even further as she grabbed the empty pizza box. Leaning to the right to add it to her garbage table, her right sides' opulent deposits of fat were given the same treatment. The couch creaked under Isabella's shifting bulk, though she barely made notice of it. She had more important things on her plate.

Namely a large bucket of double deep fried chicken. Now, for most of us, the sheer quantity of food Isabella was putting away would be unthinkable. One of those extra large pizzas was meant to feed a small family, and she'd just spotted off three. Isabella, however, was not most of us. She seemed completely immune to getting full, only growing slightly less hungry as she stuffed her cavernous maw. And the chicken smelled so good. The rumbling in her stomach sealed the deal.

Isabella leaned over to grab her bucket of chicken, and promptly encountered a rather sizable problem; namely, herself. You see, when Izzie had arranged her table of food, she'd put the pizzas closest towards her on the couch, and the chicken on the other side, away from her seat. Now, she'd been doing this for quite some time, as her considerable girth would attest to, but she hadn't been taking into consideration just how BIG she was getting. As her hips and booty grew and grew, she found herself moving more towards the center of the couch. Also, her belly and back rolls had been steadily getting thicker and protruded further each day. The underside of her arms had developed massive rolls of their own, while her upper arms had piled on a significant amount of fat as well, and were now bigger then her head.

All this taken together, combined with weeks of ignoring how she could just barely reach the chicken bucket with her finger tips, meant only one thing: Isabella was actually too fat to reach her food.

Her belly let out an irritated growl at this unforeseen delay. Isabella REALLY wanted to eat her bucket of chicken, but a few more attempts made it clear she wasn't going to get it from a sitting position. She let out a small "hmmph" in the back of her throat. She really did not want to have to stand up to get her food, as it was such a labor intensive and time consuming task. Her growling belly, however, made any alternative where she wasn't eating the chicken completely unthinkable. Just as she was beginning to start the process of standing up, Izzie spied her friend and room mate Megan coming over.

Megan's gain was fairly obvious to Izzie, her belly and bust jiggling considerably as she walked. She'd outgrown her clothes a couple time at least, and Izzie wondered why Megan hadn't bought anything with some stretch to it. Her BFF's appetite had certainly increased dramatically since they'd moved in together. The girl that had once been satisfied with one single patty burger for supper now needed two doubles and some fries to accomplish the same. She was also baking all the time, and Izzie would watch as Megan would taste sample after sample, essentially needing to make two cakes instead of one due to all the taste tests she did.

If she's going to eat like that, she really should just accept the fact that she's going to get fat, Isabella thought, totally aware of the irony of someone her size calling someone else "fat."

Still, her timing couldn't have been more perfect. Smiling, she said, "Hey Meg! Want to watch a movie and order Chinese? It'll be my treat! Also, could I get you to pass me my chicken? I can't quite reach it from here."

******

Megan looked Isabella over as the dark haired woman offered plans for tonight. If anything, she looked even bigger this close. Her shuddering layers of lard sprawled across one another, and her ass, for lack of a better term, oozed over the couch, leaving it almost completely covered by the young woman's veritable sea of flesh. Her bust jiggled slightly with each breath she took, and a loud rumble echoed from her bottomless belly, demanding even more fatty foods to expand its Empire of Fat even further.

Oh yes, Isabella was massively fat, there was no question about that. It was completely clear to Megan that if she didn't do something, Izzie was just going to keep going as she is and eventually disappear into her rolls. But what to do?

One part of her wanted to confront Izzie about her weight, her and now. The nurse in her knew it wasn't healthy being her size, or gaining as quickly as she is. Izzie is basically living off grease, and Megan was pretty sure she sweat Crisco. The part of her that was a good friend also didn't want to see her BFF eat herself to death. And the selfish part of her reasoned that, if Izzie would start watching what she eats and losing weight, there'd be far less fattening foods around for Megan to eat, stopping and reversing her own weight gain. Megan did feel a little guilty at that thought, and wondered if thinking that made her a terrible friend.

The other part of her wanted to wait to confront Izzie tomorrow, and have a good night tonight. Chinese food sounded amazing, even if her waistline would suffer for it. And she'd baked a couple of pies and a platter of cookies earlier in the day. It'd be a shame if they had to go to waste. Again, the part of her that was a good friend chimed in. Izzie seemed to really enjoy eating and getting fatter. Did Megan have a right to tell her she was too fat? Or was not telling Izzie making her an enabler of her friend's unchecked weight gain and the problems it pertained? She didn't want her friend to have a sea of health problems on top of an oceanic ass. She could barely walk as it is; what would the future hold if this wasn't stopped?

The selfish, lustful part of her gave its own two cents. Megan knew just how massive an order Isabella got when she ordered Chinese food, and the thought of watching her consume every last fatty, sugary morsel, along with a pie or two and several cookies, adding inches to her bloated waistline? Megan was nearly drooling at the thought.

She made her decision. "Izzie,..."
12433222211.title: What do I say?

124332222112.content:
"... you order the food, I'll pick the movie!"

Izzie smiled like the sun. "Great! Grab an action film, if you wouldn't mind," she said as she pulled her cell from the right cup of her bra with some difficulty.

"Will do," Megan answered as she passed her elephantine roomie her large bucket of chicken. Wasting no time, Isabella pulled out a drum stick with a grin as she dialed the Chinese place.

As Megan walked away, she was mentally screaming at herself. You selfish, evil woman! I can't believe you did that! She doesn't need to eat more, she needs to eat less! A LOT less! She's already so fat, but you just couldn't resist, could you!? You just had to make her fatter! You just had to see her scarf down box after box of Chinese take out, watching her massive, fat body jiggle as she eats, see her lard-filled cheeks puff out as she slurps plum sauce coated noodles down by the pound, watch her chins expand as she swallows bite after bite after bite, just filling her gigantic belly with an entire hog's worth of sweet and sour pork, then, when she thinks she's done, bring over dessert, and feed her two whole pies, one bite at a time, straight from your fingers, and then, as she's gasping from just how full she is, you break out the platter of cookies! Oh, she'll say no, but she's too fat and too hungry and way too spoiled to get away! And you'll feed her each and every one, rubbing her belly to help her find the room! And then, you'll keep doing that again and again and again, and watch your beautiful little piggy get fatter and fatt-

Distracted as she was, Megan stubbed her toe quite painfully on one of the kitchen chairs, letting out a loud yelp. Izzie nearly choked on an absolutely huge piece of chicken in her haste to swallow it and ask, "Meg! Are you okay!?"

"Yeah! Fine! Just stubbed my toe!" Meg grimaced as she held the injured foot that shook her out of a self-chastisement turned bizarre fantasy. Oh my God, what is wrong with me!? I think I need serious help!

Megan checked her foot to make sure nothing was broken. Confirming nothing was injured outside of her pride, Megan stepped around the furniture this time and went to their movie rack. She began scanning the movies as she heard Izzie finally get through to the restaurant.

Once more swallowing a large bite of chicken to clear her mouth, Isabella said. "Hello, I'd like to place an order for delivery. Credit Card. The address is.."

Meg searched through the movies, trying to find an action-comedy. She needed something to scratch her funny bone as well as feed Izzie's need for action. Oh God, why "feed" and "action"...

"Could I get the dinner for 10..."

For ten!? Jesus Christ!

"2 extra boxes of wushu pork..."

Meg's hand shook as it moved along the shelf.

"Wait, hold on a sec... Hey Megan! Do you want any wonton soup!?"

"Sure!"

"Okay, four bowls of wonton soup..."

Wait, what!?

"A triple order of spring rolls, a jumbo box of jumbo sized shrimp..."

Megan wasn't even looking at the shelf anymore, and her hands were frozen in space as she stared at the middle distance, imagination in overdrive. Her breathing was beginning to get rather erratic.

"Oh, hold on another second... Megan! Do you want any egg rolls!?"

Megan, shocked from her impromptu fantasy, answered, "Uh... sure!"

"Okay, better make it ten egg rolls..."

Megan's heart almost skipped a beat as she resumed searching through the shelves. As she grabbed a couple movies, she thought,I know she can eat a lot, but there's no way anyone could eat this much!

"... and do you guy's have any cheesecake? Great, throw one of those in for me. No, not a slice. The entire cake. Yes, that's right."

Megan lost her grip on the movies in hands and they fell clattering to the floor.

"And I think that's everything. Okay, sounds good. Great! Thanks! Bye!" Isabella hung up the phone. Replacing it in her bra, she called to her BFF, "Food will be here in 45 minutes!" Hands free, Izzie began to scarf down her chicken.

Megan picked the dropped movies off the floor, her hands still shaking. Her mind was full of thoughts of her ravenous roomie, and just how full she was about to be. And a belly that full would soon be turned to more fat on her frame, more rolls, bigger ones, even more lard on her already over expanded body... How heavy would she be after she was done? There's no way she'd be able to walk by herself. No, she'd need her friend to help her up, and she'd have to put her arm around Megan's shoulders, wrapping her in her huge layers of warm, pillowy fat...

Megan bit her lower lip to keep from making a rather undignified sound. She looked at Isabella from across the room. If anything, she looked even fatter now than she did before. Meg felt herself overwhelmed with lust, but also a sense of fear. I've really got to get this under control. For both our sakes.

******

Finishing another piece of chicken, Isabella grabbed another meaty morsel from the bucket. She'd long ago perfected her technique to get all the meat off the bone with a single bite, and her tummy growled happily. Perfect. I'll finish this off and digest for thirty, then I'll be ready for supper. I sure hope I ordered enough. Meg's got a long way to go before she can eat as much as me, but she's eating more all the time...
124332222112.title: Giving in to Temptation

1243322221122.content:
Rapidly finishing all her fried chicken, Izzie belched happily and relaxed for a moment, hands resting proudly on one of her massive rolls. She felt her stomach bubble a "thank you" as the huge amount of chicken pushed itself in, finding room along with the three massive pizzas, the huge sacks of cookies and chips, two gallons of ice cream, the jugs of milkshake and soda, over 52 boneless bbq wings, and the 12 large breakfast sausage burritos, stacks of pancakes, and well over a side of bacon. All the greasy savory meats and sauces hadn't sat very well with her milkshakes and heavy-cream dairy drinks, but Izzie had confidence in her stomach's ability to bubble its way through any digestive overload she gave it.

Sighing contentedly, a thought struck her. I wonder how much weight I've piled on in the past two weeks. I've really been overeating like nobody's business. I should check out the damage I've done to myself. She giggled softly at the thought and began the onerous process of sloshing her mammoth body up from the couch. Try as she might, she couldn't, but it didn't take more than a moment to have Megan notice and run over. "Hey Izz don't strain yourself. I'll help." The roommate firmly grabbed Izzie's doughy forearms and counted. "1...2...3...heave!" and between the two, she finally tottered to her feet, the contents of her stomach churning with the unexpected movement, jostling a rich belch right into Megan's face.
Izzie covered her mouth, mortified "omigosh I'm so sorry Megs...I did NOT see that one coming."

"N-no don't worry about it. Happens to the best of us...." Megan stammered out, a peculiar look on her face. "smells like fried chicken!" The two shared a laugh.

"Um, Megan, you can let go of my arms now. I'm pretty sure I won't tip over...for now."

"Oh. Yes. Sorry." Megan blushed scarlet and bobbled her way into the kitchen. "You want some cookies? I'm almost done!"

"Sure!! Hold up, I gotta go check something," Izzie called out before beginning her ponderous waddle toward the bathroom scale, her arms swinging out to keep up the momentum of moving her gargantuan body. Every heavy footfall produced a quiet, sickly *glurp* as the shock disturbed the slowly digesting sludge of her day's gluttony. These noises were a guilty pleasure of Izzie's, as they were an aural reminder of just how much she could eat, and just how hard her poor stomach had to work to handle everything she glutted into herself. Sometimes when she was alone and utterly overstuffed she would lightly rock her turgidly swollen gut back and forth to purposefully create the bubbling sloshing for herself, and sometimes even purposefully eat badly mixing food to increase her feeling of bloatedness and to challenge her stomach even more. The thought made Izzie moan softly.

Finally at the bathroom, the massively obese girl panted with the exertion of moving her mass, and gingerly stepped on the automatic large scale. Izzie clearly couldn't see the number past her mammoth body, but after a few seconds, a robotic female voice coldly called out "You Weigh Five-Hundred and Eight-Teen pounds."

The spoken number echoed from the tiled bathroom throughout the loft. A second later Izzie heard a catastrophic crash coming from the kitchen quickly followed by an "I'm ok! I'm ok! Some of the cookies might not be though!" from a breathless Megan.

"Don't worry about it. I'll eat them anyway. I'm not picky!" Izzie called back gaily, dizzy with happiness. Talk about catastrophic gluttony. Eighteen pounds in two weeks! That's like...over a pound a day! Izzie snickered softly to herself as she rubbed her blubbery arms over the massive rolls of her gut. Maybe with some more effort I can get to an even 20 pounds every two weeks! What a thought! I'm growing like crazy. I'm sure my stomach can handle even more reckless overeating. It hasn't failed me yet!

Izzie turned to face the wide body-length mirror on the opposite wall, grinning because even though it was promised "double wide" she still couldn't see the true size of her girth. Taking a critical look, it was clear that, consistent with the trend of the past two months, her belly was getting the vast majority of her extra poundage. Izzie didn't know how much her ass was growing, but since it passed a certain level of enormity, it was difficult to tell how much bigger it was just by eyeballing it. But it was clear her huge gut was hanging lower, her rolls were thicker, and it was sticking further and further out with each successive weigh-in.

This pleased Izzie very much. As much as she loved her gargantuan ass, she wanted her belly to equal and then surpass it in dimensions. Right now it was only huge, but someday soon she imagined it blowing past the truly enormous, and in her fantasies she saw fat fill in all of her stacked rolls and her gut becoming a single massive stretchmarked wobbling mountain of heavy, overstuffed blubber. Maybe someday Izzie thought dreamily, hands gently patting her gut. Maybe someday sooner than I think if I keep upping my gluttony and my stomach keeps handling all the greasy rich garbage I dump into myself. The trashier the better!

She thought back to her original plan of digesting for a while and chuckled to herself. I don't need any time to digest. In fact I think I need to keep eating, and FAST. She swiped her phone from her bra and thumbed through her UberEats app to the local McDonalds, only a mile away. Smiling wickedly, she keyed in an order for 18 grand macs one for each pound of her gain, and enough disgustingly greasy fries to fill a bucket.

Delivery in 15 minutes displayed the app. Mm yes. New plan. She thought. Stuff myself with Megan's cookies for 15 minutes. Then see if I can devour all this new fast food in a half hour. Then the real feast begins!

Thinking about the Chinese feast she ordered sparked another lightbulb in her head and soon: "Yeah hi there. I just put in a order at your place, right? Great. I have a few changes if that's possible. Ok so, I asked for one cheesecake. We need two more. Yes the whole cake. Also, make it thirty egg-rolls, and add a catering tray of crab rangoon. Can you do that? Excellent. Thank you!"

Izzie laughed her light tinkling laugh and waddled out into the common area toward her couch where plates of Megan's cookies were already ready to be eaten, and a gallon of whole milk ready to wash them down. Some of the cookies were clearly in worse shape from falling on the floor, and Megan was still scarlet with embarassment. Gratefully lowering her body onto the couch, the tortured furniture groaning with the effort of supporting such a large pile of blubber, Izzie immediately began double-fisting three cookies in each hand, devouring them with reckless abandon and moaning at the over-rich flavor, her multiple chins and arm blubber wobbling like crazy. It was clear Megan had used incredible amounts of butter and sugar, just the way Izzie liked it. Bulldozing through the rich goodies at a speed that surprised even Izzie, she finished in record time and, one hand placed gingerly on her belly, began chugging the gallon of milk, her throat muscles working overtime to pump ever more creamy liquid into her stomach at ever faster rates.

Finishing with a triumphant belch punctuated by an unexpected hiccup that caused Izzie's eyes to go wide and both hands to cover her mouth, the massive girl sat back on the couch, breathing heavily at the effort of glutting herself so fast. Both hands gave her visibly more bloated belly happy pats. "HIC! Phew!! Man those were GOOD. Megs you almost outdo my own mother in how rich those cookies are...a good snack. Megs? Yoohoo!!" she waved her arms in front of Megan's stunned face "Earth to Megan! HIC!"

"That...that was the fastest I've seen anyone eat anything..." Megan managed to finally push out. "...And I've been rooming with YOU for over a year...It was just incredible..."

Izzie giggled: "heheheHIC! Oh that? That was nothing. Just you wait until the real food arrives. You better snatch your portion quickly or all of it will end up riiiight here." She patted her belly for emphasis.

"You can't possibly handle all of what you ordered, even if I did let you. You'd pop." Megan finally voiced the thought she'd had since Izzie's order. "I think this is the first night we'll have leftovers."

"Oh is it? We'll just see about that." Izzie loved a challenge, especially a gluttonous one. "Don't underestimate what this puppy is capable of handling. HIC! I might even surprise myself tonight." She winked at Megan. "It's not like I don't have a LOT of training, hehehe."

Unbelievable. She really thinks she can take it, Megan thought. Well if she can, at least I see a chance to lose some of this weight. All I have to do is eat slowly.

NO! shouted Megan's other side You can lose your weight WITHOUT pushing Izzie into complete immobility. Just because she wants to stuff herself to bursting doesn't mean you should just LET her!

Ahh, but what fun it would be to watch. Megan's libido crooned. Let her go as hog wild as she wants, and just enjoy every growing, jiggling, bloated bit.

Megan's continued internal crisis was interrupted by a buzz coming from Izzie's bra. "Oooh can you get the door? I think that's my McDonalds."

"You got McDonalds?" Megan's eyes widened at the groaning bags she saw the driver carry from the window.

"Yah. Why not? It's not like it'll ruin my appetite."
1243322221122.title: Isabella weighs herself first

12433222211222.content:
One action movie started and ended. Megan popped in another, but if she were being honest, she barely paid attention to the dubious plot or muscle-car antics of “Furious 8”. Instead she had been watching spellbound at the performance of her huge roommate. Despite telling herself to hold back, Megan had had three full plates of food, and on top of a quarter of a cheesecake, was uncomfortably bloated, but now, as the second movie hit the credits, Izzie was still going strong.

Just over 4 hours had passed, and the gargantuan Latina had steadily gorged, glutted and guzzled her way through the vast majority of the mountainous feast. It wasn’t the voracious, over the top gluttony that Megan had seen when Izzie had packed away her cookies, but a steady, continuous glut. Her eyes might have been glued to the screen, but both hands were active, steadily shoveling platter after platter, burger after burger, and piece of cake after piece of cake, down Izzie’s greedy maw into the seemingly bottomless pit of her hungry stomach, which seemingly called endlessly for more feeding and more indulgence.

As the credits rolled, Megan watched with interest as Izzie took the last piece of cheesecake and pushed it resolutely into her large mouth with both hands, her fat cheeks swelling out to resemble a hamster’s. Chewing for a few moments, Izzie placed steadying hands on her gut and swallowed heavily, the entire bulging mouthful dumping into her stomach at once, and triggering a large hiccup: “HYELP! Whew!” Izzie slumped back on the creaking couch, licked her fingers and placed them proudly atop her mammoth gut. “Now THAT is what I call a good dinner….*HYELP* So rich!” She reached down and picked up a half-empty two-liter bottle of pepsi, unscrewed the cap, and upended it into her mouth, her throat greedily making massive swallows to suck the sugary soft drink into her gut as fast as possible. Finishing rapidly, she erupted into another indulgent hiccup, followed by a massive belch as she gently tossed the bottle on top of the mountain of trash and proudly rubbed the turgid flanks of her boiling gut.

Her indulgence had caused her massive stomach to swell and bloat to an obscene state, filling in the four massive rolls of blubber to create a huge, jiggling, audibly bubbling vastly overglutted water-balloon of a belly. Izzie’s breath came in light-ragged gasps as her stomach pushed her lungs to a fraction of their normal allotted space, but she momentarily closed her eyes and enjoyed the feeling of such a huge pile of fatty food churn and roil away within the strained depths of her stomach. I can’t wait till it gets this big without me glutting myself close to bursting. Izzie thought greedily. Opening one eye at Megan, “HYELP! So didja enjoy the show, Megs? URRRRP. Somethin’ else, huh? heheheHYICELP!”

“I…I honestly think that is the most I have ever seen anyone eat in one sitting. Ever.” Megan said slowly, her eyes not leaving Izzie’s mountain of a belly. “And I’ve watched a lot of internet…”

“HeheheHICC! Toldja my stomach could handle it…HYELP!!” Izzie proudly gave the huge bubbling mass some proud pats. “I don’t know URP! How many pounds of food are…HYELP…boiling away in here, but I don’t think I’m…HYIC! Getting up for a LONG while…*glorpHELP!*”

That brought Megan back to earth and to a question that had been nagging her for a week now. “Say Izz, that reminds me. Don’t you think your indulgence is...a bit much? Even for you?”

“Ya caught on, huh?” Izzie responded. Megan nodded. The massive Latina scratched her chin. “You know…ELP! My birthday is in ‘bout two weeks…HYICC!” Megan nodded again. “Well this year…HYELP! My mother ‘n Abuela are coming over…*glurbleHELP!* And mi Abuela is insisting on a long-weekend celebration for me….HYELP! The amount of food she serves me…HICURRRP…is mindboggling even for me.” Izzie smirked at a memory, “Why, at my Quinceañera, she made so much grub…*glorp* that I ate myself out of TWO dresses…HELP!!” She rubbed the top of her superswollen gut. “If ya don’t want me to explode, I gotta get ready…HYELP!”

“Can’t you just refuse the food after you feel like you’ve had enough?” Megan leaned forward, confused.

Izzie shot her a look. “URP. Two problems with that. One, you do NOT refuse food from mi Abuela…HYELP! Two, it’s me. I’ll eat anything in sight. Self control isn’t my strong suit…*bubbleHELP!* Anyway, since Exploded Izzie is no Bueno…HYELP…I gotta stretch m’stomach and increase its structural integrity…URPHELP!!! To be able to handle what she might throw at me…HYELP!” Izzie pressed down on the top of her gut, the churning feasts gurgling at the pressure, and jostling a belch. “URRRRP! I know it doesn’t look it but…HYELP! Even I’m not bottomless….HIC. It takes a lot…HYELP…a lot more work to diligently overeat every hour…HYELP…of every day than you might think….hehehehe.” She giggled but cast Megan an expectant look.

The voices in Megan’s brain had all but silenced. Her lust had decisively won out and in a kind of haze, Megan managed to croak “I…I can help ya out if it’s so much work…”

“HYELP! Oh you would? That’s just the best! HYELP! I know with your help I can get into fighting shape…*glurbleHICCC*” Izzie clapped her hands eagerly, beaming with happiness, her entire blubbery body wobbling.”

“Of course. I’d also prefer my bestie and roomie not explode either, ya know.” Meg replied, finding some confidence. “That being said…first order of business…are the pies I made today…if you think you can take any more.”

Izzie belched and gave her gut a few eager slaps. “URP! My stomach can always handle more…HYELP! Bring. It. On.”

12433222224.content:
Alyssa Clarke:

18, 5’4”: Already the biggest girl in the freshman class, and she knows it. Tipping the scales at 502 pounds, Alyssa's driving ambition is to eat, drink, and glut herself into becoming the biggest girl in all of Prestonwood College, by the end of her first year. Coming from a large half-Samoan family of big eaters, Alyssa took to gluttony easily and at an early age and soon after developed an abiding love for all things fat, mostly her own.

Her two greatest prides and joys are her massive belly, a fantastically round and vast temple of her eager overindulgence, and the cavernous maw of her stomach, the seemingly endless capacity of which never failed to stun anyone not familiar with her, to Alyssa's endless delight.

Her two greatest passions are in increasing the piles of caramel blubber on her belly and in continually putting her gigantic stomach to the test in ever greater feats of gluttony.

Proud of all the diligent work she had put into creating her vast belly, Alyssa is an outgoing, confident girl, a unabashed and unashamed glutton, and always ready to show off her mammoth appetite and the massive fat of her stupendous gut. She is more than ready to put her stomach to the test against the fabled buffets of Prestonwood College.
12433222224.title: Alyssa Clarke

124332222241.content:
Mid afternoon sunshine beamed through the first floor window of Faranis Hall in what promised to continue to be a gorgeous late-August day. The din of freshmen moving into Prestonwood’s dormitories mingled with sweet birdsong. However within Room 112, there was only one series of noises that had been repeating themselves for more than an hour:
“*rustle*
*chomp* or *crunch*
*gulp*
*slurp*”
Punctuated by an occasional throaty belch or a light giggle.

Alyssa Clarke was lounging luxuriously on an reinforced loveseat on her side of the room that was totally taken up by her immensity. Smiling in satisfaction at her handiwork, she tossed aside a pound bag of M&Ms, her third in the course of 15 minutes, adding to the significant pile of soda bottles, family-size bags of chips, candies, bags of pepperidge farm soft baked cookies, and the occasional box of king-size candy bars, now only filled with wrappers that her eager fat fingers had torn apart.

Grabbing the next bag of goodies, Alyssa took a moment to grab at a 3/4 full bottle of Fanta and upend the opening of the bottle into her mouth, the throat muscles buried in her many chins pumping lazily as the carbonated sugary beverage poured into her stomach. Finishing with an indulgent belch, the rapidity of her drinking caused an unexpected hiccup to escape too, causing Alyssa's sparkling dark eyes to widen in surprise:

“*Hyicc!!!* Oo whoops! Hehehe*hyic!*” The titanic dark brown girl was amused at her body's reaction. Sighing as she leaned back against the cushions of her loveseat, she nonetheless diligently began stuffing more large soft-baked cookies into her mouth with greedy bites. Stacking the cookies four at a time ensured the bag soon emptied and joined its comrades in the “finished” pile.

At this point, Alyssa brushed the crumbs off her substantial chest and gluttonously picked out pieces that fell into the cleavage of her melon-sized breasts, and contentedly rested her hands briefly on the vast shelf of her huge belly, the surface slightly tight from this most recent “snacking”, on top of two very substantial meals earlier in the day. Giving its vast mass some conceited pats, the huge freshman wondered briefly what to do next.

Earlier in the day her father and three burly brothers had moved her luggage into Prestonwood, half of which must have been snacks to survive for perhaps a few days. In the hour or so since they had kissed Alyssa goodbye, however, she had made an significant dent in her snack supply, and Alyssa seriously doubted the rest would hold out by the end of tomorrow. Despite all these piles of fatty junk, Alyssa was far from satisfied, at least mentally. The bustle of moving into her very own place and the thought of her first taste of independence excited her. So did the reputation of the dining facilities at Prestonwood. And when Alyssa Clarke was excited, she ate. And eating excited her still further. For her, it was a virtuous cycle that all but guaranteed her weight continuously climbed upward, usually at a steady clip at home, but the potential of Prestonwood to kick it into high gear caused Alyssa to unconsciously lick her lips.

That decided it. Time to eat. Faranis hall was one of three that contained a cafeteria attached to it, and by the luck of the draw, the entry was only twenty or so feet from Room 112. Grunting with exertion, Alyssa ponderously lifted her 502 pound body...no...507 as of this morning Alyssa thought smugly. She luxuriantly stretched, tank top riding up even further across the vast, somewhat distended surface of her belly. The shirt was intentionally too small. For all the overeating Alyssa did, she was determined that its decadent, blubbery consequences were not to go unnoticed.

Stifling another hiccup, Alyssa grinned wickedly, hands proudly placed atop her gut, “*hic* I’ll meet my roommate later. Let's see if that welcome buffet can handle my appetite”. Jiggling gloriously, the massive teen waddled out of her room, led by the delicious scents just around the corner...
124332222241.title: Alyssa moves in!

1243322222411.content:
Over two hours later and Alyssa had concluded at least two things. First, yes indeed the Faranis caf would suit her “needs” splendidly. Second, oof she needed more burgers.

Unfazed by the piles of platters and glasses mounding around her, Alyssa prepared to hoist herself yet again to the servery. This had become more difficult as of late. She had diligently shoved a literal mountain of rich, heavy calorific food into her cavernous stomach, grossly distending it and bloating her belly to an even more ridiculous and unwieldy size. But Alyssa was pleased as punch. This kind of reckless gluttony is what she lived for, and she basked in some of the shocked stares shot her way as they saw the enormous girl prepare for another massive course.

Returning not only with a small pile of triple stacked bacon cheeseburgers, but also an creation of her own: four stacked sausage pizza slices, numerous pieces of bacon and even more cheeseburger parties in between each slice, slathered in creamy ranch dressing, Alyssa gratefully plopped her engorged body onto the creaking chair and opened her mouth wide to receive the pizza monstrosity.

“That is quite the concoction you have there. Wouldn't be surprised if the calorie count is enough for an entire day.”

The voice belonged to an girl and was curiously congenial in tone. Alyssa looked up to behold a rather tall skinny blonde with wavy shoulder length hair nicely coiffed, green eyes, a button nose upon which perched small glasses. There was an odd sparkle to her eyes and a playful smile tugging at the corners of her pert mouth.

Alyssa blew out a belch behind her hand and smiled widely, “*rrrp* why thank ya so much! It's one of my own creations! I c’n be very clever in devising ways to get as much delicious grub as possible inta this stomach.” She took a massive bite, cheeks bulging, and leaned backward so the blonde could get a better view of just how enormous her gut was, one hand placed proudly on its flank.

The girl giggled gaily: “So I can see! You must be verrry clever indeed!” She extended her hand “name's Sandra Bandier. Field hockey team recruit. I do believe we are roommates. It's a pleasure!”

Alyssa made another massive bite and took the hand with the one resting on her belly: “*gulp* I'm Alyssa Clarke. *chomp* Glutton extraordinaire. Hehehe. Always great to meet new friends! How did you come to that conclusion?” She took another large bite.

“Simple! Who else here could possibly leave a small mountain of empty snack and candy containers.” Sandra looked around. “there are some big appetites here, especially from upperclassmen, but no freshman holds a candle to you.” Sandra sat down next to Alyssa, clearing a space among the stacks of plates and resting her chin on her palms. “Shoot, Aly didja really eat all this?”

Sandra's warm demeanor and the recognition of her immensity made Alyssa beam with pride. Shoving the rest of her pizza creation into her mouth with both hands, she immediately reached for two burgers with both hands, even before swallowing the latest bite: “Oomph..yesh! You bet I did! *gulp* And there's plenty *chomp* more ta stuff into this stomach of mine. *gulp*. I gotta feeling *mmph* this is gonna be a really FILLING year *hyic!!*” Finishing the burgers with eager speed, Alyssa again leaned back to show herself off, both hands giving the enormity of her belly a quick succession of playful pats.

“Well damn I'm sure it will be if this is only your first day,” Sandra remarked, “You're certainly not going to be a boring roommate, that's for sure! I like excitement. Pretty soon I'm gonna hafta roll you outta our room, huh?”

“*gulp...hyic!” that's the *burp* plan!!” Alyssa responded passionately while double fishing massive burgers from the steadily shrinking pile.

Sandra blinked, “I meant that kiddingly but you're dead serious about that, aren't you. About purposely getting bigger.”

“bigger’n the biggest senior here by the end of the year!” Alyssa responded, beaming. Better to have this conversation with her roommate now. She'd have put two and two together soon enough, Alyssa thought. It's not like I hide what I am. “I know this place's reputation. Wanna put it to the test...*hyic!*”

“Shiiiiit,” breathed Sandra, “you sure have ambitions. I've seen some seniors at welcome check-in. Ya got your work cut out for you.” She gave her roommate's vast belly a playful pat. “Ya wanna put this place to the test? Or your stomach?”

It was Alyssa's turn to blink. She almost never had such a positive interaction outside her family. Responses varied from stunned shock (which she relished) to abject disgust (which was occasionally upsetting). This was something altogether different, and Alyssa was finding herself liking this spunky, cheerful blonde more by the second. Giggling at Sandra's touch, Alyssa polished off the rest of the burgers: “hehehehe *hyiccc!!!* why not both? Ooof look you made me finish all this in record time!” Alyssa's stomach quietly bubbled its input.

“Oh noo we can't have that, can we?” Sandra cried, and leapt up. “I'll do the rounds for ya. Can't have my roommate wasting away on me. That is...if you want more. Ya look pretty full as is.” Sandra cast a wary eye on Alyssa's heavily swollen gut.

Alyssa snorted and gave her belly a rough jiggle with both hands, transfixing Sarah with its wobbling waves of blubber. “I've never let a minor event like feeling full stop me from eating more...*hyicc*...I toldja there's a lot left ta glut inta m'self.” She winked at Sandra. “You'll get to see what this peachy lil’ sack can really do!”

“Alright! That's the spirit!” Sandra laughed and bounded away to the servery.
1243322222411.title: Enter Sandra

choices: The next day, signing up for classes and activities!
12433222224111.content:
It went without saying that Sandra the student-athlete could move much faster than Alyssa the near quarter-ton glutton. This meant that she ferried the same huge portions to Alyssa at a significantly faster rate than previously. Not one to back down from an opportunity like this, Alyssa challenged herself to finish the platters Sandra brought before she returned with new ones. The inevitable result was significantly greater volumes of only the richest and most calorific food flooded past Alyssa's eager maw and into the seemingly bottomless pit of her gluttonous stomach.

It was not until the cafeteria began changing for dinner service that the dynamic duo stop for an breather. Sandra plopped down a tray and sunk into a chair “Whewwww. Goodness who knew one could get a workout like this? No gym for me today thanks to you, Aly...Aly?”

Finally given a break, Alyssa slowly slumped back with a loud husky hiccup, her superglutted stomach turgidly boiling at the movement. “*HYELP!!! Oh goshhh...now THAT was real eatin’...*HYELP*!!” Her tank top had pushed up to covering only a quarter of her immense belly, the rest of the massive mountain of caramel blubber exposed for all to see. Despite her stupefying fullness and food-induced stupor, Alyssa could feel the shocked expressions and stares fixed on her engorged belly, and reveled in them. She knew they couldn't believe the sheer volume that Alyssa had gorged into her stomach. That she hadn't made herself sick, and was handling it all with apparent glee. Alyssa glowed with pride as she felt all her gluttony bubble and churn within her. Both arms lay limply to her sides.

She rolled her head to fix Sandra with a sloppy, smug grin: “gosh Sandra...ya rrreally know how...*HYELP*...ta keep a girl well fed...oooff...thisss ish one happy stummickk...*BELCH*. Mannn...and thisss is only the first day! *HYIELP!!* Isss gon’ be a riiich year!” She weakly gave her belly some prideful pats and a small jiggle, the digestion glopping grossly and the disturbance jostling out another loud hiccup. “*HELP!!!*”

Sandra whistled: “Ya weren't kidding about being a “glutton extraordinaire”. That was all kinds of incredible. I had a hard time keeping up with you sometimes.” She smiled brightly “Keep this up and I don't doubt you'll meet your goal. Maybe with some time to spare!” Sandra giggled “and you'll be putting on quite the show, too.”

“What can I say? Myyy stummHYIC! stummick loves ta show offf...*HYELP!!* Oooff soo fulla riiich eatingsss...everythinggg sooo fatty...*HYELP!!!* Pounds ‘n pounds of it bubblin’ in this bellyyyy”. Alyssa smacked it conceitedly: “Whutta GUT eh Sandra?”

I will die soon. But I will die doing something that I love doing.
