1252222.content:
With her giant belly mounding on her lap and pushing her large tits up close to her face, Wendy began the onerous journey to work. The overwhelmingly obese girl, however, couldn't prevent herself from caving to the massive hunger pangs ripping through her only cavernous stomach. Sighing, and hoping her boss would forgive her, Wendy resolved to giver her stomach a 'proper' breakfast and pulled into a McDonalds Drive-Thru and ordered two huge sacks of breakfast goodies, pulling into the parking lot, she ate with fierce abandon, and soon all of it was safely packed into her huge gut, which was slightly more bloated than before. Sighing happily, Wendy stifled a belch and started her car once again, driving across the street to Burger King and ordering the equivalent there. Then to Wendy’s. Then to Krispy Kreme, and finally to Dunkin Donuts, where she, with difficulty, polished off three dozen donuts and a large bag of breakfast sandwiches. Now broke, stuffed, and her car awash in boxes, bags, and wrappers, Wendy unabashedly hiccupped and blearily patted the top of her now significantly engorged gut, which had bloated out to make steering difficult. This was how she liked herself, satisfied to the point of stupidity, full beyond reckoning, and able to feel the small mountain of food bubble away in her gigantic gut. giving herself a few minutes to digest, she smiled: “HIC! Ah, now that’s better...URP! Nothing like a...HIC...nice BIG breakfast...HIC...to start my day. Oooh...HIC!! I wonder what they got left over...URP...at the restaurant...HIC...hehehe no wonder I’m getting so huge...HIC...”
It was true. Over the past 6 months, the already huge Wendy had undergone an even more accelerated weight-gain, especially in her magnificent belly, which now was the most prominent part of her huge body and embodied a huge towering mountain of quaking, wobbling, often supergorged blubber. If there were two things that defined Wendy Sanders, it was that she was immensely lazy, and she loved to eat, and never really STOP eating, and drinking. Every night was a haze of alcohol-fueled gluttony that left her more often than not comatosely passed out on her couch, unbelievably gorged and incredibly drunk. Wendy resolved herself to live life to its fullest and she would happily define herself as a glutton and a huge hedonist, her pleasures just happened to be eating impossible amounts of food, and drinking impossible amounts of beer. The fact that she actually liked the incredible weight of her gargantuan gut just made it all the easier to eternally feed herself. Now ready to go, Wendy sighed happily and with difficulty steered her way to the diner in which she worked.
It took her a little while to get herself there though, for as full as she was, she couldn’t help stopping here and there along the way to indulge in more fatty treats and breakfast goodies, so much so that steering honestly became a problem and Wendy nearly lost control of the steering wheel to the unstoppable tide of her blubbery belly. Finally creaking into the parking lot, Wendy hiccupped again and struggled for at least 10 minutes to haul her giant fat body out of her car, which groaned gratefully with relief. At last out, Wendy brushed the crumbs off her blouse, hiccupped again and swayed for a moment, adapting to the new weight from the mountain of food inside her huge gut: “HICC!! Oof what a weight....HIC...Let’s hope Work is exciting...” and waddled off into the restaurant.
1252222.title: She makes a stop.

12522221.content:
Wendy allowed her titanic belly to push open the doors of the restaurant, and jiggled her way over to the hostess stand where she usually sat all day directing customers to their tables. Usually, however, most of her day was also filled with constant eating, as her boss and restaurant owner, Helen herself over 400 pounds, allowed her to eat any leftovers from customers and the kitchen. This was actually becauase Helen wanted to make sure that there was someone fatter than her, and took a malicious interest in seeing Wendy’s massive size only increase with her time at the diner. However, today Wendy saw a new face at her post, a college girl, from the looks of it, slim, slender, with hefty tits well on display in her low-cut shirt. Stifling a belch, Wendy looked quizzically at Helen, standing next to her.
“Good morning Wendy, good to see you. I’ve decided to change some arrangements here at the diner. Your job of hostess will be taken over by Marissa here.” Marissa waved gaily, apparently not fazed at all by the giantly obese woman in front of her.
“But...where do I go? Are you firing me?” Wendy tried valiantly to keep her composure, but her heart fluttered with worry. Helen, however, laughed:
“Nonsense. You’ve worked here for four years, I’m not going to get rid of you! We just need someone who can easily show the patrons to their tables. You know business has been booming! For now, you can go to the kitchens and make sure the leftovers are taken care of, you MUST be hungry. Think of you as our...leftover disposal unit. You’ll be keeping your same salary.” She smiled ingratiatingly. Wendy blinked a few times, stunned at what she heard, and didn’t even bother to stifle the hiccup that gave away her swollen state.
“HICCC...wait...so you’re basically paying me to stuff my face? Do you actually mean it?” Wendy’s greedy mind whirred with excitement. The portions at Helen’s diner were huge, and many normal customers didn’t even finish half without feeling stuffed. The fact that all that leftover food from a full day of many, many customers would be funneled into her stomach was dizzyingly exciting, and Wendy began massaging the bloated top-shelf of her giant gut in eagerness.
Helen smiled: “Of course I mean it. You’d better get to it, the first set of breakfast customers are finishing their meals,” and indicated to a group of about 12 people pushing away their platters. Wendy giggled happily and rapidly shuffled off, while Helen grinned wickedly: I wonder how long it’ll be till the pig can’t move that stupidly fat gut of hers. Of course, Wendy didn’t see this, and had waddled into the kitchens, her mouth already stuffed with bacon from a bussed plate. Seating herself comfortably out of view of the guests, Wendy giggled like a child on Christmas morning and began her day of feasting.
12522221.title: She goes to work

125222212.content:
Wendy’s shift ended at 5:30, but she ended up staying until the end of the main dinner service at 9pm, partially because there was just so much to eat, she couldn’t bring herself to leave such a rich feast. What a day it was, completely saturated with massive mountains of leftover food that avalanched into Wendy’s titanic stomach. Even for a veteran glutton such as Wendy, this was totally beyond anything she had ever experienced, but she adapted manfully. By 9PM, she was plopped on the floor on her massive ass, her shirt completely rolled up displaying her astronomically swollen and overstuffed blubbery belly in all its magnificent glory. Wendy was so jam-packed with food, she could barely even think, but was greedy as ever, shovelling her umpteenth plate of triple-fried french fries and chocolate cake into her stomach, giggling stupidly. As far as she was concerned, she had somehow landed the jackpot that all gluttons wish for, being paid to stuff herself, and whether her body liked it or not, she was going to take advantage of it until she could literally not cram one more bite of delicious food into her exploding stomach. Wendy finished her last dessert (for now) when Marissa walked in, and despite her general unflappability, had to gasp in shock at how much bigger Wendy had glutted herself.
Wendy woozily looked up, her hands perched contentedly the top swell of her mammoth gut: “HICCC HICCC HICCC HILLP!!! Holy crap what a day...HIC...God I love my new job...HICCC. hehehe...HILP...hehehe I can feel all that food...HIICCC sloshing around inside...HICC my stomach...URRP...oooff it’s so rich...HILP!!” Wendy drunkenly patted her gut proudly and took yet another large plate of leftovers and funneled it into her eager mouth, exploding into another rich hiccup.
Marissa blinked confusedly: “Wendy...I...I don’t know what to say. I don’t know how you haven’t exploded yet. I hope for your sake you don’t get sick or indigestion. How are you going to keep this up?”
Through a mouthful of food, Wendy snorted derisively and roughly slapped her supergorged belly, sending waves of blubber and bubbling squelches with every impact: “HIC HILP!! Don’t worry, skinny. I’ve been overeating my entire...HIC HILP life...I know how to put it away...HIC URRRP!! My stomach can basically...HIC...handle anything I shove into it...HIC HILP...I know what I’m doing...HILP...now can you pass me that...HIC...platter of cheese potatoes? HILPP!!!” Marissa laughed genially and did so, also shepherding a pitcher of beer for Wendy to enjoy. The two women smiled and Wendy knew she had found a new friend. After another 5 massive plates, and fiinally finished, Wendy ever-so-slowly rolled, her gluttony bubbling and sloshing loudly inside of her, onto her hugely overinflated stomach and stood up, stumbling to the back door.
Marissa, concerned, offered to drive her inebriated and engorged coworker home, an offer gratefully accepted. Accented with hiccup-rich phrases, Marissa learned from Wendy that she was currently living alone in a double apartment, and so the two resolved to become roommates. Seeing that Wendy would be spending the foreseeable future gorged out of her wits, she’d need someone to drive her to and from work, and Marissa, newly moved into the area, needed a conveniently close place to live. The fact that Marissa seemed to almost slavishly admire Wendy’s gargantuan size would make things even easier.
Wendy finally got home, and it was all she could do to drag herself to the couch, not negelecting to grab a stack of pastries and a growler of beer. Crashing down with a gigantic *GLOOOSH GURGLE*, she giggled greedily as she filled her mouth with twinkies, ho-hos, mass-produced fudge, and calorific beer and reflectively patted her huge belly now crushing her fat-stuffed legs. If she continued this for ANY period of time, her weight would absolutely skyrocket, but in her food-stuffed mind’s rationale, it was an price totally worth paying. Hiccupping richly and contentedly patting her supergorged stomach, she slowly dozed off dreaming of food, food and more food!
125222212.title: at closing time

1252222122.content:
The alarm clock sounded its shrill song of the morning, but a few seconds after, a fat-stuffed hand with sausage-fingers fumbled for the snooze button. Wendy lay lounging in bed comfortably warm, and still comfortably gorged, until Marissa called coaxingly: “WENDY! Come on! We gotta go to the diner so you can clock in some bonus hours!” It was a Saturday, and Wendy wasn’t on duty, but she often went and did her ‘work’ anyway to earn overtime. Grumbling miserably, but still wanting food, Wendy slowly dumped her gargantuan body out of her bed, onto the floor with a great *SLOP GLOOOSH*, punctuated by a rich hiccup. Fridays were often the busiest days at the diner, and so Wendy was still quite stuffed from her day of eating, but that certainly wouldn’t stop her from gorging more. The month had indeed passed in a flood of food, drink and mountains of new blubber. Already a massive 630 pounds when she started her new job at the Diner, Wendy had simply ballooned, gaining over 100 pounds in such a short period of time, the majority of that weight piling itself on her truly mammoth, gargantuan, titanic belly. With Marissa happily taking care of most everything, Wendy only had to focus all her energies on eating as much as she possibly could and cramming as much as possible into her stomach, a job that Wendy took to like a fish to water. Nevertheless, Wendy still grumbled at having to move her incredibly difficult body from her comfortable bed. Hiccupping again, she dragged herself on her hugely swollen belly to a reinforced bar and slowly dragged her massively heavy body up onto her relatively pathetic legs.
Still complaining, Wendy, unsteadily patted her mammoth belly and slowly wobbled herself into the kitchen, crashed down on the floor on her giant ass, and cheerfully greeted Marissa: “HICCC...’morning Marissa honey...HIC HIC...thanks for getting me up...HIC...can you get me some breakfast...HICC before we go? HIC...my little belly’s HUNGRY...HILP!!” Wendy giggled and immediately snatched a platter of fudge and promptly stuffed all of it into her eager mouth.
Marissa, though used to this consumption, had to admit this pre-work gluttony was new: “Uhm...Wendy, you know that if we leave now, within 15 minutes you’ll have more food than you could possibly dream of? I’m just worried that if you eat a full meal now, you’ll not be able to handle everything that’s dumped into your stomach, especially after last night.” It was true, as last night was possibly the most Wendy had ever stuffed into herself, and by the end of the night even Wendy admitted she could barely keep all of her day’s glutting down into her huge, cavernous, gut. Yet, somehow she did, and somehow Marissa coaxed her to roll home, but if Wendy was still this gorged after a full night’s sleep, there was no saying what would happen today. Still, if anyone could do it, Marissa reasoned, it would be Wendy and her amazing stomach.
Wendy laughed genially at Marissa’s worry and belched richly, her eyes glinting greedily: “UURRRP! You’re adorable, Skinny...HIC...to worry about me....HIC...like that...HILP!!! I know how stuffed I am now...HICC...but I know I can...HIC...take anything they throw at me...HIC HIC...I know...HIC...my stomach can handle anything...HIC...even after a proper breakfast. I want to make today...URP...a day to truly remember!” Wendy patted her gorged gut eagerly, and Marissa had no choice but to agree, and soon Wendy was stuffing herself on all sorts of pastries, danishes, pancakes, waffles, and other breakfast goodies that Marissa whipped together out of the refrigerator. Finally, after a long and massive gorge, satiated for now, Wendy greedily hiccupped and slowly, with her busty friend supporting as much weight as she could bear, stumbled her way to the car and made the short journey to Helen’s Diner. Dumping herself out of Marissa’s van, Wendy ponderously made her wobbly way to the diner’s back door, and disappeared, promising Marissa to call when she was finished. Silently wishing her friend the best, Marissa drove off and waited to see the results.
Wendy waddled in and was promptly faced with a huge pile of leftover plates, and a wickedly grinning Helen: “Hello Wendy dear, I hope you brought your appetite, cuz today we’re even BUSIER than yesterday! I’ll need you to pack it away double time for me, can you handle that?”
Wendy could only beam ecstatically, richly belch and give her standard reply: “UURRP. Helen don’t you worry...HIC...you can count...HIC...on me...I can handle ANYTHING!” And with that she collapsed down with an SQUELCH and began glutting with ferocity, spreading her legs so her mammoth belly could spread across the floor and bloat larger and larger with impunity without crushing her tree-trunk legs. Despite her already swollen and stuffed state, the Glutton in Wendy drove her to higher and higher feats of excess, and she challenged herself to outdo yesterday’s record, even while filled with the huge breakfast she just ingested. Thus inspired, Wendy ate and ate and ate and ate and ATE, and massive quantities of greasy, succulent, fatty food slammed into her already engorged gut, exploding it in size and heaviness, a sensation that only caused Wendy to giggle woozily and continue eating with even more aggressiveness. Food, glorious food! greasy flavors mixed with savoury and clashed with sweet, and all were crammed into the giant vat of Wendy’s stomach, which slopped, bubbled, and mixed them all into a toxic mixture of fattening goodness guaranteed to overload her already titanic body with more pounds of delicious, soft, heavy lard. So focused on eating was Wendy that she did not notice that hte plates she received were fully overloaded with food, not the half-eaten plates that would typically come in from customers. Indeed, Helen had decided to accelerate Wendy’s poundage and the diner was actually closed to customers on Saturday, but the entire kitchen staff was in and employed in solely cooking massive meal after massive meal for their gargantuan employee. However, if Wendy knew, she’d probably be even more overjoyed that she and her incredible stomach could handle such a massive volume of food.

12522221221.content:
At about 7:30 in the evening, Marissa began to worry about Wendy’s whereabouts, as she got not one phone call from either her or Helen, as she usually did. Just as she was going to drive over to the diner to see for herself, she heard an incredibly drunk giggle followed by an incredibly massive hiccup, the jingling of the lock, and Wendy’s call: HIC HILP...HICC HILLLPP!!!!! MARISS...HIC...A!!! I’m.....HIC HILP!! BAAACKKK....HILP!!” Wendy sloshed into her apartment and collapsed with a giant *GLOOSH* onto her titanic gut and started to drag herself toward a shocked Marissa. “WHUTT a day...HILP!! NEVER have I EVER...HICC...seen such EATINGS...HILLP HILP!!! Everything...HICC was well...HIC HILP...made...and impossible...HILP...to resist...I’ve...HILP...been gorging...HIC...glutting...stuffing...HIC and feasting...HILP so much....HIC...I’ve lost track...URP of how much is bubbling and churning inside me...HIC...only that I...HIC HILP...NEVER, EVER...HIC HIC HILP!! have been SO HUGELY CRAMMED...HILLP with delicious FOOD...HIC HILP! OH it was RICH, Marissa...RI-ACHH...HIILLLLPP!!” With that Wendy flung herself onto her back in one, concerted violent motion that caused her body to explode in giant bubbling and boiling of struggling digestion, and all at once exposed how massively the day’s eatings had swollen her already titanic belly. Gasping at the massive weight of her gluttony sloshing on top of her, Wendy nevertheless hiccupped richly and propped her head against a wall, one of her hands listlessly draped on the upper part of her exploding belly, a stupidly contented smile plastered on her face.

Marissa at this point could only laugh at her friend’s mammoth gluttony and incredible size and tease her: “Well you’ve really done it now, Wendy. You can barely move your massive gut of yours, you’ve stuffed too much into it. You should be ashamed of yourself. It’d serve you right if you split apart right here, or at least had a massive attack of acute indigestion.” Marissa folded her arms across her impressive bosom and gave Wendy a mock-fierce look.

To this, Wendy only snickered contentedly and casually smacked her mountainous belly a few times: “HILLPP!!! HAH Fat chance...HIC HIC HILP!! My stomach can handle ANYTHING...HIC HIC I dump into it...and this time I truly believe it...HIC HIC HILP!! HIC HILP!!! I just...HIC...kept eating...HIC...eating...HIC...eating...HIC..and EATING and I could just keep cramming it down...HILLP!!! My belly just gets bigger...HILP!! Fatter...HILP!! and more HUGE!!!! UUURRPPP!!! And I’m ok with that...hehehehe...HILP!!” With that Wendy gently sqeezed some of her enormous mountins of blubber that filled her entire torso to bursting and jiggled her titanic gluttony around and then catatonically allowed her arms to limply fall to her sides in utter contentment.
Marissa was thinking, though: “Say, Wendy, don’t you think there’s something suspicious about Helen paying you gorge yourself to incapacity every day? Especially today, since if the Diner was open, why wasn’t I called to work as Hostess? Did you notice anything in particular about today?”
Wendy blinked woozily and tried to shift upright to peer inquisitively at Marissa, her colossal belly churning and bubbling with the effort, which caused Wendy to place steadying hands on the giant vat of her gut. Marissa’s face swam into view just over the mounding swell of her mammoth belly. After a few moments, Wendy hiccupped massively, and gently patted the expansive upper shelf of her stomach, settling back down into her prone position with a gurgle: “HIILLLPPP!!! If that’s so...HIC then Hooray for me and my belly..HILLP!!” she remarked dryly. “If Helen wants to stuff me...HICC HILP...until...HILP...I become the goodyear blimp...HIC HILP!! then that’s...URRP...just FINE...HIC HIC HILP with me...HICHILP!! I’m content...HIC...to keep stuffing...HIC and gorging...URRRP HILP!! my stomach...HIC...until I prove...HICC to myself...HILP HILP that it CAN’T...HILP handle ANYTHING...hehehe...URPhe!” Marissa shrugged, for as long as it was fine with Wendy to play into Helen’s fatty game, then it was fine with her. Wendy richly hiccupped and murmured: “HILP!! this HAS been a day HILLP!” and bubbled over back onto her overstuffed stomach for a digestive rest, calling out “HILLP!! Wake me for Brunch...HIC...Marissa!!! URRRPPP”

12532.content:
A glob of sour cream oozed out as Anne took a large bite from her most recent taco. The white gel slid down her chin crevices, staining her blue tank top.

However, The morbidly obese female didn't notice a thing.

She was busy working on her latest commission. A law firm needed a professional web page completed in a very small time frame. Her fat fingers typed out a Html codes at a break neck pace. It was apparent that Anne was experienced.

Anne downed another taco from the nearby tray as her husband approached. Allen had always loved watching his wife work. The way her upper arms quivered with each letter typed enamored him.

He sneaked up behind her for a quick glance at her progress. However, his eyes seemed glued to her immense breasts. Her arms squished those massive orbs up into her third chin. It was amazing that she could even see past those things.

A wicked grin crested Allen's lips as he slid his arms around his wife's love handles. In a quick motion he cupped his arms around her breasts and squeezed.

"Allen" Anne squealed as her hands flung off of the keyboard "Stop scaring me like that!"

"Don't pretend you don't like it!" he quipped as he kneaded her pliable flesh

"Ooooh" Anne cooed as waves of ecstasy passed through her "I.......need.....to.....finish....."

"Not like that!" Allen jested "You have to ask properly!"

"Please stop" she pleaded as he slid his hands down to her underbelly "I can't focus."

"Not good enough" Allen quipped as he began drumming on her dimpled chassis.

"Please stop Master!" Anne cried out as her mind began to haze.

"Much better" he replied "You may return to your work."

Anne huffed violently as she tried to compose herself. Allen watched in awe as her large body jiggled with each breath.

"You know how hungry that makes me!" she cried aloud as her panting subsided "You are sick for teasing me like this."

"Calm down" Allen replied "I was just about to make a food run."

Anne barked as Allen headed out towards the car.

"Make sure you get diet foods! Last time you only bought junk food!"

Allen shrugged off her comments and entered the car.

"No way!" he said "I won't stop until you can't move a muscle"

Allen sped off towards a local supermarket in record time.

"What should I feed her next?"

125331.content:
Everyone knew Claire Spittz was a flirt, someone who knew how to get what she wanted, and even a skank depending on who you asked. From her freshman to senior years in high school she had done nothing other than party, spread rumors, and sleep with boys of all kinds; never making time to study and just cruising by on her good looks. But of course, “Captain of the Cheer Squad” doesn’t get one very far in the career world, and without any experience in the work force it was pretty hard for the new graduate to find a good job. Or, rather it was hard for her to find a well paying job, which was her only discretion; she absolutely refused to touch those nasty, greasy burgers down at Nasty Greasy Burger.

One roommate led to another as her limited funds quickly dried up; first her parents’ house, then the coffee shop guy, who preceded her dad’s secretary and who in turn was followed by the sexy Greek guy at BarStucks. But after coming across her old friend and former cheerleader Hannah Jones on Palster, Claire had found herself a long term roomie who was more than willing to share her dorm with her former captain while she studied at college. But unlike Hannah, Claire didn’t need to go college because she was going pull her crap together any day now. Or, at least that’s what she’d been saying for the last five years now.

In that time, Claire Spittz had fallen from grace; severely. Slowly but surely, weekend partying with her old friends and going out on expensive dates had caught up to her within the first few months; thanks to her inability to afford a gym membership. After having ballooned up a few sizes thanks to generous dates and lots of booze, Claire found herself alone during the day without even Hannah to keep her company. This meant lots of TV watching and Fay’s potato chips in front of the couch. Soon enough, the crème of the crop had fallen through the cracks, growing larger and larger as she grew lazier and lazier. Hannah had often come home to Claire’s engorged and bloated body passed out early on the couch after a hard day of the munchies and eating up the electric bill. Life as a professional freeloader must have been so hard.

Today, just like any other day, Claire had successfully accomplished nothing in her spare time other than taking up space and snagging the number one spot on the leader boards for Hollow 3. She adjusted her headset, moving the microphone on her F-Box controller to better allow another salty handful of Cheesee’s into her fat mouth. She moved one fleshy arm to grab her Big Gulp, awkwardly maneuvering the straw passed her crumb-covered lips to take a huge slurp of her soda. She let out a relaxed exhale, content with herself and all of her laziness. Expertly, with one plump hand, she blasted her main competition right out of the water. She pumped her doughy arm, flab squishing against itself in her euphoria, “WHOO!!” Claire cried victoriously as she wobbled a small victory dance from her seated position, “Take THAT Pinstriper, Sexygrrl22 just beat yo’ ASS!!”

Claire reached into the box beside her as she waited for her competition to respawn, taking out one of the many plastic-wrapped chocolate cakes and started to tear at the packaging, “I think this calls for another victory cake, boys!” the morbidly obese victor cheered as she crammed the entire thing into her mouth. “Oh come on!” one of her opponents whined, “You’ve had like, twenty of those since we started!” another cried. “Oh be men about it, you all just got beat by a girl!” Claire taunted the losers, still shuffling slightly on her couch. “Ah don’t let this fat bitch get you down,” one disgruntled player said, “I saw her at Mal-Mart the other day, trust me we’re the real winners here.” Everyone started to laugh at her, something that pushed Claire into arguing the best she could, “Hey, shut up you loser!” she whined unintelligibly, “You’re just jealous that I’m number one!” Between the snorts and giggles, someone managed to pipe, “Number one fat ass, maybe.”

“UGH!!” she didn’t have to take this kind of abuse, one pudgy thumb pushed the center button on her controller and she shut off the system. She crossed her meaty arms over her billowing belly and huffed, changing the television back to cable. Where did guys get off treating her like that?

Relaxing from her gaming stance, Claire’s many hind rolls fell to the back of the couch as she struggled to lift up her legs, shifting into a much more comfortable position. Her sweats, barely able to hold the jiggling cargo already stuffed into them, immediately ripped at the enhanced pressure. “Crap.” She grunted, pausing from throwing an undeserved victory cake into her maw but doing little about it. Actually, Claire rather liked the breeze on her wide wobbling thigh after a long hard day of gaming had overheated it. “Hey, Claire?” Hannah’s voice calls from her room, “Could you come here for a sec?” Claire was quick to respond with, “Ugh, you know very well that I can’t!” she strokes her belly out of habit, pampering the instrument that had driven her to her new lifestyle, “I just made leader on Hollow 3!”

Hannah paused, “It’s kinda important!” she sounded angry, not that Claire really cared, “Why don’t you just come here!” the more rotund roommate whined lazily, “Oh come on, I’ve seen you get up to grab yogurt all the time!” Hannah barks, the door slamming as she storms down the hallway. Claire’s immense middle jiggled slightly with Hannah’s stomping about, “Hey, could you keep it down?!” she barked, “You’re making me wobble!!”

“Claire.” Hannah barked, now standing directly between the jumbo cheerleader and MVT, “We really need to talk…”
125331.title: Claire Spittz

choices: Jump right in with a webcam
1253311.content:
Claire's heart dropped. She was now mentally comparing the pro's and cons of continuing to live here.

"You can't just keep sitting around and letting me support you" Hannah continued, a little calmer, "You are eating me out of house and home".

Claire remained quite, visibly unhappy at the thought of working but quite. She knew arguing back would be a waste of energy so she let Hannah continue.

"All you do all day is eat and sleep" Hannah was starting to lay on this tired old lecture, "and before you say anything else, walking to the door for take out and playing video games does not count as a valid exception".

It was like she read her mind, Claire felt her self shrink slightly into the fold of her neck fat. Hannah really did know her. Claire had begun to subconsciously began to play with her belly out of comfort.

"Listen Claire, I like you, I always have", the skinny friend put her hand to her head, rubbing her temples to calm down, "but you really need to help me out. I don't know if I am going to make rent some months, because of the amount of food I gotta buy.

She didn't need to say it. Claire knew why she needed to buy extra food, she was the reason. It was painfully obvious and she felt something, a slight pang of humanity. She felt guilty.

"Okay Hannah", Claire finally piped up, "I will try to bring in a little extra cash, I hate it when you get mad like this. Just leave it with me".

As selfish as Claire was she was telling the truth. Hannah was the closest thing she had to a best friend, and she has never really asked anything of Claire. So it was only right to get a job, but what? Who would hire a tub of lard like Claire?

Hannah seemingly satisfied with the result of her outburst left the room, somewhat stunned by how easy that was. Claire on the other hand was heaving her mass up out of her seated position. Her body bounced, wobbled and jiggled as she manoeuvred her hulking body out of her seat and waddled towards her computer. Her belly bounced out her shirt and the rip in her pants only widened. But Claire powered through, her folds rippling violently on her short waddle until she reached her destination. At this point she was red in the face and more than happy to plant her behemoth bottom on her extra wide computer chair.

Claire then took to the internet, opening a search engine and looked up phrases such as "Jobs for fat girls" and "Ways to make money with no work". Eventually she came across something very interesting. She found a few websites in which larger women made money by making videos. This seemed perfect, she could be like the fat lady on her screen, sitting and eating, and still get paid.

She got a little bit excited, rubbing her belly once more. But now she had a conundrum, how should she start?
1253311.title: Look, I can't keep you up anymore. You need...

choices: Hannah comes home - she is weirded out and Claire has to come up with something.
12533112.content:
Claire continued her game of Hollow 3. These idiot teammates were getting her heart-rate up, hunched over on the couch with her several rolls accentuated the sides of her gargantuan gut. She had to restrain herself - she was at risk of being downranked because of these fools. She had to take a moment to angrily scarf down a bag of Cheesees. With some dedicated focus, she leaned in towards her T.V, fixating her attention on every little pixel, too focused to even eat more snacks. Focus down that one, he was their main damage dealer. He's down, now their healer - down, and the rest fell like sticks. One more push and victory came across her screen. She spoke up at the end, as she rubbed her back, which was chronically aching from her massively obese torso and her poor posture. "Man, my back hurts from carrying these guys. GG." A few salty insults flew - "Fuck you, bitch, get off the console!" She tuned the rest out - she had long learned from gaming to take pleasure in these insults. It was a sign she was doing well. She leaned back against the couch - shit, her back really did hurt. She drowned any possible thought on why that was with some Fay's chips.

Afterwards, she opened her laptop. She had struggled through the process of setting up her website, the interface being so clunky - but she managed to set up an account with FeeDeeMe, an up-and-coming feeder site with a few other models. She had agreed to the contract - from every video, profits were split 60-40 - the website took 40 percent of the profits. A nasty and frankly unfair rate, and Claire didn't stop grumbling for a while at it - but it was this or a personal clip site, and she figured she could do more with the resources of an organized network that might even help with her online presence.

Then came the fateful fact - she would have to film a first video to begin monetization. But what to go for? She COULD try to just talk about how fat she wanted to get - a nice, low-effort alternative - but she wanted to go all-out for this. This was her nice, easy future, after all. That involved a big stuffing.

At first, she thought about calling Hannah and waiting for her to get home with the stuff - but no, that would involve getting her involved - she'd ask questions, judge her, and she wanted to go ahead and film NOW. So she did the main reasonable thing. She dialed up from DoorSprint, the food delivery service, and ordered up a stromboli, a large pepperoni pizza, some garlic knots - make that STUFFED garlic knots, Mondino's knew how to make those well - and some cannolis, couldn't miss those. The total of sixty-seven bucks and seven cents made her cringe - hopefully she'd make more than her money's worth from this.

She had a ping of thought requiring her first to get up - She folded her laptop after paying for the heftily priced order, left it atop the coffee table, and shuffled forward. The couch groaned as her 500 pound heft taxed the frame of the sorry piece of furniture. The massive woman then leaned forward, using her blubbery arms to propel her somewhat upward while using what little of her muscular strength remained to perform basic functions. Even this simple task was difficult - it was the most intensive part of any day. She carefully then hefted her torso upward, trusting her lardy legs to hold her up. They did as requested - partly supported by the mass of fat coating the atrophying muscle that performed the task.

She eventually waddled and huffed her way to her room and searched for her old trusty BunoVista 258 camcorder and its microphone mount - she had bought it a while back when she had a fairly sizable Spaz streaming channel for Hollow - that is, before she got banned for a few unfortunate comments on stream. Squeezing her massive frame through the threshold, she felt her love handles and saddlebags roughly impact and pinch through the threshold - she fit, for now. She passed her queen sized bed and went towards her four-foot beige dresser. She bent down - a task her knees popped and protested at - and opened the third drawer down, finding the camera. She'd used it to film a few sexy videos back when she was some 300, 350 pounds lighter, and left them for some of her more attractive roommates. She did remember that the sexy greek guy did, in fact, give her some - and that was when she was getting towards 300. She briefly pondered where he was now - obviously, he was down with fatter women, and that could be useful to put on the pounds for the online crowd. She then turned and picked up her tripod - sitting just below it - then leaned on the dresser and pulled her mass upward. This task accomplished, she took a moment to breathe. She resisted the temptation to sit on her bed - she knew she'd never get up, her lungs burned from the intense task of getting up once, twice, and them waddling to her room left her lungs taxed. Her face was sweaty - but she dedicated herself to the task of moving back towards the den. She set up the tripod at an angle from the front door, not visible easily to those standing, but easily able to see them. She then mounted the camera to it, and hit 'Record.' She spoke after waddling backward and waving a bingo-wing-laced arm at the camera.

"Heyyy guyyysss~," she panted, "ClaireBBW here, with my first video." She gasped for a breath and spoke up. "My takeout should arrive any second here, I ordered a LOT of stuff from a pizza place, because I'm.." she giggled nervously, and tossed a roll. "A big, blubbery, fat girl, who just wants to get fatter.." She took a gasp, "And fatter.. I'm already huge, obviously. I'm so fat that I could barely pull my camera stuff.." Another gasp, "My heart... Is racing..." She thought, in the moment. She couldn't think about any way to showcase that to the camera - she realized, she could waddle closer to the protruding microphone. The extendable microphone was such a useful feature! She pressed the microphone close to her breast, felt the fuzz of the microphone on her clammy, sweaty breast as her heart beat out of her chest and her lungs struggled to pull air and then distribute it through her vast body. There was a pang of awkwardness - this was a weird thing to be doing. At this exact moment, she heard the doorbell ring.

She gasped and spoke, "Ooh, my food." She wobbled towards the door and opened it. She opened the door to see a somewhat pudgy, bespectacled black deliveryman with a beard. The young man had at his feet a veritable pile of food that tempted Claire to immediately take it and eat it. "Hii!~" spoke the mammoth of a woman. The man's face remained poker-ish for a moment, but cracked ever so slightly - his brows raised by a hair's breadth, then settled - as if his train of thought ran - Jesus, this woman is fat, and then, Oh, obviously, she's ordered this much food, probably just for her alone. "Yeah," he spoke in a fairly high tone, "Uhh, I've got a pep and bacon stromboli, large pep pizza, garlic knots and cannolis, for you?" His voice betrayed his thoughts more - he intoned upward at the end. "Yeahh," said Claire, "A girl needs to keep her figure up," She jiggled a roll at the delivery man. His brows raised, his eyes widened and his pupils shrank, his brows raised in shock. He chuckled, obviously nervously, and then handed her the food. "Uhh, here you go." Claire handed him 8 dollars beforehand, "Oh, uh, your tip." He nodded gratefully as he handed her the food afterward, "Thanks, enjoy."

Claire took the mound of food and settled it on the table, moved a bit closer to the door from the kitchen which was due to the left of the door, Claire's room being a straight shot and to the right down a hallway. Claire began speaking in panted tones as she opened the containers, "So, you can tell he was pretty uneasy at the sight of me," She gestured to her huge body, "Obviously, because I'm such a whale." She proceeded to dig in - ooh, the stromboli was so cheesy, and the bacon added a beautiful crunch. The pizza was so deliciously greasy, and she continued on eating - the whole meal being wonderfully greasy, cheesy, and fattening. She felt herself getting fatter by the moment, her gut began to become distended. She had finished her stromboli, a fairly large thing of about a foot and a few inches wide, and half of her garlic knots, as well as a few slices of the pizza, when she began to fill up. This was a lot, even for her. But she had an impetus now - she had to eat for her supper, like an Ourobouros fulfilling its own purpose.

So, she ate on - towards the end, she felt the pangs of pain shooting through her stomach as she finished the last cannoli. She yelped in pain. "Ouwwww! Ouwhhhh..." She could barely breathe, her stomach was packed tight, insanely tight. She stared at it in horror - was her girth already going to be her end? "Ohgod... I overdndn't.." Every panting breath felt like a gasp, every single one a fight against her packed gut which sat easily at 80 inches empty, but it had to be 90 now, at least. It felt like 100. She couldn't even think about getting up. She could barely stay conscious - especially after those cannolis. She simply passed right out on the table - a little power nap, let the food digest.
12533112.title: First steps.

choices: Claire uploads her video - and it's a hit! She gains a loyal fanbase overnight!
Claire's video is a flop - she'll have to try harder, and get a "real job."
125331121.content:
"Claire."
"CLAIRE!"

Claire Spittz was finally awoken by the shrill yelling of her thinner, strawberry blonde roommate, Hannah. Claire jolted awake and rubbed her aching stomach, "Ouwwww... Hey, Han." Hannah groaned. "I'm used to you slumming it in the couch like that, but can you at least throw away take-out if you order in like this? Plus, you're on the table - if you're gonna eat this much, at least do it on the couch!" Hannah began turning around when she saw a red light. She turned and saw the camera and looked quizzically into it. "What's with the camera?" Claire rubbed her eyes - god, she was thirsty. "Uh..."

She was dumbstruck. What was she going to tell her roommate? She found a job eating herself fatter? That would make her sound loony, and worse, risk herself being kicked out. She had to cook up a lie, and cook it up quick. "Uhhh, I was filming a mukbang." Claire had heard of the genre of online video - and it might be a good cover story. Hannah raised her eyebrows, "A what?" Claire began filling her in, "A mukbang, it's basically where you.." She took a moment to pant, take a breath, "...eat on camera and talk to the viewers like they're there with you." Hannah looked, confused and slightly disgusted, at the camera. "Uhhh... Okay. It's still recording, want me to shut it off?" Claire nodded, and spoke. "Uh, yeah... Yeah..." Then, mercifully, Hannah ticked the camera off, as it stopped recording. Hannah spoke up, "I'll take out the boxes, you look tired - hope this makes you some money." Claire waved her hand, "Yeah, yeah, I remember our talk. I think it will."

With that, Hannah handily picked up all the boxes and hauled them downstairs. Hannah had gone. That was DAMN close. She was within a pinch of revealing herself to a whole new battery of awkwardness that she wasn't ready for. Now she had to get up - a hard task, made even harder by her still fairly taut gut. She struggled to back the chair up, and managed to plant her feet firmly on the ground. She was somewhat dizzy from the backward slide and she began trying to stand up, using the lean and heave technique - but there was a whole lot to heave. She knew if she let herself fall backward, she'd break the chair, and she was not ready, so she dedicated herself to going upward. Her poor legs were fighting this, but she did it - stumbling forward for a moment, but catching herself - the table had been adjusted right against some moulding and it held against her slight onslaught. That was even closer - Hannah was not a stranger to such accidents.

The wobbling whale then thudded her way to the sink - she grabbed a glass of water and chugged nearly the whole thing - still not enough, she grabbed another glass and turned about. Her back was killing her, still in chronic pain from her ever-soaring weight, but she was feeling a little better with some water. She took the video out of her camcorder, and began processing it into her computer. She killed some time playing some more matches of Hollow, and she had a very satisfying game - down to the last second, but someone on the enemy team managed to barely clutch the game. She couldn't even be mad at the skill everyone displayed, and the game left her feeling far, far better. Even better was when she slid over, and saw that her video had uploaded.

Of course, there was work to be done, and she was a little rusty - she cut out the long stretch of her being passed out, obviously, and she cut some of the unnecessary pauses out - but when all was said and done, there was about an hour of footage. FeeDeeMe suggested a few options after she had finished uploading - $2 a minute, making the grand video about $120, or $3 a minute, making it about $180. Claire DID want people to buy it in fairly large amounts - so she chose the first option. She then cut up the eating and the deliveryman interaction into two additional videos, which sold for about $20 and $80 respectively, for shorter and cheaper options. She watched a few more videos, then rolled over and then repeated the chore of getting up, wobbling to her bed, and went to sleep. Only the next day would tell how her video had done.
125331121.title: Hard Explanations and a shot in the dark.

choices: Claire keeps filming - Hannah finds out the nature of what she's doing.
Claire keeps filming, but Hannah stays in the dark - just so.
1253311211.content:
Claire could be quite a hard sleeper, but some things occasionally broke that.

A while back, that was her mom's yelling on school days, afterward it would be her roommates waking her up for whatever job she had tried and failed to float around. She was usually even able to out-sleep alarms and isolated phone vibrations. This morning, however, something was way off. FeeDeeMe automatically e-mailed her for each purchase of her material - and the phone was vibrating off the hook - enough to wake the slumbering behemoth. She elbowed her way deeper into her mattress, then to her side facing the nightstand where her phone charged. It had a whole row of notifications, all of them from FeeDeeMe - notifications of customers buying her clips! There were about ten people who, overnight, had bought her $120 clip, and roughly another fifteen who had bought her $80 clip or her $20, split about 5-10. Accounting for the site taking about 540 from her profits, she had made about $1260 from clip sales - and she had already gotten two emails, asking for a subscription- based service with a flat fee a month.

"Holy shit..." said Claire. She was gobsmacked - this was just night one, and she had already made enough to pay the next month's rent from her end, some $800 with $460 left over. Claire's new Chirpr account for her ClaireBBW persona had accumulated some 300 followers, and her teaser shots already had some 100 likes per pic - and more followers were coming in every few minutes, to the point where she had to turn off the notifications. She was truly on her way - but now the hard part hit her. She would have to manage her schedule, and come up with thoughts for new videos.

Claire rolled off her bed and lumbered towards the kitchen. She rubbed at her back - the pain wasn't as bad this morning, but it tended to get worse as the day went on. She had to grab a few pastries for her morning - they tended to be around for her own convenience, and her growing addiction to sugar made it less of an indulgence and more of a medication. She scarfed a few packages down - packages meant to be spread out over a few uses - and then brought a few of her choice treats to the couch for some good old fashioned planning, and then some Hollow 3. So, what would she do next? The stuffing was obviously popular - but when given the choice, there was some audience for her voyeur and humiliation based content. The humiliation content might involve some movement outside the house - quite an issue. On the other end, stuffing would risk oversaturating her page with stuffings - especially if it were the same old italian food. She would have to vary it up.

In the meantime, she continued eating herself larger. She couldn't shake the feeling that something was starting to be wrong, with the constant back aches at least. Additionally, she was starting to feel the pull of her sugar addiction, but she wasn't quite sick of sugar - she was simply becoming aware she was being more and more addicted to not just all food, but addicted to sugary foods in particular. Even as she was finishing up drawing up some brainstorming, she consumed a 2-pack of cookies as easy as breathing - which itself was a laborous task for her as her heft increased. But this concern was drowned by more food and more gaming - she was getting nice and high in the ranks for Hollow 3, but as a result her games were getting more difficult - she had to learn more and more new tips and tricks to stay on her edge. She played so long that she barely noticed when Hannah got home. "Oh, Han, I got some news for you - check your PartnerPay." The thin strawberry blonde drew out her phone and checked - "Oh, you've got the month's rent from your half! Thanks - so that muck-bang or whatever makes you some money, huh?" Claire nodded - trying to conceal her deception. "Yep. I get to eat on camera and just make money from it." Hannah chuckled, "I shoulda figured you'd find a way to do it - wish I could do that." Claire raised an eyebrow, "Well, I might need some help sooner or later with filming - I might need a hand with setting up the camera and such."

Hannah nodded, "Well, I'll keep that in mind! Maybe next time you're filming on a weekend, or on a morning before I head to work." Claire nodded cautiously. She just realized that if Claire ever did take her up on her offer, her deception might be discovered - a potential bridge to be crossed later, IF Hannah were ever to help her out. For now, she was busy queuing up for ranked in Hollow 3.

Hannah came home later that day.
1253311211.title: A new BBW legend!

choices: Claire ignores Hannah and keeps gaining.
Claire listens to Hannah - but weight loss is an uphill battle.
12533112111.content:
As the days went on, Claire put off filming another clip - it was simply so much work to set up her camera! She was already so hard-worked - she had fans to interact with on Chirpr, custom orders to take and note down - it was a lot of work to eat so much. But the money that was rolling in! In the week since she'd put up that first clip, she had made nearly $2,000 more in sales. But the success wouldn't last if she didn't continue with similar energy - she had to keep filming.

Filming meant moving around, setting things up - a task that was already becoming nigh impossible due to her continuously fattening body. Her gut continued to burst forth from her tops, which had never truly fit her right after 400 pounds. Her shorts were becoming engulfed in the fatness of her legs, her thighs keeping the fabric drum-tight. Her breasts had been blown up a little by her gains, but not close to the beating her lower half had taken. Her mobility and fitness was taking such a beating that she could barely set up a camera - she obviously needed some help. She had to bite the sour apple and ask Hannah one weekend, turning to her as she sat at the dinner table. "Hey, Han - would you be down to help me film tomorrow?" Hannah nodded, "Sure! I don't got nothin' to do."

The day went by as it normally did - Claire played some games of Hollow 3, responded to some customers - apparently the site was having an issue processing payments from some regional banks. Not wanting to be played, she proceeded with caution and told them that she would love to make sure they got their video as soon as the site's processing was done. Claire had frustratingly had to go to the bathroom more these days - a problem that cost her at least one game. She had a modicum of self-respect left, but it was genuniely exhausting, going to the bathroom so frequently. She was considering bringing it up at her next doctor's appointment for Disability, which was coming up in the next month.

The day of action came about, and Hannah was kind enough to lay out the massive spread of Chinese takeout that Claire had ordered. It didn't fail to stun her - "Jeez, Claire, this is a lot of food. Plenty of filming." Claire smiled and spoke up, "I know - thank you for setting everything up." Hannah laid out two plates, and Claire took her two seats - she needed two for her growing rear. Hannah spoke up, "How do you want it set up?" Claire hummed and spoke up, "Like, there -" She pointed at a point forward and left of the ball of blubber - an angle that would both get her face eating the food, but get a fair profile shot of her vastness. Hannah spoke up, "You sure? The angle from here isn't the most flattering." Claire waved her hand, "It's fine, It's fine. It, uh... It makes it more genuine." Hannah goggled at this, but held the camera firm.

The red light went on.

"Heyy, guys. ClaireBBW here, I've got another big, big stuffing, just for you." Hannah stayed behind the camera - but immediately, things seemed off. She had taken some time to look for Claire's mukbang channel, but she couldn't find it. The language was different than anything any of the normal channels used - she outright called it a stuffing. It got weirder for Hannah as Claire jiggled her bottom belly roll, and spoke, "As you can see, I've really packed on a few pounds. I'm due for a weigh-in anytime soon - I can't wait to see how much I am now. I think, last I checked just before I got filming, I was like 508, 509." It was becoming obvious now - Claire was talking about her weight openly - a subject that Hannah tread so ever lightly on. Every inch of her skin was crawling at this realization, and she could not get away from the thought that especially at Claire's size, the last thing she needed was to stuff herself for money. This thought became louder as Claire continued eating, her face continually orgasmic at the first few bites, then settling down as she stuck in for the long haul of eating.

Hannah dutifully kept filming, she did want Claire to be able to pay her rent - but she couldn't shake the moral quandry she was having. After a fair, long time, Claire sat back, rubbing her belly, moaning - not in as much pain as she was the first time, but still wincing at the fullness of her stomach after eating the hoard of food. Claire spoke up, "Uh, Hannah..." She took a few shallow breaths, "Could you..Shuthecam'raoff.." Hannah did as asked, but spoke up after. "You didn't tell me you were doing this stuff. I don't know if I can be comfortable with this." Claire shook her head sluggishly and spoke up, "Oh... C'mon Han... I pay rent..." Hannah grimaced, "I get that, and I'm thankful you do now, but I don't know how much more I can help you with this." Claire looked quizzically at her, her eyelids struggling not to shut. "Wh.. Wh'd'ya mean?" Hannah rested two fingers against her temple. "You can barely set up a camera, I always hear you talk about how much pain you're in...You've moved around less and less... I'm worried about you, Claire. I'm worried you're eating your way into your grave if you keep on with this."

A kesselschlacht of emotions assailed Claire. On one hand, she was terrified - she knew subconsciously her health was deteriorating by the week. She had been getting worried about her increasing addiction to sugar, and this paired with her longstanding subconscious fears about her weight. These pre-existing fears paired with what Hannah was saying to create a terrifying meld of truth - Claire's brain raced at this thought - God, is she right? Is this going to kill me?

At the same time, a rejection formed - how dare Hannah talk about her like this? It was obvious to the paranoia of being ridiculed for her weight that Hannah must be talking about her to her friends! How obese and how much of a hog she was - who was this bitch to talk about her like that? This paired with a denial, a flat denial which tempered the flash of anger - Hannah was just worried - too worried. Claire was fine, wasn't she? She wasn't dead, she was still able to move - she moved around too much in her own opinion.

Both of these, though came together somewhere deep and dark in Claire's soul - a tiny part of her that said, Yes, this is going to kill me - and that makes it even hotter. All of these emotions left Claire stunned as Hannah went on, "I've seen how much sweet stuff you've been eating, and how you're always tired - you're always thirsty - you're always even more hungry. Babe, you're not even thirty yet - you're over 500 pounds, and you've obviously got Diabetes, or something wrong with you - Let me help you. I'll pay more of your rent if you work on your health, work on your weight." The last part actually drew Claire, and set up reliable opposition for her fattening urges.

Claire had to make a decision - either reject Hannah's advice and continue gaining, regardless of the costs, or listen to Hannah and try to lose some weight.
*Author's Warning - the story will likely get more morbid from here. Continue only if you are into the darker sides of weight gain.*
12533112111.title: The Feedee Revealed

choices: Hannah's suspicions are confirmed at Claire's next doctor's appointment.
Claire's profits don't come at a cost - her disability is taken away.
125331121111.content:
The blubbery whale that was Claire Spittz proceeded along the path of gaining weight.
Her filming sessions continued to annoy her, as Hannah no longer had the will to help her after her impudent outburst around a month ago. Hannah still talked to Claire, but she seemed to have a constant look of sadness on her face when looking at her friend. Claire still couldn't get why her friend had just up and abandoned her! Whatever, she thought to herself over her second large bag of Goldfish that day, I'll gain without her.

And gain without her Claire did. She was putting the same effort into gaining weight that most people put into losing it - logging her intake with nearly scientific precision, and weighed in at the end of every week on Friday mornings. Her weight had skyrocketed - going from around 509 to 517, then to 525, and now, she stood at 535. The insanely rapid gains were especially hitting her hips and gut, which now grew by at least five inches - around 85-90 empty, and easily 110 when stuffed. Her legs seemed to begin to merge together, like a solid wall of fat, when put together, upon which Claire's belly tenouously began to hang on the precipice of her overtaxed knees, which themselves sprouted fat rolls at the division between her cankles and her vast, fat thighs. All of this had the result of making Claire explode in all directions. Her old clothes from the past years were completely unwearable – she had ordered some clothes from Roarid, a double-plus size company just for women her size.

But she was beginning to notice more problems, problems that would come up shortly at her doctor's appointment. For one, what Hannah had ascribed, likely ignorantly, to Diabetes was getting worse and worse - she became thirstier and felt like endless waves of pins and needles assailed her feet. Even sitting down, her heart beat like an over-excited drum against her chest - and any physical activity, such as setting up the camera, left her nigh-incapacitated.

She tried not to think about it as she ate some pasta on camera - pausing only briefly to rub at a sharp pain in her chest. Likely indigestion, the morbidly obese woman told herself. She had read several articles that people could be healthy at any size! She was becoming increasingly interested in this - the idea that she was just fine. She wasn't feeling the best physically, sure, but that didn't matter! She felt as good about her body as she ever did - absolutely turned on by every single pound she put on. She filmed quite a few masturbation videos between stuffings, but even that was becoming harder with her skyrocketing weight.

Despite any health spooks, she continued rolling in the money - she was even able to buy a few conveniences around the place, like a dishwasher, and a handcart to help wheel out the hordes of takeout boxes she had ordered to gain, since Hannah was having no part in feeding Claire's self-destructive gaining. Her fat had begun to take on a role as a "moneymaker" - a provider not just for itself, but for her and Hannah. Hannah even had to admit that the hedonistic lifestyle that Claire had taken on was doing well for her, at least.

All of this had the side effect of making Claire feel like she had to focus down on the filming and eating – she found herself playing less Hollow 3 for the sheer volume of food she had to intake, for the constant filming she had to do. This fed into a cycle of eating more food out of stress, and the eating of food out of stress gave her less time to play Hollow – leading to more stress eating. She was playing the game less and less, and eating and napping more and more. She began to do almost literally nothing but eat, sleep, and film the process. She had even began streaming hours of herself live, repeating this process – a lucrative trade in and of itself, bringing in a good extra $200 a week on slow weeks – usually going above $1000. Hannah had no clue just how much not only Claire but Claire's bank account was ballooning as a result of her new dedication to stuffing her face.
125331121111.title: Damn the health problems, full speed ahead!

choices: Claire listens to the darkest voices! She eats herself towards morbidity!
Claire listens to reason! She takes a break from camming and tries to diet.
1253311211111.content:
Finally, the day of the appointment came around for Claire. She had to secure transportation in the form of Hannah taking a day off work to get her there - “Certainly,” she had responded to Claire's request, “Anything for you – especially if it gets you to the Doctor's.” Claire frowned at this – she had heard Hannah's nagging about her health endlessly.

The worst part was, Claire was starting to get worried herself. In the days leading up to the appointment, her chest pains had gotten worse, and she had begun feeling inappropriately sleepy – sometimes in the middle of stuffings. At least for the sake of her stuffings, she had to do something to hold off these seemingly random symptoms. Hannah drove Claire to the medical center, a vast complex of round curves bounded by glass and steel. The sun glinted off of the glass exterior on the towers and centers of this medical complex. A part of Claire noted that if she were to have some issue, at least she wouldn't have to go TERRIBLY far.

Hannah helped the huge woman out of the bed of her truck – far too large for the cab – and then to the lobby. The morbidly obese woman was a sight – even among the fat patients in the lobby, she was by FAR the widest and the roundest, particularly accentuated in her wheelchair she used to get out of parking lots as she stood up from it. She could feel the eyes on her – and it turned her on, to a degree. The knowledge that she had become such a fatass that she was drawing immense judgement in this hospital waiting room. Hannah helped Claire wobble to the check-in desk. “Name?” the thin, latina assistant spoke up. She began eyeing up Claire, as she spoke, “Claire Spittz – here for my check-up, part of my Disability.” The latina assistant deftly avoided rolling her eyes as she thought, Ah, yes, the disability of being a morbidly obese hog.

The pair looked around for seats – but the only ones available in 90 percent of the lobby had steel armrests between each seat, absolutely not an option for the barely mobile ball of fat that was Claire Spittz. They looked around and found what had to be the most humiliating row of seats – a row of seats for the disabled that had no armrests. The label was 'Disabled,' but it honestly ought to have just been an obese stick figure – most folks in wheelchairs could simply park against the wall. Claire sat down – she proudly noted to herself that she began to fill out not one, but both seats that she sat on.

Eventually the mocha-skinned assistant called out her name, “Claire Spittz, doctor Akavian will see you now.” Claire then followed the route she did whenever she had to go to this place – down the hall, open the door, turn right – stop to catch a breath, that one was a new addition, and then proceed until a door was reached that read '116.' She opened the door and began moving through it, but halted halfway.

Holy, fucking, shit, i'm stuck in the door of my doctor because I'm so fucking fat, thought Claire. This was a master class in embarassment and humiliation, and it was only the beginning. Hannah helped push Claire through – grunting, “Jeez, Claire, you think the Doctor notices you've gained weight?” Claire giggled and spoke up, “I'unno, have I... Put on some.. weight, doctor A?” Akavian, the leathery Caucasian physician with brown hair and hazel eyes, shook his head at the morbidly obese woman as he helped pull her through. “This is not funny, Claire. Step on the scale – we need to see this first.” Claire already knew what it would say – 541.8 pounds. Akavian chimed out, “Five hundred and two point six pounds.” Ooh, a bit heavier today, thought Claire. Akavian ran through his usual battery of tests – blood pressure, of course with the extra large cuff for Claire's jiggly, fat arm, calipers, measuring.

Akavian finished, and then asked, “So, before I talk about your numbers, let me ask if anything is wrong.” Claire spoke up, “Uh, I've been feeling, like, numbness in my feet – I've been really thirsty recently, and my chest has been hurting.” She began to feel a pang of sleepiness, but tried to fight it off, swatting it away, but not before it scored a yawn. Akavian tisked, and spoke up. “Then I'll definitely need some bloodwork done – just as a formality, because I'm almost certain you are a diabetic by this point.” Akavian began writing a battery of things down, then turned with a grim, sad face to Claire. “So, I do not need to tell you that you have gained weight – it is obvious to us both. Your other numbers are terrible – your blood pressure is one hundred and fifty two over one hundred – and your last test showed one hundred and forty nine over ninety eight. Your blood pressure has shot up, and your body fat percentage has shot up as well – you're ballooning.” Claire kept her face pinned on the tan Georgian as he spoke his next sentence, as he let it drip with emotion. “Judging by what I already have, you are in dire straits with your health. And it will only get worse with your bloodwork.”

He went through the usual song and dance with Claire – she looked away, he pricked blood from her – but she barely felt it now through her fat – and he inserted the blood into a new spectrometer of advanced design which saved hours of medical testing and was able to give near-instant results. As they came back, Akavian sighed and spoke up. “I know if I ask you what you eat, you will lie to me – you always have, Claire. So I will come out and say it – judging by your bloodwork, I can safely diagnose you with Diabetes type two, and high cholesterol. Judging by some of the results here, we'd need to scan for it, but I can also fairly close to developing Atherosclerotic heart disease, if you don't already have it.” He sighed, rubbed his hands in his face, and turned to Claire. He spoke bluntly as he wrote a perscription. “If you continue eating like you are eating, you are going to be dead before you are thirty. So either listen to me, or write your will – I'm going to give you a meal plan and an exercise plan.”

Claire's face filled with shock. Akavian had been dissapointed before, but this was something new – she heard genuine warning in this leathery, aging man's voice. She was terrified for what lay ahead of her – was death truly so close for her? She was only twenty – three, there must be some mistake – she voiced as much, “How can that be? I'm not even twenty-five!” Akavian took off his glasses and spoke up, “It's because you've gotten so fat, Claire. You're eating yourself into an early grave.” There were those words again, carbon copies of what Hannah had said. Claire was terrified of this – she had only wanted to let loose, she hadn't intended to eat herself to death! She had just intended to take the easiest way out of Hannah's conundrum! She had to get out of this, she had to lose some weight, or she would die!

But like a thief, there crept in that voice again – Isn't it so sexy, the fact that you've eaten yourself nearly to death? How hot would it be if you went all the way? How hot would it be if you ate yourself to death because you're such a pig? She could barely believe that these words were in her brain, but there was something oddly alluring to them – something she began to feel. There was no way she could lose this weight, and this voice played on the logic that instead of expensive, crushingly expensive Weight Loss Surgery, she ought instead to eat herself the rest of the way into her grave. There was that odd, morbid allure to the idea of eating herself to death. What did these forbidden things feel like? What did it feel like to be so fat that one could barely live? What did it feel like to be so obese that you died? Was it as alluring as her deepest, darkest desires said they were?
1253311211111.title: Claire's last chance.

choices: Claire continues gaining - with predictable results both in health and finances.
12533112111111.content:
At first,Claire ignored her doctor's advice out of sheer sloth.

Why go out of her way to work out and eat right? That took too much effort. She had always eaten like this! She had always been this lazy! The doctor was probably peddling bullshit, her conscious mind thought.

Her subconscious, of course, was far more honest with herself. The doctor was telling the truth and she could feel it with every pound added. Her insulin made her feel slightly better from the diabetes, but she refused to let off of her highly processed diet, which she did not shrink at all. Her chest pains still continued on, giving her periodic pangs of doom - but as of yet, the hand of Obesity had not yet come to claim her.

She regaled her audience in detail with the details of her physical declines, and her doctor's diagnoses. She shocked herself as she let slip, "And, to be honest.. it turns me on. The idea that I'm getting too fat to stay alive. The idea that I'm literally such a fat pig that I'm eating myself to death." She jiggled her stomach as she personally took in those words. This thing is going to kill me, and I don't care, her thoughts decisively stated. The voice of reason which had thus far driven her was relegated to a tiny thing.

By far, this was the tiniest thing about her - her sense of reason in regards to food. Her gut became too large and heavy for her to mount it atop her knees - perpetually forced to keep her legs apart for the great girth that was her huge stomach. If her gut's circumference were to be drawn on the ground, four, perhaps five people, could stand within it, and there would still be empty space on the periphery. Her thighs were thickening by the day, and her breasts were finally being fairly hit by her gains, as they still sat atop her massive stomach.

She had the income now to cover the whole of the apartment's rent, and feed herself - fortunate, as Hannah began to threaten to leave as she continued gorging herself. Hannah grew more frustrated, more angry with her. This came to be perfectly clear one day as Hannah came home in the middle of one of Claire's binges, one of the days after the Doctor's appointment. She raised her arms in anger, shaking them. "What the FUCK are you doing!? Didn't doctor A tell you that you are literally dying because of this!?" Claire shrugged and spoke, "Yeah." "Then why the FUCK are you you still stuffing your face! Jesus, you're still filming this shit!" she screamed. She could no longer hold back, and launched viciously into a long tirade, "And you wonder why you have fucking Diabetes! You wonder why you always feel like your heart's trying to quit, because it fucking is, because you're eating like a whale! You're going to die before THIRTY, Claire! Don't you fucking get that? Don't you care? Claire spoke tersely, "We all fucking die sometime, I'm just doing what I want. You act like you're fucking immortal..." she paused, taking a gasp, Hannah seized on the moment, "You can barely actually finish your fucking sentences because you're being crushed by your fat! Jesus Christ! I can barely take it anymore!" Claire continued eating through tears, she spoke up, "Leaveme..thefuck...alone.." Hannah stormed to her room, "I will! I'm going to fucking leave your big, fat ass here alone!"

Claire began suspecting in the days after this clash that Hannah's threats weren't entirely empty. She noticed more things dissapearing into Hannah's room - the things that she remembered Hannah originally brought. Inevitably, there came the day Hannah spoke up - packed boxes littering her room. She presented Claire a piece of paper. Claire squinted through the fat that coated her face and began actually obscuring her vision, reading the words, "How to write a last will." The morbid desires in the pit of Claire's fat self became aroused - Hannah was confronting her with the dark truth that only a friend could present with absolute, blunt honesty. This was not a sterile doctor - this was her strawberry-blonde, thin friend with a wan, concerned, nearly tearful face, handing her what amounted to her last request of Claire. She spoke up, "Please... If you're going to keep eating like this... At least write your will...And think about-" She paused, sobbing, "...About funeral arrangements.." Claire's face was stunned. She could see a vision now - and she spoke up in true pity of Hannah, "I'll write it." Hannah tearfully embraced her friend like she would embrace a dying woman. With that, the strawberry blonde wheeled her boxes out, and the last Hannah saw of her was her thin outline against the light of the door to the outside.
12533112111111.title: Claire listens to the darkest voices! She eats ...

choices: Claire's time comes - her heart disease claims her. Denise must choose her path.
125331121111111.content:
"Claire? Your snack, eat up," spoke a fairly blubbery woman with raven hair carrying a bucket of fried chicken. Of course, no-one in nearly any context could now compare to Claire Spittz in size, but in most other contexts, the woman would be a fairly fat one with her considerable bingo wings and her fat thighs, to say nothing of her 30-inch belly. "Thanks, Denise," said the perpetually breathless Claire. The massive, blubbery woman had long since followed Hannah's advice - her old friend had provided at least a template for one - and had a will written. The document struck a certain something inside of Claire - she was aware of her own mortality, but the fact that she was now absolutely immobile added a lot of inertia to the voice that dominated her, telling that her death by obesity was inevitable - there was no preventing it now.

She certainly was getting closer to the final days - her chest pains were getting worse, and her doctor had to up her blood pressure medication by the very next appointment before the end of the year. Of course she didn't return home for the holidays - she already had enough chastisement about her weight when she was a svelte 300 pounds, or even when she was as 'tiny' as Denise. The last time she weighed in on her Doctor's cattle scale - a weigh-in that made her feel like an absolute whale - she was 655 pounds. In under two years, this 25-year old woman had eaten herself into a category of obesity that few people ever achieve, and had accrued the health results of such - her triglycerides and cholesterol had raised by a few dozen miligrams between her visits, and x-rays had revealed to her the face of her killer - the negative space between the walls of plaque resembled a narrow one-way street, but as with many such streets, traffic was two-ways through this route.

She wondered when the heart attack would come - it would certainly be more merciful than the endless days of eating herself into what she hoped was not a diabetic coma, filming the stuffings with Denise's help. She was truly a lovely feeder, and a kindly nurse - she helped administer Claire's medicine. Her encouragement was the sweetest poison a dying obese girl could ever want. She was at least partially responsible for the past 55 pounds. She also had begun introducing weight-gain shakes into Claire's diet - sugar-free, as too much sugar would outright kill the living embodiment of obesity that was Claire.

One night, Claire polished off one such shake. Her massive gut hung over the edge of the couch, supported upward by her fat knees. Almost all clothes had stopped fitting her, so she was permanently either naked or in a hospital gown. Her chest pains had come to her after taking her medicine - her dosage must be too low again, she'd have to ask her doctor about that at the next appointment. She was then hit with a splitting headache, however - she groaned in pain - a response that only elicited some belly rubbing from Denise - "Yeahhh, your belly must hurt pretty bad, piggy.." Claire waved off at her, holding at her heart - damn, it was jackhammering away in there! She tried to get some breath, calm down - was this a heart attack? She spoke up, through very shallow gasps - "Can't.. Breathe... Heart... Racing..." Denise spoke up, "You're in a hypertensive episode, here, here, here..." she urgently reached for Claire's red pill bottle. Thankfully, her doctors knew that this kind of thing was likely in a woman like Claire who showed no signs of wanting to do anything to reduce her chance of this happening - so they gave her a bottle of Nitroprussides, to a keep Claire alive until she got to a hospital. Denise opened the cap and retrieved one of the high-strength pills. In the meantime, Claire's eyes were wide open, like a fish's eyes - she felt every second go by like an eon, This was life, and it seemed to be fading to her. This would be her world, the last she saw of it, maybe - these walls, the food, the pills that Denise shoved into her mouth.

The next she saw was her industrial-strength bed and the paramedics wheeling in equipment. "HR stable - as stable as it's going to get. BP stable - we've got her." A dominant woman with dark tan skin spoke up, "Stay a little longer, keep an eye out for stroke." Claire had survived her hypertensive episode, at least for now - though it turned Claire on a tad that they had to bring the equipment to her, because she was literally too fat to leave her apartment. She noticed Denise subversively filming the whole encounter - wires on her chest, paramedics attending to her, Claire laying in a gurney special-designed for the obese that she still felt squeeze her love handles. This clip would make bank.
