The effects of these coping mechanisms was obvious as Hannah met Dana and Claire in the hallway with a big bag of food and a tray of drinks. "Yasss," spoke Claire, "You're our savior." Hannah's thighs and spare tire jiggled as she walked to the break room, as did Claire's belly. While not at its former extent by any means, Claire's stomach was certainly no longer a slight, average-looking pudge as it acquired an extra few inches of fat, blossoming out into a fat torso in general. Dana's whole body bounced as she stepped, her gains more evenly spread, and making her appear marginally slimmer.

As they entered the break room, the chubby three drew the eyes of Veronica, Haley, and Anna, who gave the group a friendly, "Oh, heyy, guys! You get that memo sent?" Claire sat down, taking her drink, "Yup, it's sent! Just taking our lunch break." Haley spoke up as the three withdrew their burgers and fries, "Huh. Where's your meal-preps?" Hannah shrugged and spoke, "We figured we'd grab some burgers for lunch." Haley shrugged, "Suit yourselves. I'd grab some too, but those things are killers on the waist." Veronica nodded, and spoke, "Yeah, I quit eating fast food last year. It helped me drop a few pounds in time for bikini season."

Claire held back a cringe - she could see the message as she spoke up, "Yeah... sometimes, you just need a treat, though." Dana nodded as she spoke, "Yeah, compiling those charts was a task and a half, I think I've warranted myself a burger or two." Anna spoke up, "Well, be careful about that stuff. I started thinking like that around Christmas of like, two years ago, and I put on like twenty pounds. I had to work hella hard to lose some weight." Haley hummed in affirmation, "Yeah, lucky you had me to help you along." Veronica chuckled and spoke, "Like you didn't put on a few pounds over christmas yourself, Haley." The break room shared a masking laugh, but in reality, the message was hard to miss.

Claire sought to stamp out the roots of it as she spoke, "Yeah. but I'm pretty sure I'd notice if I was putting on weight like that." Anna didn't say anything, as she preferred to wait for Haley to speak. Veronica dared not speak a contrary word to Claire - she wasn't that blunt. However, Haley LIVED for this kind of office drama, whether she was observing it, or especially if she was causing it. On one hand, she wanted to just let Claire's bunch eat themselves into renewed obesity as she spread the word of their new status as the office fatties. On the other, she would love to see how bad of a ripple she could cause by calling Claire fat to her face. How would this twist into her mind? How would she react?

After a tense few beats, she spoke up...
125331121111121221211211221112111121.title: Subtle snipes in the break-room.

choices: Veronica, ready to chill out and pig out with them!
Haley, ready to nag them about their weight and food intake.
1253311211111212212112112211121111212.content:
The three across the table held their tongues - they were co-workers after all, and to poison the well like that would make the workplace hell on Earth. "I guess you're right. Just watch out," said Haley as she prepared to eat her spaghetti-o's, "Those pounds can creep on you." Hannah, Claire, and Dana ate their fattening burgers and fries as Veronica, Anna, and Haley gave the trio a last few judging glances before resuming polite conversation.

Creep on the pounds did. The meal-planned lunches and their ingredients disappeared from Claire, Hannah, and Dana's refrigerators. There was more fridge space opened up for other things, of course: booze, frozen pizzas, ice cream. Hannah and the trio filled their bellies that spring after the burst of activity in early March. They let their denial run its course, even as they upsized their wardrobes from mediums into larges.

The coming of summer meant a fair degree of relaxation for the trio. One summer weeknight, Claire, Hannah, and Dana gathered at Claire's for a stayover. They felt more like relaxing in, and reclined as Claire worked the grill, sizzling a few Brats. Dana popped open a beer and clinked it against Hannah's as they laid back in the increasingly taxed lawn chairs. Thankfully, these had a weight tolerance of 300, and the girls had not quite topped that threshold, nor quite gotten that close to it. However, it was fairly sure that each was somewhere just over 200. Claire's stomach had grown from a mere few inches of chub into a returning gut that was a solid potbelly. Hannah's lower half could only sustain so many pounds, and her muffin-top stomach was not nearly as stout as Claire's, which rubbed at the metal of the grill, just so. Dana's face began to retain a fair bit of fat along with the rest of her body, and along with Claire, especially began to regain her double-chin.

Claire called, "Brats are up, girlies!" She turned with the plate of steaming sausages and took them to the table. Hannah and Dana grunted as they pulled their increased forms up. It was getting clear that these three were beginning to outpace their scant workouts with food as they pulled themselves into plastic chairs and chased hot, juicy sausage with alcohol and potato chips.

Dana swatted at her head, "Gah, damn mosquitoes!" Hannah spoke up, "Yeah, those things are awful. They don't even pay you for your blood!" Claire chuckled and spoke up. "Would you let them suck your blood if they handed you their little bug debit card?" Hannah nodded firmly, "Hell yeah. Make them bugs pay my bills!" The trio continued eating through the sausages, as they munched on the grilled meat, the grease dribbled down their faces and dripping onto the table. One drop managed to drip down onto Claire's double-chin before falling to the table. Their cheeks bloated with sausage and potato chips, washed down with beers below the dimming summer skies.

Claire smiled as she took in the moment. She enjoyed eating good food and drinking beers with her friends. "Mm," she said, finishing her third brat, "So, I got some good news from the top." Hannah and Dana turned to her, eager for the good news. Claire continued, "So, thanks to our work in March, that memo? Big new acquisition, and our unit's getting a four-person cruise trip, and we're all on it!" The three hollered in celebration, "Oh, that's great," exclaimed Hannah, "Do we know who the fourth person?" Dana spoke up, "God, I hope it's not Haley. She's so passive-aggressive." Claire spoke up. "I really hope it's Veronica. She's got this vibe that I really gel with." Hannah nodded, "Yeah - Veronica would be a good cruise partner.

In the pits of their stomachs, their denials were becoming more burdened by evidence. They could tell that when they DID get to the gym, their fitness wasn't what it was in January. Their up-sizing wardrobe and the simple physical act of examining themselves and thinking, have my toes always been that hard to see, led them to suspect that they were putting on the pounds. However, the obliviousness was in the back of their minds in the face of the exciting cruise! Cruises meant buffets, and their new economic status afforded them a taste at the lavish nature of a cruise. On top of this, they longed for a chance to return to the buffet. They still abstained from this old hunting ground of theirs for the most part, but a corporate cruise - this was the perfect opportunity to indulge and pig out!

The only question was whether Haley would be there to pick at their food choices and gossip about their weight behind their backs, or Veronica, whose cool head could give them a partner in gluttony. As they approached the docks, luggage in hand, they saw, on the end of the docks...
1253311211111212212112112211121111212.title: Summertime Stoutness

choices: Hannah worsens—Claire can't leave her friend alone as she enters hyper obesity
Hannah worsens—Claire decides that she can't live with Hannah anymore.
1253311211111212212112112211121112.content:
For a brief moment, the bitterness and jealousy that had clouded Hannah's heart and mind were pierced by Claire's genuine offer of a helping hand. The weight lifted from her shoulders as, for the first time in a long time, the immense gap between she and her roommate felt minuscule and almost, maybe, surmountable.

All that being said, she and Claire weren't the same people as they had been when the shoe had been on the other foot. Hannah had squandered her twenties while Claire had spent them blowing up and shedding back down, overcoming enormous odds by beating diabetes and shedding more than three hundred pounds while Hannah managed to find almost every single one. Claire had become a monument of self-discipline who had overcome adversity, while Hannah just sort of...

She had...

Wasted... hers, hadn't she?

Hannah's expression darkened as the final embers of the helpful, responsible friend were snuffed out by the powerful weight of denial. Having become so used to justifying her behavior for so long now, it came naturally to Hannah to find some damning fault in Claire's helping hand. Some minor slight that somehow negated the fact that her roommate was reaching out to her, and allowed her to shed the weight of responsibility for her current pitiful state.

"Just fuck off, okay Claire?" Hannah commanded gruffly, "You're not my fucking mom."

"Hannah, I just—"

"What, you just what?" Hannah bumped Claire in the chest, sending the smaller woman toddling backwards, "You think that just because you used to be some colossal fatass that you think you're the Queen of Comfort Food? That you know why I'm so fucking upset?"

"Hannah, listen—"

"No you listen!" Hannah commanded, her heart pounding behind her ears, "I'll eat whatever I want, whenever I want, and just because you think you're better than me—"

"I don't think that I'm—"

"BULL. SHIT." Hannah huffed and puffed, her fat face beet red, "You think that just because you managed to" here she feigned shock, "Lose a hundred pounds or whatever, you think that you're top shit. Well I'm sick of it"

Claire felt a strange feeling rise in the pit of her stomach. It wasn't anger, and it wasn't sadness. The feeling rose to the back of her eyelids, tickling her lips as she felt her eyes grow misty and hot. Her fingertips began to twitch as the fat, blustering hog that Hannah had suddenly snapped into kept bleating at her, screaming until she was hoarse in the throat.

"If I had known what a fucking cunt you'd turn out to be, I'd have never, ever offered to help you get your shit together." Hannah crowed, "If it weren't for me, you'd be lying in a landfill somewhere in a triple-wide coffin. Your fat ass would have had a heart attack and died, and I think I might have been happier that way."

Watching the tears well up in Claire's eyes gave Hannah a sense of enormous power over her roommate. For the first time in forever, Hannah felt... Hannah felt like things were back where they should be.

With her on the top, and Claire on the bottom.

It was only after Claire locked her bedroom door, threw herself onto the bed, and cried into her pillow that she realized what the strange feeling that she felt had been as Hannah had been screaming at her, disparaging her for getting healthy, and practically wishing her oldest friend dead.

It was pity.
1253311211111212212112112211121112.title: How Dare You

choices: Hannah replaces Claire's packed lunches with fattening leftovers.
Claire disguises some healthier food options as fattening snacks.
12533112111112122121121122111211121.content:
The next month seemed to DRAG along for both Claire and Hannah.

After the screaming match that quite literally had a police officer show up to the apartment due to the volume of Hannah's screeching, Hannah's rival still stuck around. While laying there after the screaming match, Claire thought, briefly, about getting Hannah kicked out, or moving in with Dana.

But she couldn't do that - along with the pity came compassion - the recognition that Hannah was in a very dark place, and that while she was being an omega-bitch at the moment, she didn't deserve to be alone. Claire knew the depths of lonesomeness, and it was not a pleasant place - it's a place where even food could be a better companion than nothing at all.

And to the moment, that's what Hannah seemed to be filling her time with. More and more food. It was an insane quantity of food she was consuming - what Claire had thought would be an untenable amount of food consumption became a more long-term habit for Hannah. Weeks went on, and the binges only seemed to grow as Hannah's hips and belly rose like dough on some hellish strain of instant yeast. Two pounds a day became something more like two and a half, and every single week saw a gargantuan rate of expansion on Hannah's part. She began to grow so wide that she could barely fit into the kitchen.

Claire did what she could to be in the same room as Hannah, but Hannah was obviously never in the mood to talk to Claire. Frequently, when Claire came into the same room, she would respond with a bitter, "Whaddaya want," with an occasional "piggy" thrown in as a barb. Claire had learned patience over her journey to lose weight - and it showed in her nearly saint-like manner in ignoring her. Claire was waiting for a new chance to comfort Hannah. She played the long game.

But God Almighty, were there some rough days. Some days, Hannah saw Claire as nothing but a strutting pig on two legs - trying to hold herself above her. On some days where she was especially bad off, her perception was literally altered - she would see Claire as several times fatter than she truly was, and herself as several times thinner than she truly was. One night, Claire was focused on a game and the doorbell rang. Hannah waddled to the door, took the pre-paid pizza, and put it down in front of Claire - "Here, piggy. I know you don't eat anything but pizza. Eat up, fatass." Claire calmly replied, "Thank you, Hannah, but-" Hannah said, "Oh, I get it, I get it, you're too busy with your game, gonna have a heart attack if you lean over and eat it. I can feed it to you." Claire did what she could to ignore Hannah as she tried to shove the pizza into Claire's mouth as she tried to focus on the moving model on the screen. "EAT IT! EAT IT, FATASS, YOU'RE NOT ON A DIET OR ANYTHING, ARE YOU! YOU!? DIETING!? NO FUCKIN' WAY!"

For a moment, Claire grew angry - she did what she could to remind herself that Hannah was having an episode, but she had an irresistable urge to punch her in the mouth which she managed to surmount. Fuck it, she thought, If it makes her fuck off, she opened her mouth and let Hannah feed her a slice of pizza. She slid it in way too far and way too fast, but Claire managed to bite down and save herself from gagging, chewing briefly and swallowing before Hannah fed her the crust. For a slimming girl, she still had a big bite when she needed to use it. "Good fatty. Good. Now eat your fuckin' pizza." Hannah gave Claire some reprieve by heading to her room, slamming the door and giving a moan from within as she worked to come back to reality.

Claire did eat another slice. She had a craving for pizza, and it was fortunate that Hannah had chosen that mode for tonight's episode. It was, however, not at all usually like this when she had her episodes. At times, Claire would be met by a random piece of wrapping paper or cardboard box and a scream, "FUCK OFF, FATASS! GET OUT OF MY LIVING ROOM!" The odd thing is, although Claire frequently felt annoyed and wanted to yell back, she maintained her composure.

Hannah's weight continued to grow exponentially as Claire began to cope with the odd, mercurial nature of her episodes. Every single week she seemed to be able to add another item of food to her binging, and as the month drew to a close, she had grown by well over 80 pounds, brushing up towards the upper 400's from a single month of insane volumes of food.

"That's really not healthy," said Dana, as Claire updated her between sets at the gym. Dana was crushing it at arm strength, while Claire's more naturally bottom-heavy weight lent itself more to better leg strength. "Yeah, and it gets hard to keep calm at times," Claire stated after drinking from her bottle. "I'll say," said Dana, "She threw a bottle at you!?" Claire hummed in affirmation, "I barely dodged it, thank God for cardio." Dana spoke, "So, how the hell are you going to help her? It seriously sounds like she needs to be committed." Claire shook her head, "No, I don't think she does. Number one those places aren't the place for someone like her, a big old' target range for more abusive personalities, if my cousin's to be believed." Dana leaned back, "I thought you didn't stay in contact with your family?" Claire shrugged, "Eh, Cousin Luanne's the exception. She was always on the bigger side, so I could always talk to her, no judgement." Claire paused and thought.

Then, she spoke, "I'm thinking I'm gonna need to step up my cardio regimen," she said. "My bet is that if I seem like I'm going back to getting fat, or eating that way, she'll see me as less of a threat. I can go from there." Dana cringed, "That sounds really risky, what if you actually relapse?" Claire spoke, "That's what the cardio's for - If I can burn off some of what I put on, in the best case scenario, I'll slow down my gain while she gets more friendly with me, work with her to get her back to somewhere more mentally healthy, and maybe then we focus on helping her lose some weight."

Dana thought, "But what if she just gets more abusive?" Claire paused in thought, then spoke, "Well, I guess I'll move in with you then. No point staying with someone who's that toxic if I can't help them."

And as such, Claire stepped up her cardio regimen in the early weeks of that month. Every day was more time that Hannah was binging her feelings away.On that third day in September, on a Thursday, Claire walked to the door as the bell rang. Hannah scowled at her as Claire opened the door and walked back with a stromboli and some breadsticks, sitting across from Hannah. "What are you doing," the morbidly obese mammoth asked. Claire replied, "Isn't it obvious? I'm fat, I've gotta eat." Hannah was a bit tense, but accepting of it at the moment. "Good. I'm happy you get it."

Claire did what she could to stave off the pounds - better than Hannah could say, while Claire put on a pound every week, Hannah was putting one on every 5 and a half hours, a pressing rate of 3 a day. At home, Claire kept up a poker face of a girl who'd accepted being fat - sitting around, playing video games and eating with Hannah. Granted, Claire wasn't BINGING, she just ate more fattening foods, and snacked more. The weight did not perceptibly come on, but her weigh-ins did confirm she was slowly putting on some weight, somewhere under a pound each week.

But her plan was working, to some degree. Hannah was becoming somewhat more jovial, somewhat more accepting of her presence. They began speaking again - joking, laughing occasionally. Although Claire was not very rapidly putting on weight, as Hannah was, Hannah percieved the gain, and her distortion of reality made her percieve Claire as if she was blimping back up. It was comforting to Hannah - things were returning to where they should be! Claire was the fat one.

The only discomfort with that was that as she came more back towards reality, she came to recognize her massive gains. In the month and week since she had begun binging with no concern for reasonable food intake, she had put on somewhere around 100 pounds. However, her mania focused far less on her as "the thin one" and moreso on Claire simply being "the fat one." All that required repairing in this scenario was a recognition of her own status as a fellow fat girl.

In the days coming forward, Hannah's binging happily declined into mere overeating. Granted, it was still a considerable surplus in far excess of what Claire ate, but she wasn't quite eating herself into an early grave anymore, at least not nearly as fast.

The question, however, became more one of initiative. Hannah and Claire spent a good few weeks in their mode - as Claire put on a few pounds, Hannah put on several more. They would glut themselves jointly at home, but Claire would eat modestly at work and spend 2 hours at the gym with Dana every day. The struggle was a subtle one - Hannah tried to encourage Claire's gluttony, Claire tried to encourage Hannah's moderation.

It became a war of food sabotage, and a longer game of who could better influence who.
12533112111112122121121122111211121.title: There for you

choices: Hannah poisons Dana against Claire—as they grow closer, their decline steepens
As Hannah abandons all notions of recovery, she begins to expand in earnest.
125331121111121221211211221112112.content:
Nobody had been more adamant that Hannah needed more friends than Claire.

The fact was that, despite their drifting apart, Claire had been very aware of Hannah's rapid (and worrying) decline. The former five-hundred pounder had been concerned about Hannah's rapid weight gain, but also to the way that she carried herself. Hannah had, once upon a time, been the picture of confidence and healthy choices. Now that she was spending her time holed up in the apartment, stuffing herself and acting so... well, mean towards everyone, Claire had been the first one to try and intervene. That was why she'd been inviting her to the gym—all in hopes of roping Hannah back to a semblance of the person that she used to be. The one that would encourage Claire, instead of avoid her. The one that would build her up with (sometimes overly optimistic) optimism instead of chipping away with passive-agressive comments.

Dana and Hannah had a lot in common, even without their respective weight problems. As Hannah had become more and more sedentary, her outer voice resonated with Dana's inner one. Hannah made jokes during her (rare) goings to the gym about how she'd rather be working through the bottom of boxes and bags than she would through calories, and that really resonated with the fat girl still clamoring at the bars of Dana's psyche.

The fact that they had so much in common, and the fact that she was so worried about Hannah, had been Claire's reasoning for insisting that the two of them get together outside of the gym. Hannah seemed so lonely lately. She hardly left the apartment. And with all of the progress that Dana had made, Claire had thought that it would rub off on Hannah. At least, to a degree—ultimately, nobody was going to get Hannah back into shape but herself. But a good influence was always better than a night on the couch alone!

Claire just hadn't accounted for the fact that, as far as Dana had come, Hannah was that much further gone.

"Yeah, like honestly, fuck the gym." Hannah said with a visceral, greedy bite of fried chicken, "I get that Claire's trying to help, but she's such a fucking food nazi lately."

And Dana laughed in agreement, albeit a begruding one, as she bit into her fourth leg of the evening. Her conscience weighed heavily on her shoulders, but was allieved by the slick grease that allowed it to travel to the back of her mind. Indulgence had become so rare as she'd steadily worked her way down the scale. A bucket and some biscuits weren't going to kill her, she reasoned—what was the harm in engaging with a little honesty for a change?

"I mean, you're not wrong." she laughed, "I'd rather eat chicken than get on that elliptical any day of the week."

Hannah laughed to herself, taking a big congratulatory bite of her ill-gotten goods. She had promised herself a little treat after an especially stressful day at work. Well, a mildly irritating one. The fact that Dana had been her guest for the evening gave her as much of a pass for indulgence as she felt that she deserved—and something told her that this fucking hog wasn't going to judge her for shotgunning a bucket of Colonel Sanders' finest.

"It's like... okay, I know that this is really shit to say." Hannah looked around scandalously, "But I kind of liked Claire better when she was all "I'm fat, I don't give a fuck"."

"Oh my god, right?" Dana offered, "Like, she's even starting to get onto me about making fun of Jean now—can you believe that?"

Hannah took a hearty bite of what felt like the umpteenth leg of the night. She had a good idea of what made Dana tick after a few trips to the gym with her and Claire and, as much as she wanted to get back into shape, it had become increasingly obvious that it was easier said than done. Impotent desires to whip herself back into a slender shape had leant her to the idea that Claire was being unreasonable in her expectations (as ill-definted as they were) for her workout buddies. Something that Dana, with very little provocation, appeared to agree with.
125331121111121221211211221112112.title: Hannah, the Bad Influence

choices: Without partners, Claire starts to slip - and Hannah works on phase 2.
Claire finds a thinner friend to work out with while Hannah and Dana get fatter.
1253311211111212212112112211121121.content:
Another night passed as Hannah invited Dana over for some Italian food, while Claire was at the gym.

God, this Alfredo is so good, thought Hannah. She ignored its evident effects over the past week or two of failing to accompany Claire to the gym, which blew up her thighs and belly. She knew subconsciously that she ought to have been working out for her impending effort to bring her roommate back to where she "belonged." She had been dining with Dana for a few nights now, who also had been plumping up in her lower body - straining her pants especially.

The increasing office worker had just swallowed a bite of chicken parmesan as she spoke the words that breathed life into Hannah's plans. "This stuff is great - I used to get this kinda stuff all the time with Claire before she became a health nazi." Hannah suppressed a grin, letting only a smile manifest, "Yeahh, she really has just been such a buzzkill. You know, you really should get her something - bring it to the office and offer her some, like, hibachi." Dana nodded, "Yeah, but she's really on that diet of hers. Won't she just say no?" Hannah spoke, "Like, she could, but what kind of a friend would she be to say no? It's a gift, it'd be kind of a dick move to say no to a gift like that." And just like that, Hannah had planted a mine. She could see Dana's acceptance of the concept in her slight smile and a shrug - a shrug of acceptance.

The plan was put into motion the next day as Dana waddled back into the office after a brief lunch break. Bringing back takeout was nothing new, and Claire hadn't said anything about it to date, she was currently busy with helping Rick bind a print job, which the teen was grateful for. "Hey, Claire," the slimming but still large woman heard as she turned to listen - seeing the form of her larger friend. She hadn't wanted to say anything about her friend's gain and absence from the gym, and largely hadn't except for the earlier days in Hannah and Dana's newfound friendship when they began dodging the gym to stuff their faces. Claire spoke with a wavering voice, "Is that ... Hibachi?"

Although Claire was wavering between lecturing Dana and keeping her mouth shut, Dana heard it as a waver of near surrender - Dana spoke, "Yup - it's your favorite, shrimp and scallops with the dim sum, and there's one extra for youu~!" Claire held her tongue - it wasn't her place to lecture her friend, no matter how much she had felt alone over the past two weeks. However, she knew that to keep up her progress - she was back down to an (admittedly somewhat tight) 3XL, and she knew that the only way to maintain her progress was to say what she was about to say:

"Uh, no thanks."

Dana gave a puzzled look. This was her friend - she was giving her a gift. "Come on, girl, don't make me eat both of these things." Claire gave a bit of a harder look and spoke with an equal tone, "I said no thanks, Dana." Dana's brows furrowed and she cocked her head back a bit, as if pushed back by the force of Claire's offense. "Come on, it's a gift. It won't kill you, it's just some hibachi." Claire sighed and spoke with a bit of bite in her speech - "I said no, respect my decision, if need be, eat both of them." Dana grumpily spoke, "You've gotten so much worse about this since you've gone to the gym, you used to at least have a few cheat days with me, but now you barely ever eat with me at all." Claire's patience was being tested, but she had to be insistent. This was her health on the line, and the frustration with Dana's inane insistence burst the dam on a bit of her taboo on speaking about her food choice - "I don't comment on the fact that you stuff your face every day, ever think about that? It's my damn choice, I let you make your bad decisions, let me make my good ones."

Dana stomped a foot as Rick perked an ear - he was going to keep working through this, but this was the most exciting thing that had happened at the printing office since that 'Karen' had come in last month and demanded to call their CEO. Hopefully this one wouldn't require the help of the police. Dana yelled back, "You're such a bitch! I'm trying to give you a gift and you basically fat-shame me!? I'm happy with my body, don't be bitter that nobody wants to torture themselves at the fucking gym with you!" Claire returned with a salvo of her own, "You're not happy with your body, you're complacent! You were just getting better, but you do kinda bad at the gym and you just," Claire slapped her still-chubby hands on her rotund, but slightly taut thighs, producing a loud smack, "Gave up! You've stopped giving a shit, you've come in with take-out like every day, and it fucking shows." Claire gestured to Dana's fatter lower body - her belly poking out that extra bit, her glutes getting flabbier, her thighs growing closer to each other again. "You're calling me fat, you fucking bitch," yelled Dana, "You're barely any better!" She forcefully poked Claire's gut and, though a core of some abs had begun to form below, her gut still jiggled, "Look at you, you fucking hypocrite! You're barely any thinner than me!"

Rick had already begun to step closer, thankfully, as Claire shoved Dana's blubbery form backward, "Don't fucking touch me!" Rick stepped between the two - a comparative twig between two butterballs, "Ladies, stop." Jean's door creaked open as the fat manager made a rare appearance out of her office - "What the hell is going on here?" Rick spoke up, interrupted immediately, "I don't care," by Jean, "Stop fucking screaming in my office, and keep your hands off of each other. Focus on your actual job. I thought I gave you guys raises to pay you to do your JOB." Claire shamefully nodded as she rubbed her sore gut - sore from being poked by Dana.

The rest of that work day was remarkably silent, and when Claire came home, full of rage, practically slamming the door, she turned to Hannah and spoke forcefully, "Dana's not coming over here tonight, if you wanna hang with her, you'll hafta' go to her place." Hannah raised her brows, "Why?" Claire spoke, "She acted like a stupid fucking bitch at work, tried to force-feed me some Hibachi when I clearly told her no, and got upset when I called her out on overeating to get her to fuck off."

Hannah frowned, but inside, she was grinning the grin of a Borgiaesque mastermind. She knew that Claire would refuse, but she had no clue it would blow up like this - and it was so in her favor! The effect was just as planned when she showed up with pizza at Dana's - although she had already ordered some, awkwardly enough. "Just set it on the counter," Dana said, resigned to her fat fate for tonight, "I'm gonna eat everything in front of me anyways." Hannah spoke, "I'm sorry Claire was such a fucking bitch to you today," Dana growled as she swallowed some pizza, speaking after, "That fucking fat bitch tried to call me out for eating, when she's basically a fucking pig herself." Hannah joined in, "Yeah - so self-righteous when she's still so big," entirely ignorant of the irony that she was now almost certainly fatter than Claire.

Hannah patted Dana's back, trying to demonstrate some solidarity. She had Dana deep in her pocket - the question now was whether or not she could initiate phase 2 of her plan, to get herself and Dana thinner while Claire got fatter.
1253311211111212212112112211121121.title: Poisoned Friendship.

choices: Claire goes beyond giving up and starts binging - her weight skyrockets.
Claire heads to the gym - Hannah's there, and she loves to see Claire struggle.
12533112111112122121121122111211211.content:
These days, Claire seemed to live on her own planet. It didn't help that Hannah had practically moved into Dana's house now, to Claire's mind, probably eating themselves into a coma.

In the days after her big falling out with Dana, she barely talked to the woman in the office. The contrast grew as Claire kept at her routine while she could, eating her planned meals while Dana ate her takeout. The routine, however, got harder and harder. She was able to sustain a few weeks of working out solo, but it became so dull as time went on. Another day alone. Another day on the same old machines - even switching up her routine wasn't enough. What was strangest was that as her mental motivation to work out became taxed, she felt herself becoming worse at working out. She tried to fight it, but her mental fatigue at her lonesomeness was becoming too much.

One day, she just thought - Why bother going if I just keep getting worse? Her gym membership lapsed as the end of the month came and passed, and she didn't bother to renew it yet. With a newly-freed up source of revenue, Claire dug back into eating more takeout - she ordered some sushi from the hibachi restaurant, and she bit into it, pouring soy sauce onto it. The intense flavor hit her all at once - oh, this was great! This was the best! It had been so long since she had bit into some feel-good food like this. She gave in - fuck it, she had some wiggle room.

It started as a swap of her current routines - from grilled chicken and seasoned kale to fried chicken and french fries - egg whites and pork sausage for two sausages and scrambled eggs with cheese, sometimes with some bacon if she'd gotten up early. Her healthy snacks, however, were what really started adding on the pounds - a small bag of chips, a candy bar here and there, she soon started keeping bags of chips around the apartment in addition to Hannah's still-present snacks that hadn't found their way to Dana's place. It was at the apartment with all that free time that Claire began filling again with food - snacks while she was playing a game, snacks while she was watching television.

The surplus calories began to quickly erase Claire's months of work - eating while barely moving around meant that she was putting on a good few pounds every week, and her previously somewhat-tight 3X's became forbiddingly tight. Dana couldn't help but mockingly watch behind Claire's back as the woman who just a few weeks ago was lecturing her about healthy eating consumed a bag of barbecue chips while her fat folds and love handles grew by the day. One day, Claire drank from her diet soda when some buttons popped. Dana stifled a chuckle as the increasingly obese hog bent down and breathlessly picked up the buttons. Dana's mind wandered - why was Claire suddenly so out of breath?

That night, she recounted it to Hannah in her living room - "So Claire bust out of her 3X today," she cackled over a fried chicken salad. Hannah giggled, "Oh, sounds like someone's diet isn't going so good." "That's not even the best part," said Dana, "When she bent down to pick up her buttons, she was so out of breath! I swear, I thought she was gasping for breath so hard, it's like she hasn't been to the gym recently!" Hannah grinned, "I knew it was a matter of time before that sanctimonious bitch got fatter again." Claire's willpower had given out that quickly, and now she was on her way to encouragingly get Dana to eat better. Strangely enough, after the initial pizza binge, it was Dana who got on a diet, and Hannah had joined her. Of course, as two fat women whose friendship had begun in opposition to dieting, they were actually not gaining any weight.

Although, to look at Dana and Hannah's "salads," it would be plain why they weren't quite losing weight either. These were thinly-veiled and slightly garnished fried chicken breasts, with creamy and fattening sauce drizzled over a copious amount of the calorie-laden cuisine. It was a start, and it kept them sitting still while Claire tumbled backward. It was plain to Dana that Claire was about her size by the end of that month, and by the end of the next month, Claire had clearly gotten over 400 pounds. The month after brought more gains for the oversized seal that was Claire Spittz.

Claire herself got suspicious as she slid into her 4X's and they began to feel suspiciously tight in a quick matter of time. She knew she was letting herself go, but she became increasingly suspicious of how far she was going, and after some struggle, she got up onto her feet, worn out by the task of standing up, and waddled to the bathroom. Pulling out the glass scale from under the sink, she stood on it as it spoke, "Four hundred and three point eight pounds."

"What the fuck.." muttered Claire, as she shelved the scale. She knew she was putting on some weight, but over 30 pounds in 3 months? How the fuck was this possible? She was out of shape, and that was annoying enough to her, but now she had negated 6 months of fitness in 3 months of gluttony!

There was only one course of action clear to her.
12533112111112122121121122111211211.title: Claire's lonesome binging.

choices: Hannah's shedding pounds, but Dana can't give up junk. Hannah is BRUTAL to her.
Hannah feels like she's already won - she's putting on weight herself.
125331121111121221211211221112112111.content:
She walked to the pantry. Hannah basically lived in Dana's house now, so she had no use for her multitudes of fatty snacks. Claire's brain was begging, Come on, no, don't open the pantry! Claire couldn't listen to it - the revelation was too much.

So much progress was lost! She was below 400, the thinnest she had been in years! And all because she was a little lonely, she wasted all of that progress. The gym couldn't make her feel good right now, it'd just be a slog, a god-awful drudge. Nothing could make her feel better but her old and dormant friend - binging until her worries were drowned below an ocean of food.

Dana's bag of chips dissappeared into Claire's mouth, as did a candy bar. She ate not to taste, but to fill. She felt like she still had more room, after finishing an entire bag of chips and two candy bars - a third bar, a fourth.

Claire's stomach was mercifully out of practice and, for the moment, her binge came to a stop. She laid back and passed out in a food coma for the night - but the shame of her failure didn't go away. The shame of now basically being alone did not go away.

At work, Dana couldn't help but notice how Claire was exploding out of her clothes every single day! She was living up to how Hannah had revealed her - a living hog who was a brutal mockery of who she was trying to become. Almost nothing that was marked for disposal made it there - as Dana cut back on her snacking a little, Hannah had told her, "Do you want to be like "Cholesterol" Spittz?" - All of it seemed to go to Claire, every bag, every little thing that had to be thrown away. Claire spent every waking moment either at her computer or eating, with a little time in between to gasp for breath, gather it for her expanding body.

Her muscles, so recently cultivated to a minor extent, began to atrophy again as she continued ignoring the gym, ignoring nutrition in favor of filling her mouth. Hannah could only grin at Dana's tales of Claire's expanding body. All was beginning to come back to where it should be- Hannah and Dana were going to be the small ones once again, and Claire would be back to her gargantuan size.

The woman herself was playing into every stereotype that Hannah had constructed in her mind - every waking moment was spent shoveling food into her mouth, and every moment at the apartment was spent either napping or playing games. Her beloved console was only slight respite from the nightmare that was recognizing her gluttony and failure.

All of this laziness and binging took a massive toll on Claire's weight. Her gut shot outwards with every week, every day she grew fatter and fatter as she didn't stop binging, she continued overeating every single day, ignoring the careful calorie targets she had set. Long ago had she abandoned tracking the vast intake of food she put in every day. The last time she had tracked her food at the start of all of this, her app had given her a pop-up, "You are consuming too many calories. Overconsumption of calories results in weight gain. Consider reducing tomorrow's intake or exercising to compensate for overconsumption."

Even the 4X's she was wearing began to get tight as the month drew to a close - not unbearably tight, but her stomach grew close to the fabric, it rippled less and became more snug - the next weeks after brought only more tightness, her work clothes became overly tight. Even fat Jean had to comment, "Claire, you've got to up-size your uniform again. It's getting too small." If Jean had to say something, Claire thought, I'm really getting fat.

Her gut continued surging towards the end of that month - she figured she was putting on some serious pounds, but the doubt that Hannah had planted in her mind told her, "No - you can't lose this weight. You're too fat." The words of her doctors and nutritionists, the trainers she had read from were gone, pushed out by the poisonous seed of doubt. She began to accept it - this was where she had been for most of her life, this was where she was going to go back to.

Along with it came a return to her old medications as her doctors saw her meteoric gain. "Claire, you were doing so well - what has gotten into you," her Georgian physician inquired. She couldn't give him an answer. They recommended therapy to her as she took her old doses again, but not a session was attended. All that she attended was her growing hunger - her desire to bury her shame in food. By the end of the month, she was definitively out of any 4X's, and at the end of the next month, her 5X's fit her just as they had when she had started her weight loss. She was all the way back to where she had been, with a bit more injury to her health and none of the drive to try to prevent more damage.

Although this part of Hannah's plan was reaching fruition, as Claire gained, not all was going well on her own side of Phase 2.
125331121111121221211211221112112111.title: Back to square one.

choices: Claire comes back the next night. Hannah moves back in to sabotage her.
Claire stays lazy, Hannah comes back to subtly dominate her.
125331121111121221211211221112112112.content:
It was a humiliating walk back to the gym after 3 months, but her logos told her it was the only right move. She had fattened herself back up, fallen off the wagon. She just had to get back on.

Granted, it was hard to do with everyone at the gym giving her that look. They looked at her with a sense of incredulity - the woman who had been the talk of the gym's weight-loss circles online had fallen off quite a bit. "Mm, she's put some back on," noted one particular Chatty Cathy - and it caught the ears of Dana and Hannah, who were on the exercise bikes. They panned their heads to see the thundering form of Claire Spittz, waddling into the Gym. She was looking a little winded just from her walk from the parking lot.

"Oh, my god, she really has put on some weight," said Hannah. She had to see her roommate's incoming attempt at using the treadmill. She had put on so much weight it was rediculous! Her gut jiggled and bounced with every step, far more than Dana remembered. It was a wonder to see the woman sit down and see her belly expand to the size of France, rolling out to a hand's length from her knees. To Hannah's mind, it was a wonder compared to her own form!

In the three months since Claire's lapse in judgement, Hannah had started taking Dana to the gym about sometime last month, as well as working on making their "diet" a bit healthier. They had shed some 20 pounds of water weight, and it had left them looking a far stretch thinner than Claire - some 40 pounds thinner, at least.

The blubbery woman, after a respite, trudged up towards the Treadmill. She looked to her left, scanning her surroundings consciously - Dana and Hannah began to look busy as her eyes cast across their backs. She didn't recognize them and didn't have the time to look any closer as the treadmill sped up. The two turned to look as she put in her earbuds and began walking on the treadmill. The bottom of Claire's gut dangled out of her workout top - one of the 3X clothes she hadn't gotten around to replacing yet. It hugged her oversized belly as it jiggled from side to side, much to Hannah's delight. Her cellulite-covered legs jiggled around below her knees in her 4X shorts, and her love handles escaped the top.

Thud, thud, thud. Her steps were so loud against the rolling belt! They were awkward as she tried to keep up with the 3mph pace. Barely 3 minutes in she was sweating badly. "She's already sweating up a storm," said Dana, "She wasn't this bad the last time we were here together." Hannah nodded as she watched the whale trudge forward. Her breath wasn't audible over the stomps produced by her lard-coated legs, but Hannah could see her mouth hanging open, her nostrils pulling air - not quite desperately yet, but at a faster rate than she had thought she would be.

She couldn't help but think, God, this pig is so out of shape! Barely four more minutes and she was struggling fairly badly - working to pull air into her lungs as she walked at the comparatively slow pace of 3mph. She wasn't even jogging, and she had only spent seven minutes on the treadmill, but she was struggling to walk a normal, healthy 20 minute mile! Hannah doubted this sow would even make 20 minutes on the treadmill.

Neither did Claire. God almighty, it was so hard! The bouncing of her own blubber left her lungs struggling to keep up as she pounded the belt with her fat feet, shielded only by her shoes. It felt like she was jogging again, she wasn't used to the 3mph pace, and her legs were aching. Another minute crawled by, she had made 8 minutes, and she had not even made half a mile yet. Her throat burned from the constant and desperate gasps she was now making for breath. Her music couldn't drown out her struggling breaths. A ninth minute and she felt like she couldn't go any longer, and she was so, so weary. Her legs wavered and jiggled, stepping irregularly, she leaned so hard on the railings.

This lardass is so out of shape she can't even walk 10 minutes without cheating on the treadmill, Hannah thought. Claire got to 10 minutes and immediately stopped on 10:01. She wearily stepped off as Hannah and Dana got back to their workout. Claire spent so long sitting and taking drinks of water that they were impressed to see her step up into the weight area. Hannah couldn't resist the urge to show off to Claire as she spoke up, "Hey, Claire!" Claire turned around, mortified to see Hannah - not only smaller than her, but smaller by 30 pounds! "Heyy, Hannah! Hey, Dana! You guys still go here?" Hannah nodded, "Mm-hmm! Good to see you back here - you've been away for a while." Claire blushed, "Yeahh... I kinda fell off the wagon." Behind her eyes, which gave off a friendly facade, Hannah thought, That's pretty fucking obvious, tubbo.

"Come on, lift a bit with us, Claire," encouraged Hannah. Claire couldn't help but feel awkward near the two, "Eh, sure." She waddled up towards the rack situated over a low bench and looked, daunted, at the weights. "We're doing chest presses. You remember how to do those, right?" Claire laid down and spoke, "Walk me through it, just to make sure." Hannah smiled as she lifted the weight and held it over Claire's fat-filled mammaries. "So, just hold it over your nipples, line your hands up with your shoulders.." Claire's hands shakily gripped the bars near Hannah's hands as Hannah instructed her, "Then, lower it towards your boobs...Slowly, slowly.." Claire unsteadily let Hannah guide her motions, nodding, "...And push it back up, I think I get it again." Claire's top had drifted upward to reveal, now, her belly button and a bit above. Hannah let go as she felt a rush of dominance from being so motherly towards the big, bloated Claire. She, of course, had no desire to see her succeed - just flounder and fail so she could revel in the return to normalcy that this began to represent.

Claire's fat arms jiggled as she struggled with the second rep - she performed the third with a deteriorating form, the bar wavered a bit. She took some deep breaths as she held the bar above her breasts, lop-sided. Hannah stepped in, and helped hold the bar. "It's okay. I've got you." Claire looked at Hannah and spoke, "Thanks." Inside, Claire felt so humiliated! A short while ago, she was the one leading the way - now it was Hannah! "If it's okay, I'd like to take a break." Hannah hid a smirk and spoke, "Uh.. sure, alright."

The predictable words, "I think that's it for tonight - I'll see you later, guys!" were spoken by Claire, followed only by "You should hang around at the apartment more, Han." Hannah smiled and spoke, "Oh, definitely." That night had completely confirmed everything Hannah's delusions had suspected - Claire was, all along, just a fat, out of shape pig who was now going back to her natural state while Hannah led those who could be saved away from obesity. Of course, Claire could not be saved - she was the fat one.

There was something else about what had just transpired. Hannah's bitterness began to give way to something else - a feeling of control. And she loved it. She loved to dominate, to mandate, especially to a helpless pig like Claire. A lot of that feeling of control came from Claire's size - from ensuring that she remained "the fat one," the slobby, obese hog.
125331121111121221211211221112112112.title: Schadenfreude.

choices: Claire's size becomes an issue at the workplace again, in quite a few ways.
Hannah can't keep it inside anymore, she mocks Claire's weight to her face.
1253311211111212212112112211121121122.content:
The drive over to Claire's apartment made Hannah feel like a triumphing general after the humiliating session at the gym. It was genuinely cathartic to see the health guru that was Claire Spittz struggle and fail with the same activity she so recently lorded over her.

It wasn't a surprise for Hannah that next day to see Claire fail to show up at the gym - she looked to be on the verge of death just from the brief workout the other day, one that Hannah could easily replicate four times over, and Dana reported fairly frequently on Claire's deteriorating eating habits. Hannah had enjoyed being with Dana, but she had filled her purpose. It was time to see "Cholesterol" Claire Spittz fail in person - see her laze about compared to her "holier-than-thou" attitude from before.

She stepped onto the elevator and set it to the third floor - she wasn't going to walk all those damn stairs! It was conveniently beyond her gaze that she was, for all her bluster, still over 300 pounds. Her gut still impeded her movement, though she could move far easier thanks to her increased exercise - yet the fact still remained, she was quite rotund. Her delusions were a powerful force - one that could not brook such a break in her constructed reality. As a matter of fact, she could likely barely scale the stairs up to Claire's apartment, but all that her mind focused on was the gap in weight between her and Claire.

It had been a good two weeks since she had seen Claire at the gym last - and Hannah could scarcely wait to see Claire's current state. The moment of decision - the key in the lock clicked, the lock hadn't changed - the sound of the opening door somewhat was muffled to Claire as she focused on her game. Hannah gazed at the blob of fat that now sat on the couch, focusing in on her character's point of view in the game. Other players fell to her little digital cursor, and the screen of victory soared - replaying her last moment of glory.

Hannah could care less - she glanced around the apartment while Claire focused on her game. The healthy snacks that Claire kept around were gone, replaced by chips, soda, alcohol, sweets... The piggy was definitely going back to her old ways. It was when Claire turned around and looked that Hannah spoke up, "Heyy, Claire!" Claire struggled to her feet, panting a bit as she waddled towards Hannah. "Heyyy, Han." The two hugged lightly, Claire feeling Hannah's blubber rub up against her own. She felt worryingly lighter - and to Hannah, Claire was gloriously larger. It was plain that her sedentary lifestyle was doing its work on her bloated gut.

"How was Dana's place," inquired Claire dryly as she grabbed a soda, cracking it open and sipping. It was plain that she didn't quite care for Dana - merely Hannah's experience of her apartment. Hannah replied, "Oh, same old, same old. Been getting work in at the gym, trying to eat right." Claire spoke, "Yeah, you look great, I can tell you've been working hard." "Yeah, I have," said Hannah. She couldn't help but throw in a subtle little jab, "I've been missing you at the gym. Switched memberships or something?"

In her mind, Hannah guessed that the only "membership" that Claire had was a pizzeria punch card, stuffing her gut for a free pizza every so often. Claire bashfully scratched the back of her head and spoke, "U-uh, heh, uh, no, not really, just.... didn't feel like going any more." Hannah's face drooped at her mouth - the dissapointment was fairly plain. "Aw, that's a shame. You were doing so good." Claire shrugged, "Yeah - then I slacked off for a while, and I just don't think I can get back to where I was."

Although reassuring Claire with some half-assed words that managed to seem convincing, Hannah couldn't help but think, Damn straight you can't, fatass. Sit back down on that couch and stuff your face.

And as if by some magic of the mind, Claire did so, waddling back to the couch and sitting down, grabbing a fist-full of chips and swallowing it. She continued, "Well, good to have you back around here, Han."

And it was so good for Hannah to be back around Claire, just to be able to micro-aggress against her, to exist as she slimmed down while Claire blew up in size. She felt SO superior as she saw Claire order in take-out that night, bouncing with every ounce of renewed blubber that was in her body. "This one's free," she proudly proclaimed. Sweet Jesus, thought Hannah, I wasn't bullshitting! She actually has a fucking punch card!

Hannah made sure to eat her baked ziti deliberately, enjoying it while watching Hannah eat her grease-laden meat lover's pizza. "How often do you get a free one," asked Hannah. Claire turned to her, speaking without having to think - "Oh, yeah, it's with every five pizzas, or every ten orders. I order in pretty frequently from this place, so I can get like three free ones a month." Hannah nodded, "Huh. Probably saves you a good bit of money."

God, Claire was such a disgusting pig. The grease dribbled down her chin, then down the fold of fat that accumulated on her neck - which had grown beyond being a 'double chin.' Hannah motioned with her napkin to her neck - but it was clear what she meant. Claire wiped the grease. "Thanks," she said. Hannah swore she could hear this lardass getting fatter by the minute - she was not content to eat two pieces, three - but she ate the entire pizza, and had a handful of chips with every few pieces! Claire rubbed her stuffed stomach, "Ahh - that hit the spot." Her hand rubbed the higher end of her gut - it was almost poetic to Hannah - an inch or two higher, and it would be on her heart. Hannah saw Claire take her pills, and couldn't help but think about how hard that muscle had to pump to keep this great tub of blubber alive. She was gasping after particularly long sentences, being pressed by her own increasing mass.

It was a damn hard struggle to keep her internal voice a purely internal one as the month rolled to its end. It was plain that every week, Claire slowly expanded, bit by bit. She stayed as lazy as she was a good year ago, doing almost nothing but driving to work - never walking - and eating, every movement became visibly more difficult for the massive woman. It was like seeing a real-time morph of a human being, seeing Claire Spittz destroy her body with obesity. Every month she grew larger, every week Hannah witnessed Claire destroy her health with salt, fat, and sugar.

And every other day, Hannah sniped wherever she could. "You should try this salad, Claire, this dressing kicks ass." Claire would always refuse - "No thanks, I've got this chicken here." It was like her palette was going in reverse - abandoning things that she had just gotten acclimated to eating. VERY occasionally, Hannah would push a wee bit - "Come on, girl, you really should try it. It's good for you." At least a few times, Claire put it in her mouth - but her distaste for the leafy greens was clear.

It was clear to Hannah: Claire was doomed to be a porcine butterball for the rest of what was left of her life. It was just a matter of enjoying the status quo as she shrank in size. As another two months had passed, Claire had put on another fair chunk of weight. Her work clothes were becoming ever-too tight, and her apartment clothes had gotten tighter as well - Claire had to disappear into her 5X clothes again.

However, her weight was not quite yet done giving her grief.
1253311211111212212112112211121121122.title: Dominating the piggy.

choices: Claire does more than overeat - she binge-eats, and Hannah's pity for her grows.
Bitter Hannah wants to see Claire fatter and more subservient, and feeds her.
12533112111112122121121122111211211221.content:
God, work was getting to be a hassle, thought Claire as she sat in her car. She unbuckled herself from her extended seat belt, which re-emerged from the glove box after Hannah's carefully crafted plan to fatten her back to her "rightful" place had achieved its aim.

The routine that got on her nerves always seemed to be the same: she walked into the store and any customers inside gawked at her size. She dwarfed nearly any other employee in the office: Jean had long since halted her weight gain, and she was merely overweight. Granted, she HAD expanded the gate to ensure she didn't have any awkward moments - but she was still not nearly as fat as Claire. Dana herself was losing a fair amount of weight with Hannah, but the clientele noted Claire's eternally increasing weight.

Even with the expanded gate, it was meant to be comfortable up to 300 pounds. Dana could waddle through it with a fair level of comfort and a wee squeeze. Claire's soaring weight had been making her transit through the gate harder, but as she neared 500 pounds, she found that she had to apply a degree of force to get through the gate - just enough to get past the squeeze of the wooden posts at the moment, but each week, the task became more difficult. Even with a wider gate, the job of getting her fat through the gate was becoming more taxing. What humiliated Claire the most was that this wasn't even as small as the gate she had to use from when she started - yet she was still struggling to get through this damn gate! This was a gate practically designed for an office of fatasses, and she was already becoming too fat for it!

Her great, wobbling gut jiggled over her upper thighs as she fought the monstrous thing to try and move forward, battering it with her practically conjoined thighs due to how fat they were. Her work pants were still too small while her blue polo workshirt revealed much of her fat. Her pants could not come above her waist, and as such her gut hung out over her belt, practically concealing the buckle.

Dana and Claire were still very much so on the outs with each other. Rick never had much to do with either, really, but he found himself talking more to Dana. One topic came up frequently when Claire ran out for her fast food lunches - "So when is she getting back with the program?" "She's not," Dana replied, "She's just been packing on the pounds and I don't know when, or if, she'll stop." This particular day, Claire happened to get back just as Dana spoke her second sentence - but she didn't care enough to give that bitch the time of day. She knew she was getting fat, but she couldn't lose weight! She was so out of shape that she'd be mocked for life at the gym for getting so fat again, Hannah and Dana seemed to just shrink at will while she was stuck being an eternal fatass.

Another fight with the gate. Another fight to keep breathing. God, she was getting so sweaty! She had to sit down. Her chair groaned so loudly, and it was blatant that it would give out any day now. Claire was too tired to care. Dana gave a cringing gaze, and Claire just gave her a sweat-laden glare filled with her frustration. The two met eyes, traded anger through their twin glares of Dana's disgust with Claire's gluttony and sloth, and Claire's anger at Dana's betrayal and deceit. Rick and Dana broke the moment, getting to work on an order. Claire just checked her e-mails.

Jean frustratedly opened her door as Dana and Rick struggled to get a workload bound. "What is the issue? This was supposed to be ready an hour ago. I'm supposed to call them when it's ready, and they've had to call me, twice." Dana spoke, not nearly as winded as one would expect from her still considerably fat figure, "Uh, trying, but there's so much paper, and they stipulate we've got to have it just so." Jean turned, beleagured, to Claire, "Claire, can you just get up and help them? And don't give me that sigh. You're not getting paid to eat." Claire bore Jean's callous snipe, "J'st gimme a sec..." the morbidly obese madame spoke. She struggled to her feet against the pounds of fat that weighed her towards the chair, which groaned terrifically as she rose like a leviathan from the deep, jiggling as she managed to pull herself up.

Finishing her ascent, Claire ported her mass towards the two struggling co-workers of hers, whose comparative slimness was so exacerbated by the blue uniform. Claire struggled and panted as she arrived at the workspace. She helped hold down the paper, keeping it aligned as she leaned back just enough that her sweat would not land on the precious paper or binding. Dana stared at the paper, grossed out and somewhat horrified by how unfit Claire was. This woman could barely bind a report and walk across a room without sweating an ocean! She was already eating herself into an early grave, her blue workshirt was showing off her vastness as the job finally bound and Rick spoke up, "Right, label's on there.... Cover pages... Alright, job is bound." He turned to the blubbery, sweat-covered form of Claire, speaking half-heartedly, "Thanks." Claire nodded as she waddled back towards her desk. Jean walked away as Claire exhaustedly jiggled towards her computer, "I'll send the notification," she said with a gasp afterwards, as if it were some long sentence.

She pulled herself to a seat on the chair, but the overtaxed furniture had begun its signature groan when something snapped off loudly. Claire felt herself sliding back and right, feeling her mass propelling her to the ground rapidly, as she yelled in involuntary terror.

A titanic, monstrous THUD sounded through the whole building, and the office floor shook with Claire's magnitude. Rick almost stumbled as Jean hurried over. "Jesus, Claire, are you okay?" Claire gasped, the air in her lungs being forced out by the impact. She was covered in sweat as her chest rose and fell. A pang of pain shot through her chest, sending dread through Claire's mind. Was this humiliation not enough, was she going to have a heart attack, right here?

She gasped and tried to get her air back. All three of her co-workers hurried over to her and inspected her, "Claire! Claire, are you okay?" She gasped, no air came down her windpipe. Finally some of the first came back in at the end of one of her long gasps, her chest rose and fell with longer pauses as she finally spoke weakly, "Think so.." She could not bring herself to try to stand, but Dana and Rick and Jean grabbed her by her armpit, feeling the atrophied muscle which was buried under layers of fat. They could barely feel any bones as they spoke, "Come on, let's get you up, big girl."

Even in their moment of concern, they couldn't help but humiliate Claire. She struggled to help herself up, and Dana couldn't help but think - God, this bitch is so huge. It was easier to move loveseats into her dorm than it was to try to lift Claire Spittz, and this was with the help of two other people! She gritted her teeth and engaged the re-awakened muscles that Hannah had helped train, Claire giving minimal effort to lift herself. Claire continued gasping for breath, transitioning into panting as she came to her feet.

"God, we're gonna have to replace this chair," remarked Jean. Claire couldn't muster a reply, only Dana could. "Yeah - make sure to get a stronger one." Jean shook her head, "I'll see, but the better solution," she spoke, as she laid a hand on Claire's gut, "is probably to shed some of this, huh?" Claire couldn't muster a reply as the three walked away.

Claire's hours, thankfully, were nearly up as she clocked out and waddled out to her car. She held back the tears longer than she thought she could, and the first sobs only came as she reached her door, opening it and sitting down, almost aggressively throwing her weight into the driver's seat. She clutched her face in her hands, crying ugly tears into her hands, moaning in despair. She had fallen so far, and her co-workers could think only to insult and humiliate her!

Claire could only think of the safety of the apartment. She blew a red-light and narrowly dodged the front of a silver sedan, she could barely see through her tears and the fat that had begun to shroud even the peripheries of her vision.

She parked, got to the elevator, and got up to the apartment, crying all the way. She burst in, Hannah was at work, or the gym, she didn't care - she heard the door shut behind her as she grabbed her food stash. She could do naught but eat it all. Entire family bags of chips fell before the ravenous hunger borne of her tears, share-sized candy bags disappeared into her obese maw. Her blue workshirt was covered in the wetness of tears and sweat. She ate until her tears ran out, she ate until the blue shirt rose to be little better than a covering for her inadequate and dull bra. She ate until she physically could not fit any more food into her gut and she felt her stomach protesting against its fullness. She could not get up if she wanted to, and all she could do was lay on the mound of opened wrappers.

That was how Hannah found Claire when she came home from work - passed out with her gut stuffed to bursting, literally hanging sideways off the couch by a good few inches, with puffy red eye sockets and a wet, wet workshirt. Hannah, in part, felt just at viewing the sight. This fat blob obviously had someone tell her the truth and she couldn't handle it, so she's eating herself to death again. Typical.

But below that, was some pity: even when someone brought her weight up bluntly to her, Claire didn't respond like this. Something went down, BIG TIME at work. But Claire was too deep in a food coma to respond at all. Inside, some part of her bitterness had faded now that Claire was plainly fatter than her and subservient again. Part of her pitied Claire and the circumstances that afflicted her.

Claire was certain to cope using food. Hannah, however, was not sure how to react.
12533112111112122121121122111211211221.title: Claire's Work Woes

choices: Claire gets too fat for her job.
125331121111121221211211221112112112211.content:
Hannah did not think that Claire could overeat more than she already did.

She already ate three pretty large meals a day with a fair amount of snacking in-between. Of course, as work became more difficult for Claire, her coping mechanism managed to prove Hannah wrong.

For one, portion control of any reasonable form went out the window for Claire. Instead of one danish for breakfast, or a moderate-sized breakfast platter, she'd order enough food for two people - pancakes, two orders of bacon, four eggs - nearly a thousand calories, before her day had truly begun. Similar doubling of portions happened at lunch and supper, which were already the greatest source of calories in her day - well over 2000 calories as a baseline per meal.

On top of this deluge of food, the woman nearly never stopped eating between meals. She couldn't stop, it was a compulsion - snack stashes meant to last a party of people would barely last two days near the black hole of food that was Claire.

Of course, her co-workers could not resist commenting - "Claire, Jesus, you haven't stopped eating since you got in here," commented Dana, who began to become outright stunned by the endless parade of snacks that flowed into her former friend's mouth. Claire could barely say anything even if her mouth was not full, or she had breath in her lungs that wasn't being pressed out by the increasing weight of her body.

Hannah could only feel more and more sorry for the woman as she outgrew her humiliatingly large 5X clothes. She could only feel more and more sorry when she could not stand up without the assistance of an industrial-strength cane and her help, gasping from even this assisted task. Claire could not truly walk any distance longer than a dozen steps, or her legs would simply give out. Even the simple walk from the car to her elevator to the apartment left her absolutely demolished and in need of a long rest on her couch, gasping for breath desperately while her clogged arteries struggled to pump oxygenated blood into the vastness of her body.

Her muscles were decaying from her lack of activity while her gut soared FAR above 70 inches, and Claire could not sit without spreading her legs to allow the great slab of fat to hang down between her thighs, nearly rubbing every chair she sat on. The pace at which her body filled with lard was astonishing, but not surprising considering her lack of activity and her food intake. Inches seemed to come on every single day as her mammoth form expanded. Her thighs were as wide near the pelvis as a healthy woman's waist, and covered in dimples of cellulite. Her knees became overshadowed by a fold of fat that overhung them, making movement that much more difficult.

Hannah's bitterness began to subside, even as she reduced her weight back down into the mid-200's, a world of difference between her and Claire, somewhere over 300 pounds of difference. She no longer felt righteous indignation at Claire - she felt sorry for the morbidly obese woman who was now eating herself into immobility. Hannah did what she could to take care of Claire - she helped her get up, she went to the store to get what she asked even if she didn't like it - but she made it no secret that she was worried for Claire.

"Girl," she said, sitting next to her as she stuffed her face on more snacks, "You need to stop eating your problems and face them. Otherwise, this couch isn't gonna stay up for much longer." Claire took a moment to swallow her food and spoke, "If I could just talk them away, I'd be thin." Hannah shook her head, "That's not what I mean, but it's a step on the road." Claire stared ahead, her chest rising and falling as she took in shallow breaths to try and feed her blubber-bloated form with oxygen. "They're too big for anyone to handle - I got mental help to fix my eating problems already, and I already failed them. It'll just happen all over again."

Hannah didn't know how to approach this, she just shook her head. "I'm just worried about you, girl. You're eating yourself out of your life."
125331121111121221211211221112112112211.title: Pitying the piggy.

choices: Hannah tries to convince the landlord as she helps with Claire's immobility.
Hannah looks for a house that would support Claire's massive size.
1253311211111212212112112211121121122111.content:
Claire's size, as she grew ever fatter, made movement a task as she soared past the 500 mark and rocketed towards the 600's.

It made getting through nearly any door a task - even driving her car was becoming more of a task as she had to push her seat almost as far back as it could go - her legs struggled to reach the pedals.

She wondered how long she would be able to even come into work. One day late that month, she approached the gate, hoping to be able to get through - and her heft became stuck in the posts. Jean and Dana had to grab her massive love handles and pull for dear life, barely wresting her from the gate. "Jesus, girl, there we go," said Dana. Jean spoke after, "Claire, my office." She sighed - it was time for another lecture from her boss. She breathlessly waddled into the office, squeezing her great love handles through the door as she gasped for air and sat in an armless chair. It was wide, black, and the only one of its kind in Jean's office, and quite plain in its intent - the only chair that this whale could sit in.

"This is getting to be a serious problem. You can't come in through the gate anymore - you are going to have to come in through the supply entrance." Claire sighed. It figured - she was becoming so fat she had to haul herself in like cargo - she was dreading having to go the whole distance from the entrance to the office. "But it's such a long walk, from, the bay to here..."

Jean crossed her arms, "Well, the alternative is to basically knock out the counter so you can come through there, because you can't fit through the gate. It's already big enough for up to, what, 400 pounds?" Claire sighed as Jean continued, "And another thing - you're literally starting to outgrow our sizes. 6X is the very biggest that the uniforms come in, and you're obviously not on a diet." Claire shrugged, "So? Just special-order." Jean shook her head, "That's not a possibility. 6X already is so damned hard to get, and the company's not paying for a 7X. And you can't work without a uniform." Claire was already effectively at that point - her blue workshirt revealed the bottom of her belly, and she could never actually tuck it in. Without a new shirt, Claire would have eaten herself out of her uniform.

Claire's eyes began to tear up. "But...but I need this job...." Jean spoke, lowering her voice - which scared Claire. "Well, you've eaten like that's not the case. You've gotten too fat for the office chairs, and the new one is already showing real signs of wear and tear after, what, a month?" Claire gulped and did what she could to hold back her tears as her cruel manager went on, "You're so obese you can't come through an already double-wide gate, you can't bring in the supplies or you'll collapse, and now I have to cajole you to do any binding work or even get a print job." Claire pleadingly spoke, "Just, give me a few more months, and, I..." Jean cut her off, "I'm gonna stop you right there - you've had months since your slip-up in weight. You've had months to adapt to the workplace, and we've done everything we can to accommodate your disability, because that's what that fat is, a disability." She shook her head as she signed something. Claire sobbed a bit, losing her grip just a tad, as Jean spoke. "I hope you enjoyed the food. I'm sorry it had to come to this, but you've left us no choice."

Without her job, Claire had nothing left to keep her from sitting at the apartment, gorging herself all day long. Even the relative restraint she had to show at work was gone, and her days devolved into orgies of food and napping. Her gut continued to explode outward as she barely moved at all - many days, she would simply go to sleep on the couch. She gained at a patently ridiculous rate, but her days were quite literally nothing but eating and sleeping. She no longer had the mental fortitude to do really anything else. And as such, in merely 2 months of insane binging, Claire's weight had exploded to superhuman extents - not content with around 10 pounds a month, she looked to be somewhere at or just below 600 now.

Hannah realized she would legitimately have to consider how to take care of Claire. The woman could barely move at all if she ever elected to, and she could not even fit in her car at this point, having sold it to help pay rent until her disability returned. One day later that month, Claire complained to her, "So, I think we're going to have to talk to the landlord about getting the shower fixed and these doors widened - I can't fit in the shower." Hannah raised her eyebrows, and realized her conundrum. "Uh, I don't know if the landlord will agree with that." Claire sighed. "Well, either you'll have to convince him, or we'll have to get a bigger place."

It was an odd realization to understand that Claire was becoming not only too fat for her job, but also for her literal apartment.
1253311211111212212112112211121121122111.title: Claire gets too fat for her job.

choices: Hannah was undoubtedly the fat one between them, despite her unhealthy denial.
Dana was getting huge, and at the cost of her ability to do her job.
They were quickly approaching a collective half-ton between them.
12533112111112122121121122111211212.content:
For all of her bluster, "Phase 2" of Hannah's plan to put things back where she felt that they were supposed to be never really materialized.

Between herself and Claire, only one of them had proven to possess the willpower necessary to take the hard steps necessary towards any meaningful weight loss. Despite the rocky start, Claire had clawed her way up from rock bottom. Having lost more than three hundred pounds was no accident on her part, and certainly not anything that she could have lucked into—despite, perhaps what Hannah had fooled herself into believing.

For a good, long while Hannah had held this lofty notion of what happened when she would lose the weight. She would do it better than Claire. Come back at her old skinny self, and really show that bitch who was boss. That she wasn't better than her because, really, anybody could lose weight if they tried hard enough. Claire wasn't special. She was just a fatass who learned to eat right and... fuck, jog regularly. It couldn't have been that hard.

But at the end of the day, Hannah was infinitely more satisfied to posturize these scenarios than she was to actively work towards them. "When she lost weight" may as well have been "when she won the lottery" or "when she married a millionaire"—over time, it just sort of became this fun thing to talk about (fantasize about, really) between friends. Having a friend who was bigger than her did wonders for Hannah's dwindling self-esteem. The slot that had always been there in her adult life, previously occupied by Claire, was now filled in by Dana.
