And as she worked towards, almost actively, reversing any positive influence that Claire might have had the already enormous woman, Hannah could only slip further down the rungs of the fitness ladder.

In a peculiar way, having Dana around was almost like a permission slip for Hannah to do as she pleased and eat what she wanted. It wasn't like she'd ever get as big as Dana anyway.

"Claire's not here, you can have thirds."

"Yeah... I just..." the round brunette puffed, "I'm...m'kinda... full..."

"So? Untuck that gut." Hannah would snort, "Nobody's gonna judge you here—Claire's at the gym or whatever."

Dana always came around to Hannah reasoning, even as it began to decay into self-serving hedonism. After all, the more that her Fat Friend ate, the more that Hannah could stomach that extra bite. Or third helping. Her midnight snacks didn't seem so silly knowing that Dana had (helped her) clear the dinner table that evening, and Dana's mom had never been shy about her feelings towards leftovers. Coming home cradling her gut was a non-issue when she had been given the opportunity to really let her appetite fly.

"Who cares what your boss thinks, Dana?" Hannah would dismiss her friend's notions quite often, but Jean's light criticisms were especially frequent, "Who's she got to criticize these days? She can't exactly see her toes either."

"I mean..." Dana would manage, speeding through bags and bags of chips like a stress-eating conductor's car, "...yeah."

As the animosity between Hannah, Dana, and Claire simmered into cool and quiet jealousy for her skinny body, ownership of Dana sort of slid towards Hannah as she offered things more in line with the big girl's interests. Food and displacement of her problems. The company was a good excuse to go all out and order everything on the unofficial takeout menu, so Hannah had her new friend over often. Claire was always cordial with them, if somewhat eager to remove herself from the mountains of temptation that their presence and habit provided. The skinnier Claire got, the less Hannah noticed, because the bigger Dana seemed.

"I'm gonna order pizza, do you want some?"

"Um, yeah." Dana rolled her eyes, "Try to get that cute guy to deliver if you can."

If anything, Hannah was doing Dana a favor. She was practically born to be fat. Claire was just trying to shove her into a skinny little hole where she didn't belong. Dana was much happier hanging out with Hannah. Obviously.

But for every bite that Dana took, Hannah was right beside her. Chomp for chomp, Hannah could match Dana's speed and ferocity when it came to filling up an increasingly roomy gut. The fact of the matter was that Hannah was happy to have someone like Dana around—it made it so much easier to eat carelessly. Greedily. Feverishly. And the more she twisted Dana's arm into accepting her lot in life as a Fat Girl, the more Hannah's self-appointed precedent for herself seemed to fit.

It was a strange, self-fulfilling prophecy of co-dependence, but at the end of the day, there was no denying it...
12533112111112122121121122111211212.title: Hannah and Dana Get Fatter

choices: Claire manages to maintain for a little while, indulging with Dana for a bit.
Claire backslides again! Friendship with Dana is costly for her waist.
1253311211111212212112112212.content:
Claire was so lustful of the food that she barely noticed and didn’t even complain when Dana turned on her turn signal, the tick-tick-tick sounding as she turned right and followed the road’s course to the parking lot. It was a task to find a parking spot, but they managed to find one. Some walking was involved, unfortunately for Dana. As they stood in the waiting lobby for their table for two, it finally hit Claire that they SHOULD have been at the gym already. By that time, however, the fat waitress directed them towards their table - Dana ensured they did not get a booth.

Ah, well, thought Claire, Guess I oughta enjoy it. She ordered a diet coke and got up with Dana. “Ooh, they’ve got the lobsters on special tonight!” They went to the bar with the cooked lobster tails, sitting in a bin near great vats of butter and small, 4 ounce cups. The two blimps filled the butter cups to the brim and grabbed 2 lobster tails, mounds of crab legs from the nearby bucket of crab legs, and fried shrimp.

It was a sublime time to be their taste buds. The buttery, juicy lobster sliding down their throats, especially Claire, who had long since tried to forgo such fatty fare. It was almost a sexual experience, precisely because she knew she shouldn’t be doing this. It was so naughty, but so good. Her inhibitions had fled for the night and the two plowed into the food. “Sorry for this, but they had the buffet on discount tonight.” Claire shook her head, “Don’t worry. I wasn’t stuck on going to the gym anyways.” The first plate disappeared at a dizzying rate.

While they ate, they conversed - "Good to know that at least Jean isn't showing us up," quipped Dana. "Yeah," said Claire, "She's been getting pretty big lately too. So perfectly ironic, she was such a bitch to us over our weight and now she's packing it on."

The second plate came on - grilled scallops, fried fish, garlic parmesan potatoes, more butter, and even more crab legs. It was enough to make other people gawk, and it was a far thought that these blimps had intended to be at the gym right now. “Jesus,” mumbled one man in the midst of the crowded, noisy dining room, “Don’t these fatasses have any shame?” It was pretty clear that they didn’t - their clothes were becoming packed to bursting, and Dana’s shirt, already struggling, was starting to give up. She gave her shirt some more longevity by letting it ride up, her belly button on her massive gut being revealed.

Claire had a brief pang of shame enter her head as she did the same - Girl, you’re supposed to be working out right now! What are you doing!? She shushed the intrusive thought with a crab leg, cracking it and extracting it into the cup of butter.

Only one more plate separated the morbidly obese women from that most sacred part of a buffet meal - the dessert. Thankfully, these two had a MODICUM of awareness of their health conditions - only getting a slice of cake each. That was primarily because they had stuffed their guts to near bursting. After using her emergency insulin pen, Dana drove Claire home.

By the time that Claire was dropped off at the apartment, her gut entered the room before she did, as it formerly had. Hannah was already asleep or in her room, but there was a calzone remaining.

By no sane standard should Claire have been hungry. But her gut saw food, and it demanded to be fed. Amazed by her own greed in the face of abandoning self-control, at least for one night, Claire tried to resist it - changing into her normal clothes - but she couldn’t hold off forever. Before going to bed, she ate the calzone and two cannolis that had escaped Hannah’s gaping maw.

At THAT point, her gut shot painful bursts as she lay prostrate on her bed, so stuffed that she could not move. She could barely breathe, her stomach was so packed with food. She thought she could feel food coming back up, but she battled it back by swallowing her own saliva. She passed out in what she hoped was a food coma rather than a hypoglycemic one. So focused on eating she didn't manage to even close the door to her bedroom, Hannah, getting up for some water, saw Claire, passed out with a belly so taut and large that it almost looked like, in a day, Claire had gone back to 500 pounds.

And while the gut had receded somewhat as she digested some food overnight, it became clear that a renewed friendship with Dana brought issues to the woman whose weight loss had gone so well up to now. But the loss had been a lonely one. As human beings are social creatures, they require companionship - and Claire became aware that she could fix her weight problems all she wanted, but it would just be a change of body shape if she ditched her friendships for weight loss. Even for the sake of her physical health, it would take a toll on her mental health to be so isolated again. The past fall had been SO hard, and she had felt SO alone as Hannah grew colder and more distant from what she perceived as Claire's preachiness.
1253311211111212212112112212.title: Dana and Claire's Crabfest

choices: She can't be saved - why not enjoy some holiday gluttony with BOTH her friends?
Claire channels back into her diet and gets WAY more strict. It's hell.
12533112111112122121121122122.content:
“Oh, yeah, it’s so juicy,” mumbled Claire through a mouthful of stromboli.

The buffet incident had been a good bonding experience with Dana - who now munched on a similar pizza-derived pastry, nodding through the grease and meat-filled goodness. “I told you! It’s just glorious.”

They were enjoying another lunch of indulgent, calorie-rich food. Claire’s complacency had come shockingly fast compared to her attitude barely an hour before her visit to the crab buffet - figuring that it was a temporary break from her diet. Dana had figured the same - it was a reward for her good work! Granted, she had not even GONE to the gym and her diet was a failure - but she had tried! Wasn’t that worth a reward?

In reality, both of them were simply back at their old habits - and Claire was in a bit of a state. Subconsciously, she KNEW she was just back at her old habits of overeating, but she knew that to stay on her old course would mean returning to loneliness. No one texting her, no-one trying to find out how she’s doing - eating was social for her.

Humans being the social creatures they are, Claire and Dana bonded over what they subconsciously knew was a failing of their willpower. For Claire, she quietly recognized it as just another failed diet - granted, this one had been more successful, but it too joined the ranks of the diets past - her three-day attempt at Keto, her fleeting attempt at going vegan that didn’t last a month.

At the moment, though, she wasn’t CONSCIOUSLY glutting herself - it was more a fact of life, like breathing, walking, or working. She had consciously eaten far more than she was eating now during her brief stint as a feedee model. She was only just eating a snack.. And lunch… And sometimes a second lunch... And dinner…

Not to mention breakfast, which had been a pleasant surprise for Hannah. Claire thought more and more that she ought to get closer to Hannah again, and it was good for Hannah to talk with Claire, this time as a partner in poundage. “Mh. Yes, these croissantwiches are heavenly, Han.” Hannah nodded, “Oh, yeah - not to mention the potatoes. This place makes good hash browns, and that’s on this frappe,” she stated, sipping her caramel coffee drink.

Of course, old problems started returning. Her 4XL clothes she had bought a month ago were starting to get tight - an increasingly common problem at the office as Jean continued her fattening tendency and the tubby two, Dana and Claire returned to their bad habits. Claire’s willpower to resist overeating melted into mild apathy - she started to realize she was putting the weight back on, but she scarcely cared. As a matter of fact, those extra lunches with Dana had started to build up in a big way - By the end of the week, she felt a good bit heavier than she did when she began the week. Each week passed this same way, at the end of each week she felt fatter and fatter.

This carried on for a good two months of unchecked gluttony - Hannah even could notice how rapidly the weight was coming back onto Claire - and although she was just under Claire’s size with her own unchecked gluttony, she had started to wonder whether or not Claire would just go on to drop all the weight.

Eventually, even Claire got suspicious as November began. She figured she would have to bump back up to 5X, but even those clothes which she thought would sustain her for her period of overeating were starting to tighten, revealing every fold of fat and riding up frequently to reveal the bottom of her constantly overstuffed belly. She began to worry whether or not she had carried it on too far. She pulled herself up from her bed - an increasingly hard task by the day over the past two months. She waddled, breathlessly, towards the bathroom to step on the dreaded scale - something she had grown to fear as she dove deeper into gluttony. She held her breath and stepped on it.

The number it announced made her choke for breath - “Four Hundred and Fifty point Eight Zero Pounds.” How could she have put on this much weight this fast? She was already nearly halfway back to where she had started! She now recognized herself - her re-expanded gut, her fattened thighs, her increasing breasts - she recognized, as if all at once - how fat she had let herself get. She thought of surrender entirely on the subject, of leaning into food over the holidays and glutting her grief into silence. Alternatively, her guilt combined with her desire to lose the weight and encouraged her to double down, to restrict herself from temptation. Part of her recognized that such a spartan diet would not be sustainable - but she had been too loose this past time, and had regained a lot of weight. She felt that to just go back on her previous diet would lead to another regression that would take her back to 500, though part of her worried that such a strict diet would lead her to gorge herself even harder when she got too far down.
12533112111112122121121122122.title: There and Back.

choices: Claire's parents visit expecting her far thinner - she's up to 530 by Christmas.
Hannah and Dana try to bond over Christmas drinks.
125331121111121221211211221221.content:
The holidays this year for Dana, Claire, and Hannah became a great social opportunity for the increasingly gluttonous trio, especially in light of Dana and Claire’s failed diet.

Hannah and Claire approached the Western Temple chinese buffet in Claire’s car - an old spot of Claire’s when she felt like venturing into public. “I don’t know, Han,” said Claire, “Think you’re gonna start with your normal salad this time?” Hannah chuckled, “Heh, a salad of Teriyaki Wings maybe.”

The car wound its way on the left turn across some light traffic - Claire held her reduced breath capacity as a car seemed to speed towards them, but she just made it. Hannah gasped and then yelled, “Hey, speed up next time, maybe you’ll hit us easier!” Claire patted Hannah on her fattened shoulder, “Ease up, we made it.” Hannah shook her head, “Some people don’t deserve licenses.” They found their way to a front park - too far back and they wouldn’t make it after the stuffing that awaited them. Waiting for them was a familiar brown-haired, obese figure - Claire waved with happiness and pulled herself out as fast as her obese form could be made to go - “Hey, bitch,” she said in a friendly manner to Dana, who chuckled and replied, “Oh, I didn’t know that they made talking lard.” The two hugged it out, with Claire fake-pounding on Dana’s back. She turned to the side and introduced her, “Hannah, this is Dana, she works at the printing place with me.” The two sized each other up.

Two more evenly-balanced gainers, though Hannah’s breasts were a bit larger than Dana’s - giving Dana the appearance of having a larger belly, when hers was barely a few inches larger than Hannah’s.

Dana spoke up, “Oh, so you’re Claire’s roomie! Nice to meet you,” and extended her hand to shake. Hannah took it - their fat fingers meeting in a friendly handshake, sending their bingo wings jiggling along with their fat forearms.

The trio waddled with decreasing reserves of oxygen to the front desk, meeting the elderly asian woman behind the counter. “Hi! How many?” she asked, met with the answer - “Three,” from the breathless Claire. She didn’t need to ask if they wanted a booth - she knew these Americans wouldn’t fit in one. “Follow me to your table,” she spoke.

The three waddled, already audibly taking in more breath to compensate for the comparatively short movement of their massive forms, eventually getting to a table a short walk away from the buffet. “Enjoy,” said the woman. In her mind, she couldn’t help but think, God, these three are gonna eat me out of business.

The trio sat and caught their breaths - taking a moment to breathe, a thinner hispanic waitress came up and spoke, “Hi. What do we want to drink today?” Claire raised a finger and spoke, “Get me a diet pepsi.” Dana spoke, “A regular pepsi,” as did Hannah, “Regular.” As the waitress waddled away, Dana spoke, “What’s up? Back on the diet or something?” Claire shook her head, “Nah, I just can’t go back to regular pepsi. It tastes like it’s got soap in it now.” Hannah and Dana shook their heads, as if Claire were a whacko.

The trio went up for their first trip to the buffet - grabbing any number of food items, piling the plates high as mountains. By the time they came back with their loads of food, they began doing a mixture of horking down the food like starving combat troops while occasionally getting their breath back. Inbetween, they occasionally talked - Hannah inquired,“So, what’s Claire really like at work?” Dana nodded, “Oh, she’s nice. She does her work - mans the printer like a pro. I’m usually the one who has to talk to customers, and she mans the snacks - passing some to me every so often when we’re not eating.” Claire slurped down her remaining chow mein, speaking up, “Yeah - I’ve done desk duty sometimes, but Dana’s way better at it.”

Another plate, another session of eating ungodly amounts of food. Several trays were bone-dry, and a waiter turned to the kitchen, saying something in Mandarin in an annoyed tone of voice. A customer turned to them - then covertly eyed the tubby trio, then went back to his food. Shortly afterward, some hurried-looking chefs came out with more trays of food, refilling the tubs at the buffet, some eyeing the obese group of women.

The group of women were ignorant of the gawkers as they were so wed to their food, the massive piles of it on their plates. They had already had two massive plates of food that would have filled any reasonable human being up, but these were women who were social eaters - gluttonous ones, at that. They continued their social eating for a third plate of food - this one mercifully smaller.

The women ate through this plate and, somehow, had room for dessert. They waddled breathlessly to the buffet for one last trip, their stomachs beginning to poke out of their shirts, their bellies nearly hanging openly, jiggling with each step as they went to grab cakes, cookies, and ice cream.

By the time the three were done eating and were on their way out, thanking each other for the good time they’d had out, the employees breathed a sigh of relief that they still had food to distribute to the rest of their customers.

Hannah was happy to have met Dana - a personable, friendly woman. Her only misgiving was that she talked too much for her liking. In contrast, Dana thought Hannah was a stone wall - wondering how Claire could be friends with such a quiet girl.

Regardless, the gorging went on - unrestrained, in fact, quite the opposite, Claire and Dana felt an impetus to live it up as much as they could over these holidays, to celebrate the end of their restrictions, no matter how mild compared to other diets, in case they had to get back on the wagon in January.

The question was far more, however, whether they’d even be able to get onto the wagon, or whether it would crack under their weight. Every passing week the insane amounts of food they were taking in together mounted on their waists, their thighs, their arms, their breasts. They felt themselves getting considerably fatter every week - but it was the holidays, they didn't care, even though they were gaining somewhere close to 10 pounds a week with their vastly increased intake of almost literally endless cookies, pastries, thousands of calories in meals that started to merge into day-long, week-long, month-long eating contests. It would be a question of if they would EVER care enough to stop.
125331121111121221211211221221.title: Friendly Gorging.

choices: Hannah and Dana help facilitate a total relapse—Claire gets bigger and bigger...
Hannah and Dana help to enable one another—while Claire gains, they gain more...
1253311211111212212112112212212.content:
Sometimes, when they were all out together, Claire would make jokes about "what she had done" by bringing Hannah and Dana together.

As far as Claire had managed to fall in and of as far as her diets and attempts at losing weight were concerned, she had yet to truly give into her carnal desires in the same way that Dana and Hannah had. Over the course of the years that Claire had been struggling at getting into a more reasonable (or at least, less enormous) shape, both of her friends had slowly ballooned to unrecognizable proportions at around the same time. As Claire had shrank, they had grown. And it was because of them that Claire was growing again.

They all made jokes about it, sometimes. That the two of them had saved Claire from "another night eating salads" or "another night being sober". More prominently, that they had saved her "from being no fun".

A lot of jokes were thrown around at Claire's expense when the three of them got together. Little seedlings that ultimately wound up flowering into more and more excuses for her to eat, indulge, and grow. Tiny jabs that would resonate and bounce around in Claire's increasingly crowded mind until they came back out of her mouth as excuses as to why she should have that extra slice. Those extra pieces. All of that pizza. Another lunch. A "cheat day".

As much as Claire's doctors and counselors had tried to instill into her the fact that nobody could make Claire eat, and that nobody was responsible for her weight (gain or loss) other than herself, Hannah and Dana were twin demons weighing down Claire's shoulders. Keeping her face-down in food and denial. She may have gotten fat all by herself after high school, but Hannah and Dana had become such bad influences that they were leading her right back to it—stroking her by the chins and tempting her with easy ways out of personal accountability and a good time. It wasn't deliberate, neither actively wanted Claire to relapse back to where she had been, but it was so much easier for them.

Hannah and Dana were making Claire fat, at least as much as that was possible, by becoming worse and worse influences on her.

Now that Claire had introduced them and more importantly, now that they had hit it off, Hannah and Dana were now becoming a united front against Claire bettering herself. Getting together every now and then with Claire, enabling her worst habits so that they didn't feel so bad about their own, egging her on into eating this and that so that they could indulge as well, they were two girls cut from the same stretchy sweatpants.

"T'frenship."

"T'FRANSHAP."

Dana tilted her head back, killing her fifteenth beer of the night. It settled nicely on top of the bottle of Whiskey that she'd drank. She knew that she'd be sick tomorrow, but she had already planned on calling out.

"Wht'sfatassgonnado?" Dana laughed raucously at her boss's expense, "It'sthefuggin...y'know...Christmas."

"Right." Hannah nodded sagely, "Crismus."

It had been in Claire's best interest to stay away tonight. Even as much as she'd given up on herself, she would have had some reservations about how much Hannah and Dana had ordered—if not for the sake of any imaginary claim to diet, then for the sheer logistics and price. Gentle hillsides of pizza boxes, artilleries of sub sandwiches, and oceans of noodles from various Chinese places around the city had been called up to the apartment and promptly devoured by the two supine celebrators. They were in for a night of doing what they did best, and that was eat. With or without Claire.

She might have been getting scolded by her parents for blowing back up again, but there was no denying that the skinny girl deep, deep inside of her would have felt tremendously defeated after an uphill battle like this.

"Claireduzzint—" Hannah belched monstrously, "Claireduzzint know what she's missing."

"God I love Claire."

"Me too." Hannah tittered, pouring herself another glass of whiskey, "She's so fun."

"Nuh I like her cuz..." Dana struggled to lean even an inch out of her seat, "...she makes me feel skinny."

Hannah guffawed, an ugly drunk laugh that she had picked up somewhere along her slide into who she had become today. Her full chest bounced with her fat cheeks as the rhythm spread to her bingo wings and belly.

"Yeah she's good for that." Hannah took too big of a gulp, "Been makin' mee feel skinny f'r years."

"You? Skinny?" Dana snorted, "Assa riot."

"Hey, stop." Hannah pouted drunkenly, "I'm not as fat as Claire."

"Nobody's as fat as Claire."

"True." Hannah admitted, a slow drunk smile spreading on her face, "Hey... Dana."

"Yeah?"

"Now that we're, like, friends or whatever..." Hannah lowered her voice, "Can I tell you a secret?"

"Fuggin' go for it."

"I like that Claire's stopped trying to lose weight." Hannah tittered, "She's way more fun being a fatass than she ever was when she was dieting."

"Girl, fucking same!" Dana announced triumphantly, "She actually tried to get me to go to the gym with her! Can you believe that? God, I'm glad Fatass Fun Claire is back."

"Fatass Fun Claire for the fuckin' win, D."
1253311211111212212112112212212.title: Bad Influences Come Together

choices: Some corporate agents are in the office - they aren't happy about the laziness.
12533112111112122121121122122121.content:
Another big win! God, Claire was back on a roll since she'd gotten back into gaming on the weekends. "Fuck yeah!" shouted Hannah, padding Claire's considerable, fat-covered upper back, sending a ripple that shook her under-arm fat rolls that profiled the fat balls that were her breasts.

Claire leaned back to dig her great, blubbery arms into a family-sized bag of potato chips - for her a normal snack-sized bag. Over the end of the holidays and into the remainder of the winter coming, Claire and Hannah virtually shared eating habits - fast food breakfasts, calorie-rich snacks, over-indulgent dinners. It was rarely better at work with Dana, who made second lunches a fact of life.

The insane calorie consumption contributed to a total relapse in habits - Claire relied on transportation to get anywhere, once again - though she was now not the only one reliant on seatbelt extenders as Hannah and Dana ferried her increasingly porcine form around. It would be a joke to tell anyone that a few months ago, she was dedicated to losing weight and being fairly successful at it. Now, her gut soared outward by the week as the two hauled her around not just to work but to buffets, fattening restaurants which struggled to even accomodate the ballooning woman - even single chairs now struggled to support her, frequently needing 2 chairs to support her increasing heft. She could barely walk as the two fed Claire until she barely noticed herself filling out her old clothes, her 4X clothes going down now to Dana and Hannah.

Jean could barely notice her struggling to even get into work or fit into normal spaces over her own increasing heft, although mercifully, the hated wooden gate conveniently grew to accommodate Jean's increasing size - growing just enough to avoid the old humiliation of getting outright stuck between the posts, but not enough to avoid jabbing Claire's love handles with the metal lock.

The printing office grew so amazingly sluggish as the workforce bloated up - poor Rick was in his final semester of high school, and he resented the lazy greed of the obese hogs that populated his office. "Hey, uh, Claire," he spoke to the bloated blimp, who was pre-occupied with making love to a chocolate eclair. "Clair," he impatiently re-stated. The human wad of fat turned towards him, jiggling from all angles. "Hrmh?" Rick gestured as he asked, "Can you go get the print job? It's been there for a minute now, and I've got to handle the binding." Claire spoke, "Uh, I'm taking a break right now." Dana pre-emptively spoke, "Yeah - taking a break," to avoid Rick's attention turning to her. Rick sighed, "Then get off your break and get the print job." Claire offendedly turned to him. "Huughh.. Fine."

Her obesity was almost impressive as she hefted her 500+ pound form up from her industrial-strength office chair. She already began panting as she waddled towards the printer room. Ten steps, twenty, all taken against her huge gut that was contained just so by her old clothing, a containment that grew unsteady with each passing day, each passing hour. Claire's vision grew blurred by sweat as she leaned over the printer, grabbing the warm printer paper and lumbering back over towards Rick with the paper. Her struggle against her own physical weight in attempting to move became a literal fight against her own form. She was practically gasping for air by the time she handed the paper to Rick, who snatched the job from her hands. He had already bound the job by the time he realized the mistake - the paper was dotted from header to footer by sweat, thicker than a cheetah's coat.

He restrained himself - he was still but a teen worker and these people were somehow his superiors, although they had almost never done anything more stressful than walking around, which actually seemed like an increasing risk to Claire. The personification of obesity sat in her chair, rubbing at her chest and wheezing as she caught her breath from the taxing burden of walking barely forty steps. She looked to Rick to practically be on the edge of a heart attack just from a walk that should barely take anything out of anyone.

He knew he shouldn't give a damn anyways, it was a minimum-wage job he worked to pay for his phone bill and pay for his used car. He had done a good job since he started working here, and he had gotten more than one raise from Jean for practically being the whole office while the three fat women basically ate for a living. But it personally annoyed him that he had to haul these oinkers around on his back. It seemed to him that they were owed a karmic kick in their house-sized asses.

Claire could not have been more oblivious as she was due for a girl's night out to a local steakhouse. Cue the usual waddle in, as Claire used a cane to support her immense weight. "Ehhh, back in my day, we had canes made of saber-toothed tiger legs.." wheezed Hannah, hunching her back for comedic effect, coiling her fat body into a bundle of fat rolls. Claire mumbled, "Damn wh'ppersnapp'rs" as she bumbled forward on her two trunk-like feet. It was fairly embarassing to have to use a cane at barely 28 years old, but her gluttony had reaped a hefty toll on her form, more than one could suspect. Indeed, more than being back at 500, she was dozens of pounds higher - though she hadn't stepped on a scale since October, some good 12 weeks ago now.

The trio lumbered to their table, scraping their chairs back a good few inches - Claire practically had to drag hers a half-foot back, and her gut still scraped the table when she gasped for breath at her seat. "Man, Claire," Dana spoke, "that exercise regimen's been doing wonders for you." Claire put on a smile and flexed a flabby arm - her bingo wings draping from the bicep. Inside, she thought, Yeah... some good it's done me, i'm the same fatass i just tried to stop being.

The menus came and at the top sat a proud, thick slab of meat - "THE BIG MAMA! Finish this 72 ounce ribeye, fresh from Oklahoma, with the side of fries and the drink, and it's free!" Dana spoke, "Oooh, I think I found what you're getting, Claire." Claire shook her head, "Nah - the 24 is just as good." Hannah shook her head and spoke, "Ah, come on. I think I hear your tummy rumbling -" she put her head down on top of Claire's pillow-like stomach. Genuinely comfortable, but Claire felt the intrusion of Hannah's head between a fat roll. She looked closer. That was a juicy - looking piece of meat, but she wasn't -

Gurgle, rumbled her stomach in reply. She sat, thinking. "I don't even know if I can finish that, Han.." Hannah spoke, "Ah, come on, you can. I know my girl," she spoke, patting Claire's stomach. Claire's brain entered the same routine it did in recent months - the two putting mutual pressure on, the gluttony from the reawakened center of her brain that called for her to binge every hour..

"Oh, fuck it." The two gave a hearty, "Yeahhh!" The waitress came and asked, "Soo, do we know what we're orderin'?" Hannah and Dana offered up their request for the 24 ounce, but Claire spoke, "Give me the Big Mama." The waitress raised an eyebrow. "Ooooh. Do you, like, get how big it is? It's a pretty big steak." Hannah spoke up, "And Claire's a Big Mama." Claire nodded and patted her gut. "Yep. Bring her out." The waitress spoke up. "Okay. You'll have to sign the agreement while we cook it."

They wheeled the paper around - it was in part a waiver, waiving responsibility, in part, for "deaths via unforeseen stomach rupture and those with pre-existing conditions, including but not limited to, Obesity, High Blood Pressure, Diabetes Mellitus.." Claire shrugged and signed off, agreeing to pay $200 if she couldn't finish the steak.

Steak was, in fact, an undersale of this monstrous hunk of meat. It lumbered out on a sizzling plate with a train of waitresses - "Biiiig momma, getting her supper!" they cried in unison, joined by several older patrons. Claire gawked at the food, but settled down. Her brain chanted to itself, I'm Claire Spittz, I've had three lunches back-to-back before. I can eat this." She hadn't eaten but one lunch today, and her stomach grumbled for it. She bit in - the steak was somewhere a tad below rare, and she tasted the blood from the meat. It made her feel like an immense, fat lion, consuming prey, and it made her stomach demand more. She scarfed through a few ounces, some fries, a drink, more steak, some more fries.

It was rhythmic, almost hypnotizing for Hannah and Dana to watch the horking monstrosity that they had created. This super-morbidly-obese whale was going through ten ounces, twenty, thirty ounces of this steak. "Ain't never seen nobody eat the Momma that fast," spoke one older patron, wearing his Vietnam Vet hat. His friend spoke, barely audible to those but Claire's table, "Yeah, then again, ain't never seen nobody as big as that eating the Momma."

More steak. More steak. The fries ran out. A refill of diet coke. More steak. Claire leaned back - there was barely 5 ounces left, but her gut felt like it was straining at every inch, every part, every parcel was screaming. She let out a monstrous burp as her heart raced from the intake of salt and meat. Her whole body was taxed by this olympic sport.

But Claire Spittz went on and chewed, the last piece of steak dissappearing. She chewed, chewed, chewed. A chubby man stood above her, speaking, "Open up," and she opened her maw. The man inspected - and the steak was gone. "Momma ate," he declared, and was answered by a whooping rebel yell from the patrons, a rippling whoop that celebrated Claire's insatiable appetite. Claire was on the verge of passing out, fighting her eyes to stay awake as she kept a hand on her chest. Her heart jackhammered out at its ribcage.

All that happened, thankfully, was that Claire passed out from the food coma. She had to be hauled out by gurney, and the paramedics checked - she was fine, for now.
12533112111112122121121122122121.title: Big Claire and the Big Momma.

choices: Claire and Dana meet a guy at the bar who seems to be interested in them.
All that stress isn't good for Claire's ticker - nor is going to a buffet.
125331121111121221211211221221211.content:
Another lazy day spent basically counting how many bags of pretzels she could shove into her mouth began for Claire at the printing office. Clients came in, Rick did most of the work while her and Dana chatted. Dana's eyes suddenly lighting up, she spoke. "Ohh, Biiiitch. I have GOT to tell you about this - so, I swear, Saturday, I'm at Jessica's, right," she spoke. Claire looked intently, chuckling as she spoke, "Here we go, all the best ones start with you being at Jessica's," knowing well the reputation of Jessica's Bar and Grill. She waited to see if the story would be as she expected.

"Yeah - and anyways, I'm a little sauced. Next thing I know, a dude in this denim jacket slides up and says," slipping into an overly smooth, false bass voice, "Heyy, I'm Henry, I do accounting for the Parking Authority." Yep, it was one of those - and as expected, Dana recounted how the man proceeded to sweet-talk her into coming back home with him and having a one-night stand with him. "Of course," Dana finished up, "I was on bottom - no fucking way I'm doing anything but laying back and letting him do the work." Dana conveniently left out that she basically passed out towards the end as a result of her sheer exhaustion, even from doing nothing but letting the man harpoon her.

"And when we woke up, I swear, he looked at me like, "Oh, my God, I just had sex with a whale." It was a brief humiliation - but Dana gave a good-humored chuckle. Claire gasped, "Oh my god, that's awful." Dana shrugged, "Eh. I get Hogged like, twice a month. I take it in stride." Claire marveled at Dana's self-confidence - her ability to take her massive gain in stride and still find a way to turn it to her sexual favor. "You've got to teach me how," Claire spoke. Dana sipped a coffee as she munched a donut, speaking afterward, "How to do what?" "How to get Hogged, or just how to act so sexy when you're so..big." Life in the hospital room was so extremely dull, especially for Claire Spittz. The sterile white walls felt like they were sucking Claire's soul out, and had absolutely no character at all. Sure, on the wall over to the right was a painting of an alright-looking evergreen tree in winter, but it blended in too much with the white in the room.

It all gave Claire the grim impression that she was in the waiting room to Limbo.

The dullness wasn't helped by the disgustingly boring soap opera on the television. The same cliched, washboard-ab wielding man yelled at a statuesque blonde woman, "Joan, how dare you do this to me!" Of course, the volume was low. Claire WOULD change the channel, but two main things were holding her back from this. First, she was over 500 pounds and in a reclining position - pulling herself up would take more energy than she had. The second thing holding her down was the oxygen tubes in her nose, as well as the IVs hooked into her arms, pumping saline and a cocktail of medicine into her veins.

Despite the drugs, Claire felt eternally deprived of energy and sluggish after the previous day's heart attack. Eventually, a fresh-faced, bald, black doctor stepped into the room. "Where's Doctor Akavian?" The black man shook his head and spoke in a mid-ranged voice, "Uh, Doctor Akavian doesn't work at this facility, and he's transferred your case file to me." The fact that her doctor dumped her only sunk Claire further back into her hospital bed. "Oh," she spoke, as her eyes took on a resignation to the fact that Akavian now seemed to consider her a lost cause. The black man spoke again, "I'm Doctor Riesling, and you must be Claire Spittz." Claire nodded, "Yep. That's m'name."

Riesling spoke dedicatedly, "Well, Claire, obviously, you're alive, and your heart attack could have been far worse. Had you been alone and in a private place, you would have lost far more heart tissue." Claire puzzled and asked confusedly, "Lost heart tissue?" Riesling nodded and spoke expertly, "See, when your arteries clog up and you have a heart attack, your heart's cells become more and more deprived of oxygen - when a cell runs out of oxygen, they wither up and die, leaving scar tissue - like a real bad gash that won't quite heal." Claire nodded, understanding better, as the doctor continued. "You've only lost about five percent of your heart cells in this heart attack. Unfortunately, I've run out of good news with that."

Claire frowned. It was clear where it was going from here.

"So, picking up from your previous appointments - if you'll look here.." He leaned in and showed her an ultrasound image. It was of a narrow tube outlined in gray, with about 40% of the passage taken up by an undefined mass that was distinct from the main walls. "This is your artery," he said, pointing to the passageway on the paper, as he then shifted to the mass - "This is plaque, cholesterol that's built up in your arteries. We call this buildup Atherosclerosis - long story short, this is making it harder for blood to flow in. This is what your previous doctor warned you about the last time you were this heavy, and now that you're back, it seems that you have it."

The image's context horrified Claire. This was an actual picture of her arteries - she wasn't being lectured by her mom on why she shouldn't have that second course of pasta, this was an honest-to-God picture of her arteries, which weren't too far away from being half-blocked by the fat she had been shoving into her mouth. Her shocked expression was noticed by her doctor, who spoke, "And this is where I'm going to have to get kind of real for a second. The way you're eating - that buffet food, plus whatever else you've been eating - is going to kill you. If nothing changes, you'll have to buy a casket." He let the moment hang heavy in the air and reverberate into Claire's plaque-encrusted heart. He spoke again, "Now, it's not unreversable. You've got some damage to your body, but there are ways to get back to good health. They involve some hard dieting, and a few rules: keep your salt intake low, drink more water instead of soda, and for the love of god, eat as little fried food as you can." Claire looked on at the doctor's grim but somewhat reassuring expression. "Your hardships mean you qualify for a reduced-cost Weight Loss Surgery. We can look at this better later."

Claire finally mustered up the gumption to ask a question, "When do I get out of here?" Riesling spoke, "In a few days. We have to keep a watch on you - heart attack patients are at high risk for another heart attack after their first one."

It was a hell of a lot to digest. Doctor Riesling had basically just told her that if she didn't get back on the wagon, she was going to die a painful and agonizing death. She had a taste of that death at the buffet, and it was a damned terrifying thing - trying to breathe, losing control of her limbs, feeling her heart racing at such a horrifying pace. She had thought that it would explode, as it struggled to bring oxygen to her massive body. She felt death so close, so nearby - and it was so immensely painful, so horrifying. The morbid curiosity she had in that long-away time when she was a camgirl about how death-by-obesity felt was satisfied and it terrified her - it was a painful thing, and she felt, in part, some determination to avoid it.

Resisting it was that same classic sloth that she had developed by this point. It would take such a drastic reversal to get back to good health - she would effectively have to give up fried food, salty snacks, her favorite foods to survive. She knew how painful it would be to ignore the doctor's orders, but how psychologically doable was it for her to just give up on these foods, now that she had gone back to gorging on them? Was she just a lost cause?

She knew that eating the way she was had been responsible for almost killing her, but did she have the willpower to save herself?
12533112111112122121121122122121121.title: A grim prognosis.

choices: Claire has a problem with the gate.
Claire has a problem with her health.
12533112111112122121122.content:
Claire entered work the next day, in an old beige blouse. It was an admission of temporary surrender to her weight, but she determined to strengthen in the days and months to come. Another struggle with the wooden gate, heaving her mass past the wooden obstacle with the usual disapproving stare of Jean.

She kept up her work that day, but the constant siren call of the snacks came. No. I'm going to be strong. I'm going to be strong. She tried to focus in on her work, but it was so damned dull. Pick up that piece of paper. Occasionally talk to a disgusted-looking customer. She was worn down by it all. The stress built on her of the fact that she knew the tempting pieces of succulent caramel, of crinkly chips, of sweet chocolate, all so deadly for her, but all so good..

She gave up and found herself in the backroom. "Oh, fuck it," she mumbled to herself. She felt as though she had no choice anymore. She couldn't stand it with all the candy all over the place, all the uneaten snack inventory. By the time Dana invited her to enjoy a spare bag of food, she couldn't even fight it anymore. She had given up.

And as such, her gains over that spring increased incrementally. Every month, Jean tutted at her. Almost as a taunt, she'd lecture her about her own recent weight loss, "See, I put on like, 30 pounds over christmas. I was out of control. But I got back in control of myself. It's not christmas anymore, you need to care about your appearance and your health."

Even Claire's old, decently-fitting beige blouse became strained to the point of obscenity by the time May had come around. Her intake was frequently in excess of 5000 calories, with all of the salty, calorie-laden snacks and food that sat around the office, and the increasing amounts of take-out that she ate with Dana. Her gut billowed out and frequently took up the entire space between her knees and her chest, easily somewhere north of 530. She was in an eternal battle for breath, her breaths eternally shallow and any physical exertion requiring a gasp of air. She felt constantly sluggish, and her joints ached from the ever-increasing load put on them. At times, she felt her heart beating against the ribcage, as if seeking escape.

Her beige blouse, mercifully lacking buttons, frequently rode up and exposed the bottom of her massive gut, leaking out of her ill-fitting shirt. At times, Jean would check this with a finger and give Claire a mean stare, with all of her creases returned. "Another violation. Logbook. Now." Claire sighed and breathlessly waddled into Jean's office, towards the white binder labeled 'Disciplinary Log.' Jean stood behind Claire as she leaned on the desk, battling to get air into her overtaxed lungs from the tiny walk. She opened the log-book. Jean spoke sharply, "Don't sweat on my logbook." Claire could hear Jean barely holding back, and she held her head just so slightly back to avoid sweating on the logbook. Jean leaned around Claire's mass, not asking her to move back. Claire felt the woman's head aggressively jutting into her gut as she wrote in the book. Her heart pounded harder than normal and she grew worried that the over-indulgence of the past 5 months would take their toll here and now.

Thankfully, she didn't feel anything else - but Jean finished writing her entry and rose up slightly, but her ear stopped at Claire's chest. She listened to Claire's heart beat wildly, barely restrained and fed by an inadequate supply of blood. "Jesus, Claire, all this from a little walk?" Her head drew away, staring at Claire with an expression of shock and disgust. "And you still don't stop eating like a whale. Christ almighty." Claire weakly tried to hold back tears, and her eyes watered, but she scribbled her name in the entry for "Employee Signature." Jean spoke, "Now, this is your first formal warning. If you come to work and you have another little issue with the gate, or if you come here too obese for your clothes, or if you break one of my chairs, you're getting a pay dock to bare minimum. One more after that, and you're out."

Claire came away from work each day more worn down by even Jean's passive aggression, let alone outright unacceptable comments like she had issued in that sit-down. That day in particular, she came home to the apartment in tears. Hannah herself had slowed her gains, but still continued upward on the scale, with a belly larger by a small degree, compared to Claire's exploding form. Hannah got up, taking a breath as she did so, and did what she could to get her arms around Claire. "Oh, baby, baby, what's wrong?"

Claire pulled herself down to the couch, which creaked an insult at her. "Jean.. She..." Claire gasped for breath, taking a moment to let her tears out. "She... Called me a whale...She said...." Another pause. Hannah rested her head on Claire's immense gut, a comfortable shelf of adipose. "She said... If I have more issues...with my weight...at work...I'm gonna get docked, and then I'mgonnabefired..."She took a gasp and wailed her sorrow out. Hannah shook her head, "Fuck her. She had no right to say that to you, that's SO fucked." Claire sobbed into Hannah, soaking Hannah's already-tight teal blouse, "I can't lose weight... I've tried, but I can't do it... I'm a weak, fat, piece of shit, and I should just lay down until...." Hannah hugged Claire as tight as she could manage through what felt like an ocean of fat, she could barely feel Claire's bones through the sheets of fat. "Sshshhhhh..."

That night, the two comisserated further over beer and pizza, planning how to help Claire. Claire was at least somewhat reprieved by Hannah's comfort. It would be needed, because Ms. Spittz would face more problems ahead.
12533112111112122121122.title: A surrender to sloth.

choices: Neither of those two, try someone else.
125332.content:
Sarah is a 21 year old, weighing 650 pounds and standing at 6 feet 1 inch tall. She was always a bigger girl growing up, and once she had moved out of her parents house to live on her own, her weight has only exploded. She is currently putting herself through college and dealing with her weight, while having her own paysite documenting and displaying her swelling body to her relatively small but growing number of fans.

Isabella is a 24 year old, weighing 575 pounds and standing at 5 feet 9 inches tall. She works as the headline exotic dancer at an underground club which has acts only involving exceptionally curvy women such as Isabella. Only those in the know are aware that some of the ladies – including Isabella – offer certain special activities behind the scenes at the club.
125332.title: More characters

choices: It’s a just a friend who helps Sarah.
1253321.content:
After one last gulp, Sarah playfully sucked the serving spoon clean before dropping it into the latest empty ice cream carton. Numerous other containers littered the area around the bloated redhead, but she only cared for the webcam before her. She teasingly fluttered her eyelashes at the little camera, slowly licking her plump lips, but still missing much of the ice cream smeared around her mouth.

Breathlessly, she whispered “That will do it for this time; I hope it was as much fun for you as it was for me. And if you like, you can send in a suggestion for next week’s video, and who knows, maybe your idea will be the one featured. Bye…” she finished as she leaned forward – giving a wonderful view of the canyon of cleavage – waving her fingers at the camera, before killing the recording.

After that, Sarah slumped back into her chair, the unfortunate piece of furniture groaning heavily under the load resting atop it. She had just finished eating numerous gallons of ice cream in one sitting, at the request of one of her paying fans, as was usual for a weekly series she put out in addition to photos and the like. She regularly ate loads of ice cream like that, but not usually after having as large a breakfast or lunch as she did today. Her tongue continued to unconsciously dart out, licking at the gobs of ice cream as they melted around her mouth, but could reach most of it. She knew that she would have to clean up soon, but the cold weight settling into her gut was making her want to stay still for now. As she rested, drumming her fingers on her stomach, she looked down at the screen on the computer in front of her and saw the view that visitors to her site would view on this video: a deliciously fat young woman, who was only getting fatter with each passing day. Her breasts were packed into a lacy bra, several sizes too small, causing tit-flesh to pour our around the straining cups. These heavy udders rested atop the temple of gluttony that her stomach was; a huge fleshy sphere, the soft blubbery layer stretched a bit tight because of all of the food packed within. Out of view of the camera, her thighs were just as fat, flesh oozing out over the edges of even this extra wide seat, with a large ass that swallowed the stressed panties that was nearly hidden amongst the fatty rolls.

“That was a pretty good show, ya whale. Need anything else; a seven course meal for example?”

Sarah looked back over her shoulder at the speaker, before answering.
1253321.title: The camera doesn’t add that much weight

12533211.content:
Throwing her head behind her shoulder, Sarah beheld her boyfriend, Derek, entering their bedroom. Having met in freshman year they now were living together in a student apartment. A large part of Sarah's enormous growth over the past two years was due to Derek's aggressive enabling of Sarah's natural gluttonous instincts.

Stifling a belch, Sarah saw Derek carrying what seemed like a pretty heavy bag of fast food from her favorite venue, Wendys. "Mmm. Yeah baby you know I would," Sarah cooed breathily, her hands roving across her bloated gut. "But I don't know if this little belly here can handle much more." She gentle jiggled some of her vast ocean of blubber. "look at all the gallons of ice cream I gorged my piggy face with...and that's not including the huge meals you stuffed into my poor stomach..." Sarah moaned at remembering the piles of food she had obediently been fed by Derek. Breakfast had merged into lunch and he had only stopped when it was time for her to film for her site. "Look at me, baby, I'm so swollen and bloated I'm outgrowing my new...ompfhhh!!"

Sarah's lustful monologue and playful protests were cut short by Derek shoving an extra greasy triple cheeseburger into her mouth. "I don't think you understand, sweet little Sarah. I wasn't exactly asking you. I was telling you what your overstuffed stomach is going to have to handle next. You know you want it, don't you, piggy.

Sarah's eyes went wide with shock and lust as she passively allowed Derek to push the rest of the burger into her maw, thanking her genetics that she possessed a roomy mouth. Stuffed as she was, she could only let out a high pitched squeak of approval and nod her head. She hugged as much of her giant bulging belly as she could reach and swallowed heavily. "*pant*. Yes, sir. I want it all. I'll handle however much you choose to feed me, sir. I can't help it. I want everything." She put on innocent puppy-dog eyes, leaned further back in her groaning office chair, sticking out her giant belly out further for Derek's pleasure and offering her wrists to be cuffed. "I'm all yours."

"Damn right you are," Derek shot back, grinning wickedly and binding Sarah with a pair of handcuffs, while cramming another giant burger into her mouth. "Look at you, you giant glutton. Here you are, stuffed to the gills and you'll still eat whatever I give you." Another burger. "Look at this giant tub of lard," he said in a mock-scornful voice as he grabbed Sarah's gelatinous sack of a belly and shook it roughly, eliciting a moan from Sarah and more creaks from her office chair. "It's running away with you, but little piggy Sarah knows she can't stop eating." He let go with a pant and let it slosh back to pouring over Sarah's knees. "I even work out every day and it's hard to keep up with this growing mountain of gut. You're going to become just a mountain of glutted blubber, is that what you want? Is that your highest goal in life?" Sarah's eyes widened further at the thought, and she nodded dumbly.

Derek shook his head, "what an embarassment." He fished through the Wendy's bag, but came up empty. It was his eyes' turn to widen as he looked at his massive girlfriend and her visibly even more swollen belly. "Oh we're not done yet, my little glutton. You look like you have plenty of room.
Sarah only hiccuped a little woozily as Derek stalked off and returned with more bags. Despite herself, she licked her lips...
--------
After another hour or so, Derek finally decided to relent. Uncuffing his girlfriend, he kissed her deeply and petted her dark red hair. "You did wonderfully, sweetheart. I think this was our best record." He then began to clean up the bedroom, which by now was absolutely littered with detritus from the day's indulgences.

Sarah limply placed her hands on top of the mammoth swell of her exploding belly and groaned in overglutted haze. From what she felt cramming her gorged stomach, Derek had to be right. Letting loose a loud hiccup, she nonetheless gave her incredibly bloated gut a few gentle, proud pats, pleased that a literal mountain of rich trash food was currently quietly bubbling inside her, only to rapidly become more soft blubber and more inches on her already overloaded frame. Her eyes fluttered as her body struggled to deal with the effects of such a stupendous force-feeding and she was panting like she had ran a mile, her whole massive body jiggling with each massive, gluttonous hiccup. How much did I eat today? It literally is a mountain of food, all stuffed away here. Derek's right. I really am just a giant pig! Sarah thought to herself.

Her musings were interrupted by Derek rushing in, "C'mon Sarah, there's only a half hour before your shift at the Caf. Gotta get that gut into gear."
"HYIC! Whu-what?" Sarah asked, slightly slurring her words."

Derek laughed, "You forgot again, silly. Always thinking with your stomach. C'mon. Let's get you up."

"Derek...I don't know...HYIC! I'm seriouslyyy glutted right now...HIC HIC...I don't know if I can even think straight with all this junk in my stomach...HIC!" She whined desperately and gently jiggled so Derek could hear all her day's feasting churn turgidly, both wincing and getting turned on at the feeling.

"Hmm, well that sounds like a "Sarah" problem, doesn't it? Shouldn't have been such a pig, huh?" He kissed her cheek. "Come on, it's not that bad. You basically just sit on your big beautiful ass and ring people in for 3 hours. I'm sure even you could do that, overglutted as you are. Without further ado, he began the process of hoisting his 650+ pound girlfriend up from her seat and, putting her in a pair of tight black leggings and a black t-shirt that left a good two inches of her swollen gut around her bellybutton for all the world to see, sent her moaning and staggering off to her job, hands clutching her wildly churning stomach.
12533211.title: Derek

125332111.content:
The cafeteria was only a short waddle from the Junior student apartments, but to Sarah, who felt like she was more overfull belly than girl at the moment, it might as well have been a marathon. Stumbling forward, trying to balance the huge front-loaded weight of her superstuffed stomach, Sarah made her hiccupping, panting way through the front doors. The rest of the students arriving for the evening dinner rush conscientiously parted ways to let the enormous employee stagger to her specially designed seat at the cashier station. Gratefully crashing onto her chair, Sarah let out a long groan, "ughhhhhhh shiiit...HYIC", both hands desperately holding whatever she could of her gigantically bloated belly.

"Woah, girl. You look riiiipe..." her partner Rosita observed, one eyebrow cocked.

"Shuut...HIC...shuut up...Ooooo...Get me...a drink...now...HYIC...ughh gunna 'splode...*glurp*" Sarah panted, completely winded and struggling to keep every bit of garbage food in her stomach.

Wordlessly, Rosita got up and ran into the Cafeteria serving area as Sarah dazedly began swiping students in with practiced habit. Her "rapid" movement so soon after a great gorge had destabilized all the sludge in her gut. She desperately needed something to calm the storm.
Meanwhile Rosita was speeding back with a huge glass of ginger ale. She was used to Sarah's swollenness, but this extremity was more of a rarity. Arriving, she handed the glass to Sarah and shook her head, "man. What did ya do to yourself. Looks like Derek dumped the entire local Wendys inta there.”

Sarah didn’t immediately answer. She had desperately grabbed the glass of ginger ale and was furiously chugging it down with practiced skill. Finishing rapidly, she blew out a long silent belch from the carbonation, and gently patted the sides of her vastly engorged gut. Still panting, she felt the liquid percolate down through the mountain of junk, and breathed a sigh of relief. Everything in there seemed to be calming down, but the huge amount of soft drink didn’t do any favors for her bloated appearance, her skin-tight black shirt having retreated another two inches, baring even more of her oceanic belly to the world. Not that the confident redhead minded one bit. If she was being honest with herself, she’d show more of her unbelievably fat body off if she thought she could get away with it.

Sighing through a hiccup, Sarah lightly patted the top of her churning gut with faint pride. “HYIC! Mhm you’re not far off, Ros. There’s def a lot glutted into this gut…HYIC…’specially since I also did a stuffin’ show earlier today *uuUURRP*” Sarah chuckled softly, remembering the gallons of ice cream again. “Phew that was a close….*glurp* call though. Thanks…HIC! You’re a lifesaver.” Reclining a bit more in her chair to give her heaving stomach more room to churn her gluttony, her seemingly endless sack of a gut still spilled gelatinously over her knees.

Rosita snorted. She had known about Sarah’s kink and “side job” for a while now. A thick-set girl herself with big thighs and a juicy potbelly, she looked overwhelmingly tiny compared to Sarah. The same thing corresponded with their appetites. Rosita was a hungry girl who enjoyed her food, and plenty of it, but the mountains that Sarah could glut into her stomach boggled her mind. At the same time, Rosita sometimes took a perverse delight in observing just how much Sarah could handle, and egging her on to greater heights of indulgence, far beyond what was safe for the structural integrity of her bubbling stomach. There didn’t seem to be any harm, Rosita reasoned, since Sarah was into the whole thing anyway. Staring at the gargantuan mass, Rosita whistled: “shiiiit, and you’re still conscious? I’m surprised you made it at all.”

“HYIC! Yeah I’m good.” Feeling smug, Sarah grabbed two relatively tiny handfuls of her blubber and gave her gut a light jiggle, jostling her glut around and knocking a larger hiccup loose: “*blurbleHELP!! Ooof! I’ve been able to stuff a lot more into myself lately…HYELP!” She covered her mouth after the last loud hiccup and giggled. “HeheheheHIC but Derek demanded I drag my fat ass here *gurgle*” Sarah moaned: “I think the jerk likes seeing me struggle with all this woman...HIC!!”

“WhatEVER are you gonna do with yourself,” Rosita snarked sarcastically.”

Sarah belched nonchalantly: “URP...keep on overeating. Keep on getting fatter. *HYIC* Growing this gut.” She affectionately rubbed as much of the massive churning sphere that she could. “*glurble* Keep tryna find trashier *HIC!* and junkier foods *URP* to glut inta my stomach.” She scratched her chin. “In fact if it weren’t for Derek *HIC* I’d probably just laze around the room...*ELP*...digesting all day’s eatings...prolly have an lil’ snack...*glorpHICC*

“A SNACK? Yah right. Weren’t you the fat girl who stumbled in her just about to pop?” Rosita cocked her head and put her hands on her fleshy hips. She knew when Sarah meant a “snack” it probably was enough for a full meal for two people. “Besides, girl lookat yourself! Ya don’t think MAYYYYBE you’re big enough? You’re easily the fattest chick on campus.”

“Duh. There’s always room in this belly for a snack or two...*HYIC*...or more...” Sarah responded greedily, “That was then *ELP*...this is now.” She lightly squeezed the turgid flanks of her gut and patted: “*glurbleHYIC* My stomach can handle it. *ELP* It recovers quickly. *blorp*” Despite her desperately full state, Sarah couldn’t help but instinctively lick her lips at the trays and plates that her fellow students were shuttling around to the tables outside the serving areas. “B’sides Ros, ya know what I *HYIC* do. The bigger I get *glorp* the more money I make *URP*.” She grinned wickedly, “It’s a great incentive *ELP* ta eat everything in sight *HIC*. I’m 658 pounds as of last Monday, HICC!” Sarah grinned wider at the wide eyed stare her colleague gave her, “an’ this huge gut ain’t gettin’ anything but bigger...HYYICC*glorp*” Sarah leaned back further in her compliant chair to show Rosita the full magnitude of her gargantuan belly. Stretching her arms as far as she could reach, the tips of her fingers only made it half way down her gut, just to here her shirt had rolled up.

Rosita’s eyes gleamed. This was too good an opportunity to let go “So whaddya waiting for, chubby?” She patted a part of Sarah’s bulging blubbery belly. “Go for it. I’ll cover for ya. I hear Lou is makin’ his fried chicken tonight. Maybe he can hook ya up with somethin’ special.”

Sarah abruptly looked up from semi-recline, straining to see Rosita over the mountain of her gut, the junky sludge within unpleasantly shifting with the effort “*glurbleblorp*HYIC! Ya...ya mean that, Ros?” Sarah already began to drool at the thought of Lou’s cooking. There was no cook who made food richer and more delicious, as well as ridiculously fattening.

“Duh, fat chick’s gotta eat, don’t she? Show me what that gut can do!” Rosita stuck out her tongue and pushed at Sarah’s back. Damn even her back is plush Rosita wondered.

“HYIC. Ya got that right. Mmm. Off I gooo...*URPglop*” Sarah wheeled herself upright, and with an renewed eagerness that belied her previously struggling state, trundled off into the serving area, not hesitating to grab handfuls of gooey cookies off the servery and double fisting them into her mouth: “mmmmfHIC! This is gonna be RICH...HYIC!”

Rosita watched with anticipation. What kind of state would the massive redhead gorge herself into this time?
125332111.title: Sarah at Work

choices: Something isn't sitting well with Sarah
1253321111.content:
Munching her way through cookies, Sarah made her ponderous way to the back of the serving area, every eager ponderous step produced a muffled bubble or churn as the shock of the footstep spread through the mountain of digesting food within Sarah’s strained vat of a stomach. The lure of the servery proved overpowering, and Sarah just began straight out gorging herself from station to station. Taking a large plate, she filled and refilled it with all kinds of goodies, greedily cramming her mouth with piles of fried chicken, bacon-wrapped hot-dogs, stacks of deep-dish pizza with veritable pools of grease, piles of cheesey mashed potatoes and great gobs of gooey mac ‘n’ cheese. “Mmmmmfff yesh *HYICC* thatsh *gulp* the schtuff...*blorpELP!” Sarah mumbled to herself through a stuffed mouth “*glorp* thish wash *gulp* the besht *chompURP* idea EVER *HYICC*...*gulp* sho much eatingg...ELP!”. She clearly felt her gorged stomach struggle with the new input of this overly rich and heavy glut, but Sarah couldn’t care less. She was a glutton and her stomach would handle it no matter what else was in there. She was in the throes of greed, and nothing else mattered.

Staggering forward, the massive front-loaded weight of her glutted gut making walking difficult, Sarah was steadily eating her way toward the desserts when a insanely greedy thought hit her. Giggling through her hiccups, she took a particularly wide piece of fried chicken and began piling it high with layers of burger patties, bacon, cheese mashed potatoes, bacon bits, thick slices of cheese, trios of hotdogs cut down the middle, french fries, potato chips, slathering each layer with mayo and ranch dressing, and finally pressing another large piece of fried chicken on top for an insanely fattening version of the double-down. Opening her large mouth and pushing as much of her creation in as possible, she bit down and involuntarily shuddered at the explosion of fried, greasy, savory, fatty flavors. “Mmmmmffff....oh yesshhhh...HYICCC.” Marveling at the flavor of her own ingenuity, Sarah busily stuffed both hands into her mouth, forcing the massive monstrosity down her throat at breakneck speed, triggering an even richer hiccup, even as she rapidly made another: “HYELP!! Oooof! Oh mann that was TOO good...*glorpHIC* Imma name that...Sarah’s Special...HYELP!!” Three more massive piles of glutty goodness were summarily slapped together and gorged into Sarah’s miserable stomach. Hiccupping richly and happily, Sarah wandered to get a drink, arms wide out to balance her stupendous gut when...

“HYEELP!...ooo....*glurble*...Lasagna...*URPHYELP*...this is RICH...HYELP!” Sarah stopped suddenly in front of a huge pan of meaty, cheesy lasagna with only one or two slabs cut from it by other students, the mass of indigested sludge sloshing within her at the abrupt stop, her blubber jiggling across her body in slow, lazy waves. Visibly licking her lips, Sarah parked her massive body in front of the station and shoveled huge slab after huge slab of the rich pasta dish into her maw, moaning at the flavor and her own gluttony. Each heavy swallow slammed into her swollen stomach with a sickening *GLOPSQUELCH* and Sarah swore she could feel her massive gut bloat larger and larger with each huge slab...until it was all gone. Releasing an even richer hiccup, Sarah daintily placed both hands on top of her monstrous belly and gave it some light, smug pats. God I’m such a pig. That Lasagna alone coulda fed a buncha people but now it’s allll here bubblin’ in m’stomach. Hiccupping again, she wheeled around to continue her glutting only to see a line of nervous, but disappointed freshmen. The massive junior was not only tall, but enormously fat and by the boiling digestion of her stomach, seemed to be one bite from exploding. Sarah thought fast, “uhhhhHYELLLP! Y’guys didn’t want that one...burbbleHELP!! It was startin’ ta get an bit ripe...HICELP!!” She lightly jiggled the top of her gut “*glurbleglop* Best you let me ‘n’ m’stomHYIC...HYELPglop! Handle it for ya....*burbleblorp*” The freshmen seemed transfixed by the quaking ocean of her blubber and the churning of her gluttony to say anything and shuffled off.

“I know for a fact that dish right there wasn’t cold. You was just hungry, Sarah sweetie.” Sarah whipped her head around to see Lou leaning on top of the sneeze-guard, ladle lazily twirling in his other hand, a knowing smile gracing his visage.

She grinned: “HYELP! Well of COURSE I was...HIC! Can’t let all this waste away!...*blurbleHELP!” Sarah grabbed handfuls of her gargantuan gut and struck a cute pose, the overfed girl sticking her monstrous belly out even further. Sauntering over to the counter, Sarah batted her big blue eyes, her giant gorged gut piling against and over the lower guard with a sludgy *glorbleblurp* in a tidal wave of swollen blubber. “HYELP!! Sooooo whatcha got for your...HELP...faaaaavorite customer...HYIC!”

“Well I dunno, hun. Ya look like y’already had a few dinners.” Lou gestured to Sarah’s mammoth belly.

Sarah huffed. “Hmpf. Why’s everyone...HYELP...sayin’ that.” She crossed her arms over her prodigious bosom. “*glurbleglop* Listen....HELP! Let ME worry ‘bout my stummick...HYELP*glorp*...and YOU worry ‘bout feedin’ it...HYELP!” She smugly spread her hands indulgently over the superswollen top shelf. “*blurbleHYELP! This baby can handle a whole LOT *glurbleglop* more junk...HICELP!”

Lou pondered for a moment. “Hmm. Well I can’t have ya blundering through the servery stuffin ya face with anything in sight. Rosita shrugged. “I’ll let him know.” If Sarah wanted to eat herself gigantic so quickly, at least Ros would have a front row seat to the swelling. “See ya tomorrow then!” and left.

After she shut the door, Derek walked around and pushed on Saraha’s massive overgorged gut. “You look incredible, babe. Even I can’t believe how much you shoved into this monstrous gut, and I’ve seen you eat a LOT...You’ve eaten so much you’re pinned down by the weight of your own gluttony!”

12533211111.title: Later on...

125332111111.content:
The next morning, the alarm clock sounded its shrill song, but a few seconds after, a fat-stuffed hand with sausage-fingers fumbled for the snooze button. Sarah lay lounging in bed on this Saturday morning, comfortably warm, and still uncomfortably overgorged, until Derek eagerly called from the other room: “Sarah! It’s just incredible! You have to see this!” It was a Saturday, and since Sarah didn’t have class, she usually preferred to lounge sleepily until late morning at least. Grumbling miserably, but interested in what Derek had to say, Sarah ever so slowly dumped her gargantuan body out of her bed, onto the floor with a great *SLOP GLOOOSH* punctuated by a rich rich hiccup. Her incredible gluttony the day and night before had extended, albeit not as vigorous, late into the evening. On 4 hours of digestion, Sarah’s stomach was still verrry stuffed from her previous day of eating, but such things certainly wouldn’t stop her from glutting herself more in short order. Stomach still complaining about being moved, Sarah, unsteadily patted her mammoth belly and slowly wobbled herself into the kitchen, crashed down on the floor on her cushy butt with a loud *GLOPHYELP!*, and groggily greeted Derek.

“Someone still seems a bit full from yesterday”, Derek coyly remarked.

“HYELP! Shuddup you...that’s YOUR doing by the way...*burbleHYIC!” She wrinkled her nose. “I had no idea you had THAT much milkshake...HICELP *glurglegloop*.” Sarah pressed into her gut, “I c’n still feel that thick goop...HELP bubblin’ away in here...URPGLOP.”

Derek smirked “I didn’t see you stopping, hun. Anyway, take an look at this.” He brought a laptop down to Sarah’s level, the screen displaying the most recent video on her paysite. “I took the opportunity to record the results of last night’s...festivities...and uploaded it to your site.” He pointed to the number of downloads and positive comments. “Sarah, they LOVE it! You’re getting major hits!”

Sarah squinted at the screen and indeed her newest video seemed to be trending upward at an skyrocketing rate. “Huh, would you look at that...HYELP!” She grinned and rubbed the blubbery flanks of her gut. Winking at Derek, she replied, “I guess this means I have my work cut out for me today. Time to start the Saturday smorgasbord...*glurp*” She checked her watch, “9:30 sounds like as good a time as any...HYELP...Let’s see how much I can glut inta here today...*glurbleHELP!*” She patted her gut readily.

The two were giddy with excitement, and in short order Sarah was dressed and tottering her way to the cafeteria.
