Isabella wiped her brow as she tried to catch her breath. "God damn, the things I do for these pervs"

Isabella had just finished a 30 minute mile walk on the highest uphill setting on her custom treadmill she was provided as the premier headliner at the exclusive 'Bakery' club. The ever creativily named underground club for men and women who enjoyed women on the 'Larger Side' had been around since the late 60's. The 'Bakery' called that because the club was underneath a real well known bakery that had a secret back entrance that lead to a club that served fat admirers and made their dreams come true. Anything was fair game, from nice and legal squashings and stuffings to other less than legal activities.

Isabella found herself as one of the main attractions after she was recruited to work their after college. The massive Samoan/Latina was receruited as her frequent visits to the normal bakery. Izzy found herself coming here after Softball practice when she was a tiny 275 pounds freshman year. After joining the weightlifting and boxing club at her university her appetite only grew as she stuffed herself silly after practice. Little did she know she was being scouted by the "manager" who also served as a recruiter for the underground bakery. By the time she was a senior Isabella was visiting the bakery everyday and always got her food for free. She had grown to 450 pounds by the time she graduated and her immense size and unique physical prowess made her a prime candidate to work at the bakery.

Isabella was a Kinesiology/Biology/Chemistry pre med triple major/athlete at the small private catholic university which didn't offer athletic scholarships due to their small student population. She was bitching to the 'manager' who despite being a regular for nearly 5 and a half years she still didn't know his real name.

"God dammit, 250 k of debt just so I could play softball in college, I'm a huge dumbass literally, fuckin other colleges saying I'm too fat to play for them" she scoffed as she stuffed another eclair in her mouth.

The manager smirked, "you know Izzy, I can help make that debt go away"

Isabella swallowed her eclair and reached for another eclair only to find an empty box. The manager was already handing her another box of a dozen donuts."how can you do that? Hire me here" she laughed as she grabbed a donut.

"Not here, follow me, come behind the counter"

Isabella was confused, but grabbed the donuts and followed the mysterious man behind the counter and into a back area she'd never seen before. The manager did a unique knock and said "Go Saints". That's weird Isabella thought, that was her university's mascot.

A slot opened and some eyes peeked through and then the wall slid open. Leading to a massive stairwell. Inside Izzy saw massive women dancing and squashing men and the rest was history.

Now Isabella was in her loft provided courtesy of the bakery working out doing leg day on her day off. If Isabella was skinnier she would have been the perfect woman having an hour glass figure since she was 11 years old. Unfortunately for mainstream society and fortunately for not so mainstream interest her love of eating surpassed her desire to be beautiful by traditional standards.

She loved 3 things growing up: eating, working out and playing sports. And her former football player dad and Latina mother encouraged all 3. She didn't let her eating habits get in the way of her athletic career and led her high school to a state championship in Volleyball, Softball, Basketball and Soccer her senior year. When she graduated she was 350 pounds and despite her obvious talent the only school that would let her do any sports was St. Paul University in the city.

At St. Paul she led her university to their 1st national championship her junior and senior year despite her 100 pound weight gain. She set school records for weightlifting and won the amateur boxing championship as well. She was a massive athlete and when she graduated she was a unique specimen for 'The Bakery' to mold.

Isabella was an immediate hit at the club. She had the flexibility of a yogi, the face of a ballerina, the appetite of a pig and the abilities of a even the best exotic dancers. She quickly moved up the ranks from server to dancer, to a headliner making many of the more tenured girls jealous. Whoever ran the underground bakery had connections all over the city and after no longer having to pay for food at any restaurant within a 25 mile radius of the Bakeries location, receiving groceries for free and plus the bakery's behind the door activities she gained 100 pounds in just 6 months.

Isabella sat her fat sweaty ass on her reinforced love seat which she took up completely with her mass and chugged a weight gain shake. It was her day off and she was gonna relax. When her phone rang.

The manager left the room rubbing his hands in satisfaction letting out a rare grin. He pulled out his phone and dialed the number he was given.

555-568-5515, the phone rang and a deep pitched voice could be heard on the other line.

"Thank you for your generous donation, we made the requested remodeling necessary for this activity, I did everything exactly as instructed and the money has been received."

"Excellent" Mr. X replied as he sat in a room surrounded by a few ladies and gentlemen

"The age of fatwave is coming, me and our partners will ensure it and by allowing "gorda grande" to test out our product you will be well ahead of the curve. Women considered Super Sized will soon be considered anorexic to people of similar interests"

"I appreciate you honoring our establishment with your services, since we were founded we have been the proprietor of fine women of the larger persuasion"

"Who else would I call? We have been doing business for years, your women have been our test dummies and after the failure of the three previous women, we believe we have finally tweaked our product to ensure survival of your Isabella"

The manager thought back to the horrific mess, it was certainly a tedious clean up job, "Excellent, she's lasted longer and has expanded much more organically than the others, I would hate to have to clean up another mess after, but we will have to wait and see.

"Wait and see indeed, it was a pleasure doing business as always, I will contact you through the usual means.

"Indeed, always a pleasure, until next time" and with that Mr. X hung up leaving a dial tone.

Mr. X and the other shadowy figures watched as increasingly larger items came down the conveyor belt. After the 1st incident they learned it was better to prevent the subjects from being able to see what they were eating.

The figures watched in interest as a whole pig disappeared into the growing woman.

"This is where the other subject failed" spoke one of the figures a woman

"Indeed let's see if she can handle it" another man said.

They all clapped as the pig easily made its way between Isabella's plump lips.

"Excellent, she's going to outgrow the room, the 1st to succeed in doing so"

"Yes excellent" Mr. X spoke in a monotone voice, "let's see if she's the one to pass the test"

They watched in earnest as progressively larger animals came through, a pony, donkey, full grown horse and even the hippo passed through her lips with little trouble. They watched as she soon reached the 3rd floor with no signs of stopping.

Another woman spoke up, "What about those pesky scientist who raised these ethical questions"

"Don't worry" Mr. X said as a multiple bound and gagged scientists began to appear on the screen on the conveyor belt, some fearful and others accepting of their fate. "They're being dealt with as we speak" he smiled.

One figure prepared to leave, "it seems we finally had a successful project, I'm going to contact my movie and television connections"

Another figure also got up, "I must contact my music contacts, let them know project fatwave is ready"

The figures dispersed leaving just Mr. X who began maniacally laughing. "Perfect, just perfect and the fools don't even know they're opening Pandora's box"

12533232221.content:
Ellen has been obese her whole life. When she was a little girl she was about 250 lbs, by the time she was in high school she had double that weight to 500 lbs. She was mocked every day by people for her weight but instead of crying home to her mom she instead spend most of her time studying and reading many books of all genres.

Ellen graduated high school the top of her class and a few months after graduation she began writing a fantasy story that she's been working on since high school. After she finished writing the story she sent it to a publisher that was interested in her story and after reading it they loved and sent it to publication and it became an immediate best seller with three sequels and a fourth one on the way.

While Ellen was now a famous author her love life was non existent. Until her sister (who was skinnier than her) set up a blind date for her. When she met the guy named Tom who was 10 years older than her but was still a pretty handsome guy. They hit it off immediately and they started to learn things about each other. For example Tom mentioned that he is a doctor and has two daughters from his previous wife who sadly passed away from cancer.

After a few weeks of dating Tom introduced Ellen to his daughters Alice and Lisa. Alice showed no interest while Lisa was shy at first but after a little while she began to like Ellen. After a year of them dating Tom and Ellen got married and they've been happy ever since except for Alice who was mad that her dad would remarried after her mom died.

12533232222.content:
Let’s check out Zoe’s story.

About 3 years ago, Zoe lived the average life of a college athlete. She studied, she partied, she played volleyball for her tuition, and had for most of her life, followed a strict diet. One night on a whim, Zoe had entered the lottery when the rest of her team did. Surely an act of peer pressure. Yet in any sense who wouldn’t? The pot was well worth over 700 million and with each entrant increasing the pot over time.

As fate would have it, Zoe won the pot! Immediately she dropped out of college, took her two best friends: Hanna, another team member of the volleyball team and Lory, a fellow student athlete friend of hers. She took them down to Los Angeles where Zoe bought a home and entered early retirement. Hanna and Lory had become well paid servants of Zoe’s.

And as time went on, Zoe had sunk into unmotivated laziness. She sunk into unhealthy diet of empty carbs and endless supply of greasy foods which ballooned the former volleyball player from 160 pounds to 500 pounds on the dot. Zoe is often pestered by Lory and Hanna to go on a diet, but she thinks maybe the two should try getting fat before they knock it.
12533232222.title: Zoe, the young lottery winner

125332322222.content:
Always more choices, eh? Well, how does one of these two suit you:

1) Alison Park

Alison had been a very popular and athletic girl through out much of her school life. The key words are "had been." In her final year of middle school, she'd suffered a terrible injury at a volleyball game, ending all her athletic hopes. She was forced to fall back on her academic skills, which, thanks to no longer being second to sports, she was able to excel at. She was accepted to her university of choice. Two years in, her grades were looking great, and it seemed likely she'd graduate with honours.

Her waistline, however, was not looking so great. Thanks to numerous factors, almost immediately after her injury, her body began to expand by leaps and bounds, stunning everyone both with the scale and rapidity of her weight gain. Stress over her grades and the reactions of her fair weather friends had led her to become even more isolated, which in turn led to her eating more and getting even fatter.

Alison is barely a quarter inch over five feet tall. She has pale skin, which hasn't been helped by her excessive time indoors, and long brown hair. She doesn't know her current weight, having last been weighed when she was 17. At the time, she was 363 pounds, and swore off ever stepping on a scale again. Now at 20, she knows she's undoubtedly gained a lot more, as she seems to be constantly outgrowing everything...

2) Julia Fuller

Julia, maiden name Miller, is a young wife of 23. She'd married her high school sweetheart, Isaac, right out of school. Her family had been less then supportive, but the two young lovers had managed to make their way in the world. Isaac had gotten his CPA credentials and was working as a tax accountant. Julia had been working as a secretary, but had quit when she was pregnant with their first child.

It was during her pregnancy that something in their relationship changed. Isaac had honestly told her of his preference for big, gaining women back in school, and given how bad her cravings were, she decided this was the perfect time to see if her hubby was being honest.

And yes, he most definitely was.

Isaac had had no qualms about keeping Julia stuffed like a turkey, and Julia had happily sat on the couch and overindulged throughout her pregnancy. Her consumption never dropped after birth, however, and it increased twice more with both her subsequent pregnancies. The effects of her diet and lack of exercise were hard to miss. She was like a living balloon, being steadily inflated by food.

Five years into her marriage, her eldest daughter is starting Kindergarten. Julia is fatter then ever ("unbelievably fat," as she would describe it), and really starting to feel every pound weighing her down. Chasing down three kids seems harder and harder by the day, while eating another burger or box of cookies is getting easier. On top of that, she thinks she might be pregnant again. And while she loves her kids, eating a lot, and gaining weight, she is starting to worry that she's approaching a crossroads she can never turn back from...

At story start, Julia is 5'9" tall, with short black hair and brown eyes. When she last weighed herself, she was 538 pounds, though that was six months, three pant sizes and four bras ago.

3) Or if none of these appeal, perhaps someone else?
125332322222.title: More choices

1253323222221.content:
"Are you sure you're ready for this?"

"No, but tell me anyway."

Alison stood on a scale she'd recently purchased online. It was a massive thing, reaching up to 700 pounds. It certainly cost a pretty penny too, although she kept that one to herself. Unfortunately, it didn't have either a speech mode or a wireless digital read out, so she had grabbed her friend and room mate, Tiffany, to help her out.

Tiffany took a deep breath before answering. "613 pounds." She didn't tell Allie that she was rounding down.

Alison felt her heart skip a beat. She'd known she was fat, but over 600.... she couldn't fathom it.

She certainly looked every bit of her weight, though. Alison stood in only a bra and a pair of panties she'd purchased online, as there wasn't a store in a hundred miles that carried garments in her size. Her great, cavernous belly hung down to her knees, jiggling like liquid with each lumbering step she took, slapping heavily against her equally massive and jiggly thighs. Her arse stuck out over two feet behind her, and was nearly as wide as she was tall. The fact that her love handles were still managing to crush her cheeks was nothing short of impressive, and all this conspired to try and make her taller laying down then she was standing up.

Perhaps an exaggeration, but at the moment, Allie didn't think so.

Her breasts were impossibly huge things, each larger then her head. One benefit of her belly being so huge was the extra support it gave her gargantuan girls when she went bra-less, whether it be by choice or necessity. At the moment confined by a massive white bra, the soft jiggle both engaged endlessly in was a clear indication that the lardy things certainly couldn't support themselves.

Her arms had fattened so much that her upper arms had developed fat rolls of their own, something she had previously thought impossible.

Her head and neck had bore their share of the lardaceous bounty, as well. She had sizable chipmunk cheeks, a double and triple chin, and her neck had disappeared under a roll of its own, which was then promptly buried in her shoulder fat.

Alison was quite simply enormous, and though Tiffany was considerably taller then her friend, at 139 pounds she was dwarfed by Allie's sheer mass.

Alison stepped off the scale and made her way to the couch. Her titanic thighs forced her to adopt a slow, heavy waddle, and she swung her arms as she moved to help herself maintain balance. Tiff tried not to pay attention to how much of her friend "moved" as she walked the short distance to the only piece of furniture capable of supporting her weight. Alison sat down, bringing an agonized creak from the sofa. She grabbed a box of doughnuts from the end table next to her and began to scarf them down.

Tiff cocked an eyebrow at this. "Are you sure that's a good idea?"

Alison just snorted. "Why? Do you think it's going to make me fat?" She slapped her belly, sending a ripple through the flabby flesh coating her middle. Her sticky fingers, coated with jam from the pastries, smeared sugary goodness on her overfed rolls. If she noticed the mess she'd made on herself, she made no attempt to clean it off, grabbing another treat and stuffing it in her face.

Tiff sighed. "That's not what I meant and you know it. I'm worried about you, okay!? I've known you for three years, and you've been eating and growing like crazy the whole time! You still move remarkably well for someone your size, but that can't last. What are you going to do when you can't take care of yourself, hmm? What about your health? Have you even considered losing weight?"
1253323222221.title: The Land Whale of Apartment 3B

choices: And now for something completely different
12533232222211.content:
"Oh, wow, really!? I can lose weight instead of gain it? Well, this changes everything! All those years of being followed by oinking teenagers, or putting up with my mother's bull shit sarcasm, or my Dad's passive-aggressive crap, spending literally all my time alone, and it never occurred to me that I could just lose the weight! Golly gee whiz, Tiff, this changes everything! Thank you so much for your input!"

Tiffany was hardly one to take that laying down. "Oh, f@#$ you! So sorry I was worried about you! Fine, keep eating, then! See if I care when the floor gives way under your gigantic ass!"

"I will! I don't recall ever asking for your concern anyway!"

Tiff put her hands up in the air. "That's it. I'm out. If I have to listen to anymore of this, I'm going to scream."

"That is fine by me. Hey, as long as you're out, could you grab some more doughnuts? Seems we're almost out."

Tiff stopped midway through putting her shoes on, jaw open, aghast and furious that Alison would even say that. She didn't say a word, only grabbing her purse and left.

Alison gave a snort and turned her attention back to the box of pastries, grabbing a bear claw and sinking her teeth into the delectable dessert.

******

Tiffany was only gone about an hour before she came back. Alison had, in the meantime, demolished what was left of the doughnuts and cooked a frozen pizza, which she was almost halfway done eating. The tubby young woman looked at her room mate coming in the door, and her eyes widened as she saw Tiffany struggling with a massive armload of take out containers. She saw Thai food, Chinese, at least one pizza, and a cake, and that's just what she could see.

As Tiffany forced her haul onto their overfilled coffee table, Allie had to ask, "What's all that for?"

As Tiff turned to look at her, she gave a grin that sent a chill up Alison's deeply buried spine. "Why piggy, it's all for you."

Tiffany made her way to Allie, draping herself over her massively obese room mate's flabby frame. "You asked me to help you find out how much you weigh, and then attack me when I point out eating like a pig isn't going to help? But, I guess I shouldn't be surprised. You're such a perfect little pig, aren't you?"

Tiffany grabbed a slice of pizza from Alison's plate, and brought it to the 600 pound girl's mouth. Alison initially tried to keep her mouth closed, but Tiffany just reached over and forced it open, making her take a big bite and keeping her hand over Alison's lips, forcing her to chew and swallow.

"You couldn't even wait until I got back. You just had to eat something, didn't you? Such a hungry piggy." Tiffany ran her hand over Allie's huge belly rolls, jiggling and rubbing where her stomach roughly should have been.

"Well, don't you worry, Piggy," Tiffany said, bringing the slice back to her mouth. Alison hesitated, then slowly took a big bite of her own accord. As she chewed, Tiffany continued. "You'll never have to be hungry again. You just need to eat and eat and eat. Just keep eating and getting fatter. That's all you have to do."

Tiffany forced the remainder of the slice into Alison's mouth. "Eat more."

She kept her one hand on Alison's cheek as she chewed and swallowed. "Get fatter."

She grabbed another slice. "Getting fatter will stretch out your stomach."

Alison felt her eyes start watering a little as she opened her mouth for another bite. "So you'll need to eat more."

Tiffany shoved almost too much of the slice into Allie's mouth, leaving her barely able to chew. "So you'll get even fatter."

Alison swallowed the bite with some difficulty, coughing lightly as she did so. Tiffany offered her a sip of a drink, and as Allie pulled on the straw, realized that it was a chocolate milkshake. Moving the empty plate aside, Tiffany grabbed the first of the fast food containers.

"You're going to eat more every day. You're going to get fatter every day. You're going to eat until your belly hurts, then eat even more the next day. You won't slow down for anything, will you? Not even the ability to walk."

Alison's lip trembled but she didn't hesitate to open her mouth as Tiffany started shoveling noodles into her mouth.

"Like a good little piggy."
12533232222211.title: Of course I have!

choices: Alison's semester resumes Monday, but it's movement she's struggling with.
Tiffany's grades aren't looking so hot - she stress "disposes" of Ali's snacks.
125332322222112.content:
Alison woke up to Tiffany still opening the door, but without vast amounts of fattening food like she had in what she just realized was a dream. She had a pounding headache, so bad she grit her teeth. She felt back down to her belly - it was all still there - all 613 pounds of it. She was only slightly resenting of the fact that all the food she was eating wasn't real as she felt her hunger.

"Still hungry?" said Tiffany, incredulously. Alison glared a look at her of weariness and anger. "Yes. I am." said Alison in her low-to-mid tone, Alto voice, compared to Tiffany's projecting, higher soprano. Tiffany shrugged. "I just got groceries - and yes, you're going to eat what I eat." Alison gawked incredulously. "You're -putting me- on a diet? What are you, my mother?" Tiffany shot a dagger-like glance at her. "If you eat nothing but pastries and insist on trying to give yourself type 2 diabetes, then yes, it seems I'll have to be your mother to stop you from dying before 30." Tiffany wore a crop-top - her stomach jiggled ever so slightly as well, but it was peanuts compared to Tiffany's huge gut which boggled the mind with its scale. If one were to put a yardstick up next to a seated Alison, the mass that was her gut would take up about 2/3 of the 3 foot stick. Around, it measured well over 100 inches.

But Alison, disregarding these glaring facts, said "You're one to talk - your belly jiggles when you walk, Tiff!" Tiffany frowned and instinctively grabbed her gut - as if to shield it from criticism. Tiffany was not 'fat' by any standards, still at a normal BMI at 5'7, but she was still somewhat insecure about her jiggly stomach when it came up like this. "Oh, so this means nothing?" Tiffany strode up to Alison and shook her exposed stomach - she never bothered to put her clothes back on - "Hmm? Hmm?" The great, gargantuan gut rippled as Tiffany played with it roughly. Alison pulled her away from her stomach. "Don't talk shit if you're not necessariy a VS model either." Tiffany spoke gruffly and loudly, shouting. "I'M AT A NORMAL WEIGHT, YOU'RE MORBIDLY OBESE. THERE'S A FUCKING BIG DIFFERENCE BETWEEN US," she pointed for emphasis at the couch, "AND YOU CAN'T TELL ME TO LEAVE - YOU CAN BARELY GET UP ON YOUR OWN!" Tiffany took a breath and spoke rapidly, "So the LEAST you could do is to go with this meal plan I'm setting for you. Or go buy the groceries yourself - at least it'd get you -walking-."

With that, the firey redhead turned about and began putting up groceries. "Now shut up and let me put up groceries. Get back to eating your shit - it'll either get rid of it faster, or get rid of -you- faster. If you're going to be a fat, ungrateful bitch, I don't care which."

Alison grunted. It was a weekend. She'd go out to get away from this cunt - but she didn't to put up with the normal difficulties. Every single other person looking at her with that judging stare she'd become blase to.

So she turned to the one sympathetic friend she had in this moment - food.

She got to finishing up her donut box - the remaining three were the glazed she didn't care too much for, but they were something. She reached over the couch for something else from the basket of goodies under the end table - it was full of some salty snacks she liked to munch on, especially in these moments.
125332322222112.title: Reality - for better or worse -  sinks in.

choices: And now for something completely different
1253323222221122.content:
A couple days of forced dieting later, and the new routine seemed like it was already getting old.

The two room mates hadn't had another blow up like the one on the weekend, but there was definitely a fair bit of tension in the apartment. Peace was only kept because Alison didn't grumble about the health food and small portions she was forced to eat, and Tiffany didn't bring up Allie heading out for fast food binges while claiming she was just "picking up the mail."

"She either doesn't know or doesn't care that I can smell it on her. Well, at least she's getting more vegetables in her diet, and walking a bit more."

Tiff knew she'd come off rather rough with Alison before (as had Alison to be honest), but she was legitimately worried about her. The young woman had been pretty fat when they met, and she'd gotten so huge over the last three years. Tiffany was really worried about something bad happening to her friend. "I'm way too young to be burying my friends."

Of course, there were other reasons she'd lost her temper so quickly. Tiffany was looking at the results of her midterms, and felt sick as she contemplated how poorly she'd done.

She had a lot of distractions going on in her life right now. Beyond the events with Allie, her Mom and Dad were going through a rather nasty divorce that had been building up for years. On top of that, her Grandma was in the hospital, and the end result of all of this was that studying for class and doing assignments was nearly impossible.

Making matters worse was her scholarship. If her GPA dropped too low, she'd be cut off financially, and her deadbeat Dad made sure that there wasn't any chance of her parents bailing her out.

"He knows he'll get his ass handed to him in the divorce, so what does he do? Takes his drunk-ass buddies to Mexico, and spends every God damn cent on hookers and blow." By the time The Deadbeat got back to the States, her parent's joint checking and savings accounts were overdrawn, and all their credit cards maxed out. Her poor Mom was quite literally sick when she found out, vomiting in the kitchen sink.

Tiffany wasn't really the crying sort, but if she was, she'd be bawling right now. She put the paperwork on her desk and rubbed her forehead, feeling a migraine coming on. She opened one of her desk drawers and withdrew a box of cookies. They'd been Alison's before her enforced diet, and like most of her treats, Tiffany had "thrown them out."

What she'd actually done was put them in her room, eating them whenever the stress got to be too much. Given her old man's addictions to both alcohol and gambling and fears that he may have passed those genes on, Tiffany wasn't ever going to consider a stiff drink as a means of relaxation.

She pulled four cookies out of the package, biting into the first one with a soft coo. It may not have been good for her, but right now, she needed this.

******

Alison walked into her room, and saw a few dollars on her desk that she knew she hadn't put there. Little did she know, but Tiff was feeling guilty about eating the treats she'd paid for, and was subtly reimbursing the massive young woman.
1253323222221122.title: Tiffany might be in a spot of trouble

choices: Isaac bought treats and a new scale
And now for something completely different
1253323222222.content:
"Grr! Come on! Almost...! Got it...!"

Julia was currently engaged in one of the hardest things she had to do today; the arduous task of undoing her pants.

"Just about...!"

Now, for a normal person, such an activity could be described as many things, but difficult certainly wasn't one of them. Julia's measurements were anything but normal, however. The sheer scale of her belly and bust meant that she was operating by her sense of touch alone. Matters were further complicated by the fact that these pants were simply too tight, and honestly should have been replaced a couple weeks ago.

And then, just to make this extra challenging, she had to stuff herself to the brim yet again before trying to remove them.

She gave another grunt of exertion as she pulled at them even harder. With a loud "POP!" her gargantuan belly surged forward and launched the pants' button across the room, where it smacked loudly into the wall. Julia jumped at the sudden sound as her fat surged forward, taking advantage of all this newfound space.

"Well, I suppose that works," she thought as she reached for another cupcake.

Julia Fuller could be called a Homemaker, although that would imply she was looking after her children in some way. With her eldest now attending kindergarten and her younger siblings in preschool, Julia had a lot of time at home to herself, which she spent doing what she could seriously consider her actual day job.

Eating.

Her husband, Isaac, had never hidden his love of fat women. Heck, Julia had been fairly chubby in high school, and it had come as a total shock when one the top guys on campus had asked her out. The two had hit it off splendidly, and as the last five years of marriage would attest to, they were practically made for each other. She'd loved that her boyfriend (now husband) found her perfect the way she was, meaning she was free from worries about diet or exercise. If she didn't lose any weight, he wouldn't care, and if she wound up fatter, he'd actually be happy about it. Julia felt so at peace with Isaac and herself.

Of course, while married life with Isaac had been good for her heart, depending on how you viewed such things, it had either been bad or good for her waistline. The last five years had seen her weight steadily rise, and her gain only seemed to be picking up speed. When she graduated high school, she'd been about 175-200 pounds, which she'd considered pretty hefty back then. Now Julia's weight was well in excess of 500 pounds. Her last successful weigh-in had seen her at 538, easily the biggest she'd ever been. A more recent attempt to weigh in had ended in failure, as the scale had been crushed to scrap under her massive tonnage.

Julia's jaw had dropped open in shock, and she'd almost turned tomato-red in embarrassment. It was only because of Isaac's constant encouragement and flattery, as much in the bedroom as in words, that she'd gone from morbidly horrified to borderline sexually excited by her lardaceous mass.

Indeed, being fat, eating more, and getting fatter had, over time, become the keystone of their sexual relationship. Julia's meals had grown in size until they dwarfed those of the rest of the family. Everyone else was eating three meals, while she was eating four or five a day. Any activity that wasn't a meal was always accompanied by snacks.

During her third pregnancy, Isaac had taken to preparing a cart load of treats for her to enjoy during the day without having to rise from the couch anymore then was necessary. He'd kept doing it after little Debbie was born, and Julia hadn't failed to notice that it seemed to be getting fuller by the day. Isaac always encouraged her to eat everything on the cart to "keep her strength up," though of course they both knew the actual reason why.

On top of that, he'd usually bring a reward for her if she managed to finish the whole thing before he got home. Said reward, inevitably, was one she could eat.

And though she hadn't said anything, Julia figured he had to know she was treating herself daily to a sizable fast-food feast after dropping the girls off at school. He would be the one receiving the credit card statements, after all, and her reward treats had gotten quite a bit bigger since she'd started doing that a few months ago.

The end result, as you might imagine, was that Julia had gotten very, very fat. The bottom heavy beauty was currently sitting in a loveseat, though at her size, it looked like a chair. Her humongous hips touched both arms of the couch, and her barrel round thighs looked uncomfortably squeezed between them. Her heart shaped belly spread across her lap to her knees, and though it wouldn't be visible until she rose, her wide ass stuck out far behind her, and had taken on a decidedly rectangular shape as she piled on the pounds.

Above her belly, however, her gain had been considerably smaller. Her bust had grown a good bit, and her face had noticeably rounded out, but both were dwarfed by her other gargantuan features. Even her pillowy arms, which now had quite the jiggle to them, seemed like they belonged to a considerably smaller woman then Julia.

If anything, though, her reduced gain up top was only encouraging her gluttonous ways. Eating for her could be described as many things, but never tiring. And so Julia's days went by, taking care of her kids, and otherwise stuffing herself silly.

Finishing the last of the cupcakes, she looked over the now empty cart with a feeling akin to either pride, lust, or perhaps both. She checked her phone for the time as she swallowed the last of her milkshake.

"If I leave now, I'd have enough time for McDonald's run before I'd have to pick up the girls." Julia was already drooling at the thought of stuffing more fatty goodness down her throat, and wondered how much better her reward this evening would be.

Of course, she had to stand up first.

Bracing herself on the arms of the loveseat, Julia attempted to rise with a loud groan. Her body's enormous measurements and her packed belly saw her fail to rise more then an inch on her first attempt. Her second and third weren't much better.

"Hrrrrgh!" With a loud, pained groan, Julia slowly rose to her feet on the fourth attempt. Finally standing, she adopted a wider stance and stood still for a moment, panting heavily. After her short break, she slowly waddled to the front door. She couldn't help but notice how much of her body wobbled uncontrollably as she moved, and just how much slower her walking speed was compared to even a few short months ago. Even the short trek from the loveseat to the door left her winded, and it was quite clear that she'd failed to do anything approaching adequate exercise to accommodate her newfound poundage.

The more logical side of her mind found this very worrying, and Julia (at least in part) debated slowing down or reversing her gain. Her reprogrammed emotional side won out, however, and she grabbed her purse and headed to her car, her belly growling hungrily.
1253323222222.title: World's Fattest Trophy Wife, and still growing

choices: Time to pick up the kids
And now for something completely different
12533232222221.content:
Julia leaned against the wall to kick on her sandals, eliciting a loud creak from the drywall. She'd had plenty of practice putting on her footwear by touch and memory alone, given her inability to see her feet without a mirror, but it still took her a couple attempts to get them both on.

Already, Julia was feeling winded and wanted to sit down, but she forced herself to continue as her massively overstretched belly let out another subdued grumble. She opened the front door and squeezed herself through the (compared to her) narrow 36" opening, having to exit at a wicked angle because of her ultra-wide hips.

Julia crossed the front porch in a few short, waddling steps before she approached the front stairs. It may have only been four steps, but at her size, it was damn near a mountain. Julia grabbed the handrails on both sides and slowly, carefully lowered her heaving mass down one small step at a time. Each movement saw a massive wobble from her gigantic posterior, and her huge belly and gigantic thighs greatly impeded her leg movements. Both together threatened to destroy her balance at any time.

"Easy does it, girl. Slow and steady."

After what felt like an eternity, Julia was finally on the ground. Leaning against the nearby wall, she panted open-mouthed for a moment.

"Wait, did I remember to lock the door?" Julia looked behind her, her eyes lingering on the front steps. She bit her lower lip in trepidation. "You know what, I'm sure I did. Not important anyway."

Having caught her breath, she turned towards her vehicle, a slightly oversized SUV and began waddling towards it. She felt her huge ass cheeks damn near pop out of her jeans with each shuddering step, and only now did Julia realize she'd forgotten to change into an unbroken pair of pants. She tried to pull her shirt down to cover up her damaged trousers, but it kept trying to roll back up her belly, leaving her engorged lower belly roll on display.

Julia was a little embarrassed, but reasoned that no one would see the damage if she didn't get out the vehicle. "Besides, it's not like I need to worry about them falling off," she thought as she contemplated how packed she was into these jeans.

Having made her way to the vehicle, she leaned against the hood, struggling to catch her breath. "Good Lord," she thought. I swear that's getting harder."

Julia was grateful that they'd replaced her old car with this SUV, as it was far easier at her size to get in and out of than her old vehicle. Still, it was a bit of a hassle. Opening the door, Julia swung her first leg in. Resting the first part of her enormous right ass cheek on the seat, she began the long, arduous process of shuffling herself slowly into the driver's seat. Each shuffle saw her heavy belly smack mightily into the steering wheel, and her booty was already spreading across the center before she could even move her left leg in.

Closing the door ran into its own problems, as the door kept bouncing off her impressively huge thigh. Julia kept shuffling over and trying to close it again and again, only to feel it bounce off her leg fat. At long last, she felt the door latch, although not well, necessitating her to shuffle one last time.

Julia took a moment to lean back in her seat, panting. She could feel sweat building between her rolls. Her fat was crushed against the driver's door even though she was spreading across the front of the vehicle. She could barely reach the steering wheel at its current angle, but it still was rubbing against her belly. Moving her seat back further wasn't an option, as she could barely reach the pedal as it was. Even the instruments were half obscured by her lardy bust.

"Am I seriously getting too fat to DRIVE?" Once more, the logical part of her mind was quite terrified, but Julia couldn't help but feel so hot at this realization.

Having caught her breath for the third or fourth time today, Julia put on her seat belt, her extender barely reaching. Feeling a strange sense of pleasure as it uncomfortably dug into her stomach, she put her car in drive and made her way down the road.

******

Carl was having a pretty boring day at work when his head set dinged.

"Hi, welcome to McDonald's, can I take your order?"

A woman's voice came through. "Hi! Could I get 4 Big Macs with fries, 2 double quarter pounders with cheese, three large chocolate milk shakes, and six apple pies, please?"

"She sounds cute," Carl thought as she placed her order. "Must be buying supper for the family."

"Would you like to supersize any of that?"

"Umm... oh, why not? Supersize the lot."

"Your order comes to XXX dollars, first window please."

As the vehicle came around the corner, Carl's jaw dropped. "Holy @#$%, she's huge!"

Carl didn't manage to close his jaw as he watched this enormous blob of a woman struggle into her purse to pay for her food. Her body was so engorged with lard that her arms could barely move inside the vehicle. She was still a beautiful woman in spite of her gigantic size, and she gave a cute smile as she paid for her order.

"Thanks!"

Carl was so shocked that he barely remembered to call out as she left, "T-thank you for choosing McDonald's, please come again."

"Like there's any fear she won't. Seriously, Jesus Christ."

******

Julia stopped in the parking lot and started to dig into her absolutely huge order. She bit into her first burger with a loud "Mmm!"

"I thought that clerk was going to pass out from shock. I've gotten so fat people can't even believe it. I wonder what they'll think if they see me get even fatter...?"
12533232222221.title: To McDonald's, let's eat!

choices: The new maid sees Julia's weight skyrocket
And now for something completely different
125332322222212.content:
"BBBBBBUUUUUUURRRRRRRRPPPPP!"

Julia blushed after unleashing a belch which shook the windows. "Excuse me," she sheepishly said as she slowly, languidly rubbed her gargantuan, overstuffed belly.

After devouring her second fast food feast of the day, she'd picked up her three girls from kindergarten and preschool. The preschool pick up had proven the most problematic, as she'd had to exit the vehicle to put her young'ns in their car seats. Getting in and out of the vehicle at her size, combined with bending into the car to secure her kids after such a big meal, had altogether proven nearly impossible. One of the teachers had given her a helping hand, though Julia had felt her eyes taking apart her bloated parody of a body as she did.

Julia had taken a pair of breaks before getting the car back on the road. Too tired to even contemplate standing long enough to cook supper, she text Isaac while she panted, asking if he'd be fine if they ordered in for supper. He'd text back right away, saying that he'd pick something up on the way home.

That something had turned out to be a Chinese dinner for 12, the bulk of which was just for Julia. While Isaac took care of himself and the girls, Julia stuffed herself silly. As if that wasn't enough, after the girls went to bed, her hubby ordered her a large fully loaded pizza for a late evening "snack."

Laying on their tilted bed in her underwear, Julia consumed each and every slice of pizza, pushing it into her own mouth when Isaac seemed like he was going too slowly. By the time she was finished, her fingers and lips were orange with grease. A piece of pepperoni had fallen off one slice, landing on her exposed belly and leaving a stain of its own on her soft, pockmarked flesh.

As she rubbed her expansive belly, spreading the grease on her fingers across the opulent deposit of heaving flesh, she groaned as she watched Isaac come back in with a lemon meringue pie. "Oh, honey, I couldn't," Julia murmured, despite feeling her mouth begin to water.

"Shh, don't say that, sweetie. I know you have room. And if not," he said as he fed a forkful to the beached whale his wife had become, "we'll make room."

Julia moaned a little as she accepted the delectable morsel, chewing slowly as the weight of all she'd so far eaten came back to her. As she chewed her second mouthful, she felt guilty as she contemplated her current state. "Hon, can I ask you something?"

Isaac frowned a little, as this was out of character for his wife this late into her evening stuffing. "Sure."

"Do you think I've gotten fat?"

Isaac couldn't help but let out a snort of laughter. "I'm sorry, pardon?"

Julia blushed. "Not fat, but like, really fat. Too fat, I mean."

"No, I don't think so. What brought this on?"

Julia looked down at her grossly overfed body. She ran her hands along her fattened flanks, her tiny hands unable to reach all points of her massive belly, which in turn was still dwarfed in size by her gargantuan rump and legs. "It's just, it's getting really hard to do things, you know. Standing up without help is hard, walking anywhere is hard, I'm even getting too big to fit in my car. Loading up the girls after school today was beyond difficult; if Mrs. White hadn't been there, I'm not sure I could have done it. Even cooking and cleaning feel like herculean feats these days."

"Well, I did get my raise at work today. We've been talking about hiring someone to help out for awhile now..."

"I know, I know. It's just, I worry I'm getting to the point where I won't be good for anything except eating more and getting fatter."

"Sweetie..."

Julia interrupted Isaac. "I mean, I almost fill our bed just with my ass, and I outgrew my biggest jeans today, and I'm so stuffed and yet all I can think about is eating the rest of that pie and hoping there's something else nearby, and-"

This time it was Isaac's turn to interrupt Julia. He shoved a large bite of dessert into her open mouth, leaving her eyes wide with shock as he smeared meringue around her puffy lips. Planting a kiss on her lips as she chewed and swallowed, Julia said in a voice barely above a whisper, "I just don't want you to think I'm useless."

"Oh Julie, you know I'd never think that. Do you really think I only love you because you clean the toilet or do the laundry? I love you for you; always have."

He fed her another mouthful of pie. Once she swallowed, Julia said, "Would you love me even if I got fatter?"

Isaac's smile seemed to widen a little. "Of course."

Another mouthful. "Even if I got lazier?"

"Of course."

Chew, swallow. "Even more out of shape?"

"Yes."

The fork was beginning to scrape the bottom of the plate. "Even hungrier?"

"Yes, 1000 times yes."

"What if I got skinnier?"

Isaac's smile seemed to freeze momentarily, and he may have hesitated a moment, but the time span was too short for Julia to be certain she didn't imagine it. "Of course I would, honey. Do you want to lose weight?"

He was pretty certain he already knew the answer, as her belly let out a growl as he placed a box of donuts on her jiggly belly. He opened the box and grabbed a jumbo bear claw. Holding it to Julia's mouth, she said before taking a huge bite, "No."

"Do you want to eat less?"

Julia was painfully stuffed, but forced herself to take another bite, feeling her body quiver as she did so. "No."

Isaac smiled even wider as she reached forward and grabbed a pastry herself. "Do you want to eat more?"

Julia moaned as she sunk her teeth into the custard filled treat. "I shall take that as a yes. Do you want to get fatter?"

She was silent for a moment, the only sound in the room the smacking of her lips. He said again, "Do you want to get fatter?"

Julia looked him in eye, then slowly nodded. Isaac continued to grin. "Good girl. I'll call the agency tomorrow and get someone to take the load off you. You just focus on what's important, okay?"

Julia kept eating, using both hands to funnel pastry into her ever-hungry maw.

******

So what happens next for Julia?
125332322222212.title: Later that evening

info.description:
This is an unusual weight gain story as it focuses on characters already fat and talks about their day to day life as super obese people.

The only rule is that if you plan to take the story in a direction that others won't like, for instance scatology or vore, you need to give warning.

Slob and sadistic types of chapters are welcomed and encouraged.
